T02D2515:316a-16: nas nye bar bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:316a-17: de nas yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:316a-18: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2515:316a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:316a-20: de rnams kyi bsdu ba'i snying po buddha dang /
T02D2515:316a-21: badzra sa m'a dza'i sgra dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsdus shing bcug pa'o //
T02D2515:316a-22: rgyud rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi sgras 'jig rten
T02D2515:316a-23: gyi khams shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su kun du
T02D2515:316a-24: gnas pa'i dbye bas lhag pa'i grangs rab 'byams su
T02D2515:316a-25: brjod pa'i rim pa'i mthar thug pa ni rgyud gnyis
T02D2515:316a-26: pa zhes bya ba la sogs par blta bar bya'o
T02D2515:316a-27: // yang dag par sbyor nas ni 'dres par gyur nas so //
T02D2515:316a-28: rdo rje'i blo'i ye shes ni bla na med pa'i shes rab ye shes so //
T02D2515:316a-29: yongs su bskyed de ni mngon du bya ste'o //
T02D2515:316a-30: gnas rnams thams cad du ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang thugs ka rnams su'o //
T02D2515:316a-31: bcom ldan 'das rang gi shes rab de'i gzugs kyis
T02D2515:316a-32: byin gyis brlabs pa gang yin pa de'i phyir de
T02D2515:316a-33: nyid du kun du gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:316a-34: 'khor los sgyur ba chen po'i snying po zhes pa
T02D2515:316a-35: ni gtsug tor gyi snying po yi ge gcig pa'o
T02D2515:316a-36: // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byin
T02D2515:316a-37: gyis rlob pa po nyid yin la de gtso bo'i
T02D2515:316a-38: nga rgyal gyi sdud pa po nyid 'di'i lus kyi
T02D2515:316a-39: thugs ka'i dpal be'u'i rnam pa ni thugs dpal gyi
T02D2515:316a-40: // be'u la'o // bde ba thams cad kun du
T02D2515:316a-41: ston par byed pa ni thams cad bde ba kun
T02D2515:316a-43: chags pas chags pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir de
T02D2515:316a-44: la spyod pa'i dbang du byas nas rnam par snang
T02D2515:316b-0: mdzad @316b chen po'i dkyil 'khor nges par rtogs par
T02D2515:316b-1: bya ba'i don du gsungs pa shin tu dga' ba
T02D2515:316b-2: rnam par dag pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D2515:316b-3: / shin tu dga' ba ni dbang po gnyis snyoms
T02D2515:316b-4: par zhugs pa las skyes pa'i bde ba las byung
T02D2515:316b-5: / ba'o // de'i rnam par dag pa ni bag chags bsal ba'o //
T02D2515:316b-6: de'i gnas ni rten te byed pa po'i zhes pa'o //
T02D2515:316b-7: re zhig gang zhe na gsungs pa 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:316b-8: 'di zhes pa byang chub kyi bdag nyid can gyi
T02D2515:316b-9: sems dpa' gang yin pa 'di rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2515:316b-10: chen po'i gnas te phyag rgya chen po la sogs
T02D2515:316b-11: pa'i tshul lo // de'i shin tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas so //
T02D2515:316b-12: de bzhin du lta ba rnam par dag pa ni
T02D2515:316b-13: mi bskyod pa dang sems ma rdo rje ma dang
T02D2515:316b-14: / rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyi'o //
T02D2515:316b-15: dga' ba rnam par dag pa ni sgeg mo'i'o //
T02D2515:316b-16: sred pa rnam par dag pa ni phreng ba ma'i'o //
T02D2515:316b-17: 'dod chags rnam par dag pa ni glu ma'i'o //
T02D2515:316b-18: zhe sdang rnam par dag pa ni gar ma'i'o //
T02D2515:316b-19: gti mug rnam par dag pa ni bdug pa ma'i'o //
T02D2515:316b-20: bsnyems pa rnam par dag pa ni me tog ma'i'o //
T02D2515:316b-21: mtshan nyid med pa rnam par dag pa ni snang ba ma'i'o //
T02D2515:316b-22: yid sim pa rnam par dag pa mi dri ma'i'o //
T02D2515:316b-23: snang ba rnam par dag pa ni lcags kyu'i'o //
T02D2515:316b-24: lus rnam par dag pa ni zhags pa'i'o //
T02D2515:316b-25: ngag rnam par dag pa ni lcags sgrog gi'o //
T02D2515:316b-26: yid rnam par dag pa ni 'bebs pa'i'o //
T02D2515:316b-27: gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa yang gzugs
T02D2515:316b-28: la sogs pa rnam par sbyar bar rig par bya'o
T02D2515:316b-29: // rim pa ni 'dzin pa'i mthar thug pa de
T02D2515:316b-30: srid du shin tu dga' ba'i don ni bdag tu
T02D2515:316b-33: de nas don la sred do //
T02D2515:316b-35: de nas bdag la sogs pa dang 'gal ba la zhe sdang ngo //
T02D2515:316b-36: 'di dag kun mi shes pa'i phyir rmongs so //
T02D2515:316b-37: dga' ba dang srid pa dang chags pa rnams kyis bsnyems so //
T02D2515:316b-38: zhe sdang las mi khom mo //
T02D2515:316b-39: rab tu byung ba rnams kyi lus las skyes pa
T02D2515:316b-40: la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnam par dben pa'i phyir
T02D2515:316b-41: yid tshim pa'o ; / de nas ye shes kyi snang ba'o //
T02D2515:316b-42: de nas khyad par du 'phags pa'i lus dang /
T02D2515:316b-44: yid kyi bdag nyid can dpag tu med pa'i yul rnams kyis /
T02D2515:316b-45: 'dod chags dang bral ba yang rab tu 'joms par
T02D2515:316b-46: byed do zhes bas gzugs la sogs pa rnams so
T02D2515:317a-0: // 'di nyid so sor rtogs par bya ba'i @317a * //
T02D2515:317a-2: de ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:317a-3: rnam pa cis shen gsungs pa /
T02D2515:317a-4: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis te stong pa nyid kyis zhes pa'o //
T02D2515:317a-5: gal te de ltar na thams cad dngos po med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa /
T02D2515:317a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
T02D2515:317a-7: dag pa zhes pa don dam par de lta bu
T02D2515:317a-8: yin la kun rdzob tu ni 'gal bar brjod pa'o
T02D2515:317a-9: // de'i phyir yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2515:317a-10: phyin pa yongs su dag pa nyid byang chub sems
T02D2515:317a-11: // dpa'i gnas so // chos thams cad rnam par
T02D2515:317a-12: dag pa bsdus pa ni shin tu dga' ba la
T02D2515:317a-13: sogs pa rnam par dag pa thob pa'o //
T02D2515:317a-14: sgrib pa thams cad dang chod pa la sogs pa
T02D2515:317a-15: de rnams nye bar bsags kyang rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2515:317a-16: chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa las te /
T02D2515:317a-17: chod pa ni 'dod pa'i 'dun pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:317a-18: snyom pa'i sgrib pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:317a-19: chos kyi sgrib pa ni shes bya'i sgrib pa rnams so //
T02D2515:317a-20: las kyi sgrib pa ni mtshams med pa'i mtshan nyid te de rnams nye bar bsags pa'o //
T02D2515:317a-21: rim pa bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pas
T02D2515:317a-22: byin gyis brlabs pas dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan
T02D2515:317a-23: song du lhung bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:317a-24: byas pa tsam na yang sdug bsngal de zad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:317a-25: 'chang ba la sogs pa ni rab tu 'jug pa'o //
T02D2515:317a-26: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje ting nge
T02D2515:317a-27: 'dzin so sor thob pa ni chos thams cad stong
T02D2515:317a-28: pa nyid dbyer med pa'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa'o
T02D2515:317a-29: // chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug ni rnam par snang mdzad chen por 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:317a-30: dga' ba la sogs pa ni bla na med pa zhi ba de'i'o //
T02D2515:317a-31: rang dang gzhan dang gnyis ka'i don la dmigs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsungs so //
T02D2515:317a-32: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba
T02D2515:317a-33: bcu drug rnams kyi ni rdo rje sems dpa' la
T02D2515:317a-34: sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bcu drug thob pa rnams
T02D2515:317a-36: / zhi ba la spyod pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i
T02D2515:317a-37: don du rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D2515:317a-39: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:317b-0: de nas kyi sgra ni bar ma @317b chad pa'o //
T02D2515:317b-1: zhi ba'i chos nyid ni de bzhin nyid do //
T02D2515:317b-2: de'i mngon par byang chub pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes mtha' yas pa'o //
T02D2515:317b-3: de'i mngon par bsgrub pa ni thob par byed pa'o //
T02D2515:317b-4: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2515:317b-5: rdo rje mnyam pa nyid ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa stong pa nyid ngo ;
T02D2515:317b-6: / de'i mngon par byang chub pa ni rtogs pa'o //
T02D2515:317b-7: de kho na byang chub chen po ste rnam par snang mdzad nyid do //
T02D2515:317b-8: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa rdo rje bstan pas
T02D2515:317b-9: zhes te de'i 'dzin pa stong pa nyid du lhag
T02D2515:317b-10: par rtog pa bstan pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:317b-11: don mnyam pa nyid ni gzung ba'i rnam pa stong pa nyid do //
T02D2515:317b-12: de'i mngon par byang chub ba de kho na yang byang chub chen po zhes te sngar bzhin no //
T02D2515:317b-13: ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa don gcig pa nyid
T02D2515:317b-14: kyi zhes pa gzung bya stong pa nyid la dmigs
T02D2515:317b-15: pa'i ye shes bstan pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:317b-16: chos rnams ni lung dang rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2515:317b-17: de mnyam pa nyid ni de stong pa nyid do //
T02D2515:317b-18: de'i mngon par byang chub pa kho na byang chub chen po zhes pa ste /
T02D2515:317b-20: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2515:317b-21: rang bzhin rnam par dag pas zhes pa chos rang
T02D2515:317b-22: bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa la dmigs pa'i ye
T02D2515:317b-23: shes bstan pa nyid kyis so zhes pa ji srid
T02D2515:317b-24: pa'o ; / thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni mig la sogs pa stong pa nyid do //
T02D2515:317b-25: de'i mngon par byang chub pa kho na byang chub chen po'i zhes pa sngar bzhin no //
T02D2515:317b-26: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2515:317b-27: thams cad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:317b-28: mig la sogs pa'i shes pa rnam par rtog pa
T02D2515:317b-29: stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i ye shes mchog gis
T02D2515:317b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs pa la sogs pa yang
T02D2515:317b-32: rdo rje la sogs pa yang rdo rje la sogs
T02D2515:317b-34: de rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ces pa la sogs pa ni sngar bzhin no //
T02D2515:317b-35: byang chub chen po'i rim pa bzhin du mi bskyod
T02D2515:317b-36: pa la sogs pa'i go 'phang gi rang bzhin du
T02D2515:317b-37: chud par bya'o // chos bsgrub pa ni snang mdzad
T02D2515:317b-38: la sogs pa'i go 'phang thob par byed pa'am mi
T02D2515:317b-39: bskyod pa la sogs pa sems can nye bar 'dren
T02D2515:317b-40: chud par bya'o // pa po'o // zhe sdang spyod
T02D2515:317b-41: pa rjes su gzung bar bya ba rdo rje h'um
T02D2515:318a-0: mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don bstan pa @318a *
T02D2515:318a-1: chud par bya'o // pa po'o // // gsungs pa /
T02D2515:318a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:318a-3: gdug pa thams cad ni lha chen po la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:318a-4: de rnams 'dul bar byed pa gang gis sh'akya thub
T02D2515:318a-5: pa rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs can du byas
T02D2515:318a-6: pa de'o // chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid 'dod chags la stong pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:318a-7: rnam par rgyal ba ni de'i bsam pa nyid kyis 'dod chags pa rab tu bcom pa'o //
T02D2515:318a-8: de'i yang dag par bsdus pa'o //
T02D2515:318a-9: gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2515:318a-10: mngon par sgrub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T02D2515:318a-11: phyin pa'i tshig gis de de bzhin du gsungs pa
T02D2515:318a-12: de'o // 'dod chags ni zhen pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2515:318a-13: de'i spros pa don dam pa nyid du nye bar mi dmigs pa'o //
T02D2515:318a-14: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2515:318a-15: 'dod chags spros pa med pa nyid de 'dod chags
T02D2515:318a-16: kyi rgyu kha dog la sogs pa nye bar dmigs
T02D2515:318a-17: pa med pa nyid kyis so ;
T02D2515:318a-18: / zhe sdang ni kun du 'joms pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2515:318a-19: de'i spros pa med pa kho na bzhin du /
T02D2515:318a-20: ji ltar zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid
T02D2515:318a-21: kyis she na kun nas mnar sems pa'i gzhi dgu
T02D2515:318a-22: nye bar dmigs pa med pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:318a-23: gti mug ni bdag tu lta ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2515:318a-24: de'i spros pa med pa sngar bzhin du nye bar dmigs pa med pa'o //
T02D2515:318a-26: gsungs pa gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid
T02D2515:318a-27: kyis ni bdag la sogs pa yongs su dag pa'i
T02D2515:318a-28: zhing rnams nye bar mi dmigs pa'o //
T02D2515:318a-29: chos thams cad ni khams gsum pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'o //
T02D2515:318a-30: de rnams kyi spros pa don dam pa nyid du nye bar dmigs pa med pa'o //
T02D2515:318a-31: ji ltar chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa
T02D2515:318a-32: nyid ce na khams gsum pa'i sems dang sems las
T02D2515:318a-33: byung ba de dag tu yongs su brtags pa rnams
T02D2515:318a-34: kyi dngos po med pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:318a-35: stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can mchog
T02D2515:318a-36: tu mthar thug pa 'byed pa'i shes rab ni shes
T02D2515:318a-37: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D2515:318a-38: 'di'i spros pa med pa nyid ni de kho na bzhin du nye bar dmigs pa med pa'o //
T02D2515:318a-39: ci ltar zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2515:318a-40: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa nyid kyis te /
T02D2515:318b-0: rnam par rtog pa dang de'i dbye ba @318b rnams nye bar dmigs pa med pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:318b-1: zhe sdang gis de spang ba nye bar bstan nas
T02D2515:318b-2: gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i don
T02D2515:318b-3: du / de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin dag
T02D2515:318b-4: pa zhes pa la sogs pas 'jig rten dbang phyug
T02D2515:318b-5: gi dkyil 'khor gyi don bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:318b-6: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos ma lus pa kun du gzigs pa'i phyir /
T02D2515:318b-7: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos thams cad do //
T02D2515:318b-8: chos thams cad ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:318b-9: de rnams kun du gzigs pa nyid ni mngon sum du byed pa'o //
T02D2515:318b-10: de la dbang byed bas na dbang phyug go //
T02D2515:318b-11: de'i ye shes ni dkyil 'khor la sogs pa nges pa'o //
T02D2515:318b-12: de la gang gis rgyas gdab par bya zhing mngon
T02D2515:318b-13: par bya ba yin pas de de bzhin du gsungs
T02D2515:318b-15: 'dod chags thams cad ni sngar gsungs pa de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D2515:318b-16: mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnam par dben pa nyid do //
T02D2515:318b-17: de zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur te /
T02D2515:318b-19: lu dzye te zhes pa ni 'dir thob pa dang skye ba'o //
T02D2515:318b-20: lta ba thams cad kyi dri ma de rnam par dag pa ste /
T02D2515:318b-21: don dam par gdod ma nas nye bar dmigs pa med pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:318b-22: sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa ni mi
T02D2515:318b-23: dge ba'i sems pa nye bar dmigs pa med pas
T02D2515:318b-24: so // chos thams cad ni sems dang sems las byung ba rnams so //
T02D2515:318b-25: de rnams kyi rnam par dag pa ni 'dzin pa nye bar dmigs pa med pa'o //
T02D2515:318b-26: de ni sems can thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyi yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:318b-27: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang lam dang /
T02D2515:318b-33: mi skye bshes pa rnams so //
T02D2515:318b-34: de rnams kyi yang dag pa ni rnam par rtog pa gnyis med pa'o //
T02D2515:318b-35: de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par
T02D2515:318b-36: dag pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'jug pa ni
T02D2515:318b-37: thos pa dang bsam pa las byung ba'i rgyu'i gnas
T02D2515:318b-38: skabs yang dag par bsdus pa'i sems pa'o //
T02D2515:319a-1: par dag pa ni nye bar dmigs pa med pa'o //
T02D2515:319a-2: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa nyid kyis /
T02D2515:319a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis shes rab kyi pha
T02D2515:319a-4: rol tu phyin pa de yang dag par thob par
T02D2515:319a-5: shes par bya'o // 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams
T02D2515:319a-6: kyis de spyod pa nye bar bstan nas ser sna'i
T02D2515:319a-7: gnyen po'i don la lhag par mos pa rnams yang
T02D2515:319a-8: dag par rjes su gzung ba'i don du de nas
T02D2515:319a-9: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pas rin
T02D2515:319a-10: po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi don nye bar
T02D2515:319a-13: nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i ma rig pa
T02D2515:319a-14: dang bral ba las khams gsum pa thams cad kyi
T02D2515:319a-15: bdag po'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba rin po che'i cod pan te /
T02D2515:319a-17: gang las she na ye shes las so //
T02D2515:319a-18: de nyid kyi snying po gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2515:319a-19: mngon par dbang bskur ba byin pa ni dkyil 'khor rnams su bkod pa'i lha rnams dang /
T02D2515:319a-20: slob ma rnams la yang phyag rgya rnams kyis mngon par dbang bskur ba'o //
T02D2515:319a-21: don ni gser la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:319a-22: chos ni mdo sde la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:319a-23: de'i sbyin pa ni nyon mongs pa med pas ston par byed pa'o //
T02D2515:319a-24: zang zing ni bza' ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:319a-25: de ltar rnam par sbyong bar byed pa'i don du
T02D2515:319a-26: sngags kyi tshul nges par sbyar ba rnams kyis skul
T02D2515:319a-27: sogs pa gcig pa can du byed pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2515:319a-28: stong pa nyid rjes su dran pa'i phyag rgya bsgrub
T02D2515:319a-29: par bya'o zhes de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya
T02D2515:319a-30: ba la sogs pas rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil
T02D2515:319a-31: 'khor gyi don nye bar gsal bar byed pa gsungs
T02D2515:319a-32: pa / de bzhin de bzhin nyid bden gang //
T02D2515:319a-33: de ni rdo rje khu tshur brjod //
T02D2515:319a-35: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya nyid do //
T02D2515:319a-36: rab tu brnyes pa ni lhag par rtogs pa dang ldang pa'o //
T02D2515:319a-37: de'i gnas skabs gsal bar byed pa'i dam tshig gi
T02D2515:319a-38: khu tshur ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2515:319a-39: khu tshur ro // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2515:319a-40: kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D2515:319a-41: ni brtan pa can du byed pa'o //
T02D2515:319a-42: de nyid rdo rje ste de skad bya ba'o //
T02D2515:319b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa thams @319b cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni /
T02D2515:319b-2: gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni lce
T02D2515:319b-3: la zla ba bsgom pa sngon ma can gyi sngags
T02D2515:319b-4: bzla'o // chos thams cad so sor thob pa ni
T02D2515:319b-5: so so yang dag pa'i rig pa bzhi brnyes pa'o
T02D2515:319b-6: bzla'o // // thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin
T02D2515:319b-7: pa ni rang gi snying gar zla ba la rdo
T02D2515:319b-8: rje rtse lnga ba bsgoms pa sngon ma can gyi
T02D2515:319b-9: dam tshig gi phyag rgya 'ching ba'o //
T02D2515:319b-10: rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni rang
T02D2515:319b-11: gi snying gar zla ba la sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D2515:319b-12: sngon du 'dren pas las kyi phyag rgya'i 'ching ba'o
T02D2515:319b-13: // shes rab kyi blo bsgrub par bya'o zhes pas
T02D2515:319b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa
T02D2515:319b-15: med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:319b-16: de'i thabs 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor gyi don nye bar bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:319b-17: chos thams cad de'i rgyu dang 'bras bu don du gnyer ba'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D2515:319b-18: de rnams kyis spros pa ni 'byung ba'i rtog pa yang dag par gcod pa'o //
T02D2515:319b-19: de'i rjes su ma dmigs pas na spros pa med par byed do zhes pas spros pa med pa'o //
T02D2515:319b-21: aa ra ba tsa na la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:319b-22: yongs su skor bar byed pa ni shes rab kyi
T02D2515:319b-23: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gang yin pa de
T02D2515:319b-24: de bzhin du brjod pa de'o ;
T02D2515:319b-25: / chos thams cad ni 'bras bu'i ngo bo phung
T02D2515:319b-26: po lnga po de rnams don dam par stong par
T02D2515:319b-27: dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2515:319b-28: ci ltar zhe na rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis
T02D2515:319b-29: zhes te gang gi phyir de rnams don dam pa
T02D2515:319b-30: nyid du rang bzhin nye bar dmigs par bya ba
T02D2515:319b-31: med do // de nyid ni mtshan ma med pa ste ;
T02D2515:319b-33: mtshan ma med pas nye bar bzung ba ste /
T02D2515:319b-34: gang gi phyir don dam pa nyid du de rnams
T02D2515:319b-35: kyi mtshan ma ste rgyu'i rang bzhin nye bar thob
T02D2515:319b-36: par byar med de de'i phyir mtshan ma med pa'o
T02D2515:319b-37: // slar yang kho na smon pa med pa ste don du gnyer ba med pa'o //
T02D2515:319b-38: ci ltar zhes smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis te gang gi phyir /
T02D2515:319b-39: de rnams don dam par don du gnyer ba rnyed par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:319b-40: de gsung par 'gyur ba 'bras bu'i ngo bo de
T02D2515:319b-41: snyed dang bzhin gyi ston pas 'bras bu med pa'i
T02D2515:319b-42: phyir dang de'i rgyu yang nye bar ma dmigs pa'i
T02D2515:319b-43: phyir mtshan ma med pa dang de'i smon par bya
T02D2515:320a-2: de'i phyir yang rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D2515:320a-3: ci ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2515:320a-4: pa rnam par dag pa ni don dam par na
T02D2515:320a-6: kun rdzob tu ni rjes su 'jug pa kho na'o zhes so //
T02D2515:320a-7: tshig de rnams kyis kyang rim pa las stong pa
T02D2515:320a-8: nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med
T02D2515:320a-9: pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam
T02D2515:320a-10: par thar ba'i sgo bstan pa dang me long la
T02D2515:320a-11: sogs pa'i ye shes bzhi'o zhes khong du chud par
T02D2515:320a-12: pa dang / bya'o // dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa
T02D2515:320a-13: med na grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes pas de
T02D2515:320a-14: nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pas grub
T02D2515:320a-15: pa'i thabs sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor
T02D2515:320a-16: lo bskor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi don kun du bstan
T02D2515:320a-17: pa dang / bya'o // pa gsungs pa / de
T02D2515:320a-18: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni sangs rgyas dang byang
T02D2515:320a-20: de rnams kyang 'khor lo ni dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:320a-21: de'i nang du gnas pa ni gang du thams cad
T02D2515:320a-22: de rnams su'o zhes de bzhin du brjod par bya'o
T02D2515:320a-23: // gang gis 'khor lo chen po rab tu 'jug
T02D2515:320a-24: pa de 'khor lo chen po rnams su rab tu
T02D2515:320a-25: // 'jug pa'o // rab tu 'jug pa yang phyi
T02D2515:320a-26: dang gsang ba'i dbye bas rnam pa gnyis te phyi
T02D2515:320a-27: ni phyag rgya rnams kyis so //
T02D2515:320a-28: gsang ba ni rab tu zhugs pa dang 'di la
T02D2515:320a-29: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid kun
T02D2515:320a-30: du rtogs pa la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2515:320a-31: rdo rje mnyam pa nyid ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa dang bral ba nyid do //
T02D2515:320a-32: de la rab tu zhugs pa ni lhag par rtogs pa'o //
T02D2515:320a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la
T02D2515:320a-34: rab tu zhugs pa'i che du de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2515:320a-35: la 'jug pa'o // yang dag par 'jug par 'gyur ro ni skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:320a-36: don mnyam pa nyid 'jug pa ni gzung bya'i rnam pa stong par lhag par rtogs pa ste /
T02D2515:320a-37: de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad
T02D2515:320a-38: kyi don du 'khor lo la rab tu zhugs pa'i
T02D2515:320a-39: phyir ; byang chub sems dpa' chen po nyid kyi don du 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:320a-40: chos ni nyan thos pa'i lung gi chos te stong
T02D2515:320a-41: pa nyid du rtogs pas dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor
T02D2515:320a-42: lo la 'jug pa'i phyir te dam pa'i chos kyi
T02D2515:320a-43: 'khor lo ni lan gsum dang rnam pa gcig nyid
T02D2515:320b-0: kyi mtshan nyid mngon du phyogs par @320b byed pa'i
T02D2515:320b-2: las ni mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba'o //
T02D2515:320b-3: de stong pa nyid du rtogs pas 'jig rten pa'i
T02D2515:320b-4: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi don rab tu 'jug pa'i
T02D2515:320b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa zhes bya
T02D2515:320b-7: ba la sogs pas zhugs pa'i 'khor lo rnams kyis
T02D2515:320b-8: grub pa'i thabs mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi don bstan
T02D2515:320b-9: pa gsungs pa / de zhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2515:320b-10: mchod pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la
T02D2515:320b-12: de dag gi cho ga rgyas pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa nyid do //
T02D2515:320b-14: / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa
T02D2515:320b-15: nyid dam pa ste de gang la de de bzhin
T02D2515:320b-16: du gsungs pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2515:320b-17: smon pa dang 'jug pa byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyi sems ni byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2515:320b-19: ngan song ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang sgrib pa rnams yongs su skyob pa'o //
T02D2515:320b-20: nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D2515:320b-21: sangs rgyas kyi chos ni dam pa'i chos so //
T02D2515:320b-22: de thos pa la sogs pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba'o //
T02D2515:320b-23: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bri ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2515:320b-24: de nas bcom ldan zhes pa la sogs pa bgegs
T02D2515:320b-25: kyi gnyen po'i phyogs te rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi
T02D2515:320b-26: dkyil 'khor gyi don bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:320b-27: gdug pa rnam pa thams cad 'dul ba ste nyes par spyod pa'o zhes pas sgrib pa'o //
T02D2515:320b-28: de'i mthas yod pa ni nus pa ste /
T02D2515:320b-29: sems can thams cad nyes par spyod pa la rab
T02D2515:320b-30: tu zhen pa de rnams 'dul ba ni de dag
T02D2515:320b-31: yongs su spong pa'o / de'i don gyi ye shes
T02D2515:320b-32: ni sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes te
T02D2515:320b-33: / khro bo'i gzugs kun du ston par nus pa'o //
T02D2515:320b-34: de nyid snying po ste de skad ces bya ba can no //
T02D2515:320b-35: sems can thams cad ni dgra bo dang mdza' bo la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:320b-36: mnyam pa nyid kyi ste mtshungs pa nyid kyi khro
T02D2515:320b-37: bo yang mnyam pa nyid de thams cad rigs pa
T02D2515:320b-38: rnams su gor ma chag par 'jug pa dang ldog
T02D2515:320b-39: pa'o // nam gyi tshe so sor dul bar 'gyur
T02D2515:320b-40: zhe na sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas
T02D2515:321a-0: pa'o // @321a * // zhes bya ba la sogs pas gsungs pa /
T02D2515:321a-1: ji srid du sems can rnams thams cad dul bar
T02D2515:321a-2: gyur ba de srid du khro bo'i skabs su dul
T02D2515:321a-3: ba ni khro bo'i yang 'dul ba nyid du mi
T02D2515:321a-4: 'jug par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2515:321a-5: de'i phyir nyes pa'i bdag nyid 'di yang sngon du
T02D2515:321a-6: byas pa'i phyir nyes pa med pa nyid du bstan
T02D2515:321a-7: pa gsungs pa // sems can thams cad chos nyid
T02D2515:321a-8: pas te de kho na ni sems can thams cad
T02D2515:321a-9: ni sems dang sems las byung ba'i rang bzhin no
T02D2515:321a-10: pa gsungs pa // // chos nyid ni stong pa nyid de khro ba yang de nyid do //
T02D2515:321a-11: de'i phyir yang khro ba yang rdo rje'i sgras brjod do //
T02D2515:321a-12: ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2515:321a-13: sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub po zhes
T02D2515:321a-14: pa ni gang gi phyir byang chub kyi mtshan nyid
T02D2515:321a-15: 'di kho na sems can thams cad 'dul ba yin
T02D2515:321a-16: te / de'i phyir sems can thams cad mnyam pa
T02D2515:321a-17: nyid las khro ba mnyam pa nyid nas ji srid
T02D2515:321a-18: du rdo rje nyid do zhes so /
T02D2515:321a-20: // / da ni don yod rgyal po la sogs pa
T02D2515:321a-21: nas rdo rje khu tshur gyi mthar thug pa'i dkyil
T02D2515:321a-22: 'khor gyi don bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:321a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2515:321a-24: cad ces bya ba la sogs pas thams cad mnyam
T02D2515:321a-25: pa nyid ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i dkyil 'khor bcu
T02D2515:321a-27: de las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs
T02D2515:321a-28: su gyur par kun du gnas pa ni thams cad
T02D2515:321a-29: mnyam pa nyid las rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:321a-30: dkyil 'khor thams cad ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D2515:321a-31: de kho na mchog ste gang du de bzhin du gsungs pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
T02D2515:321a-32: thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshungs pa nyid de /
T02D2515:321a-33: des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid de /
T02D2515:321a-34: don dam par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2515:321a-35: pa la dkyil 'khor thams cad lta bur lhag par
T02D2515:321a-36: sgro btags nas de bzhin kho nar brjod par 'gyur
T02D2515:321a-37: ba'i phyir ro // dkyil 'khor rnams thams cad ni
T02D2515:321a-38: rten de mngon par byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni don
T02D2515:321a-39: ba'i phyir ro // nyid do // gang kho na
T02D2515:321a-40: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin pa
T02D2515:321a-42: de rnams kyi chos nyid ni bla na med pa'i
T02D2515:321a-43: byang chub bskyed pa po nyid de de kho na'o
T02D2515:321a-44: // de la yang gang dkyil 'khor rnams su mngon
T02D2515:321b-0: pa la sogs @321b pa'i las nyid phun sum tshogs
T02D2515:321b-1: par 'gyur ba de kho na shes rab kyi pha
T02D2515:321b-2: rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin no zhes so //
T02D2515:321b-3: 'jig rten pa'i lha la lhag par mos pa rnams bstan pa 'di la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2515:321b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2515:321b-5: cad ces bya ba la sogs pas dbang phyug chen
T02D2515:321b-6: po'i dkyil 'khor gyi don bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:321b-7: dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du sgom
T02D2515:321b-8: par byed pas byin gyis rlob pa ni shes rab
T02D2515:321b-9: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul yin pa de
T02D2515:321b-10: la de bzhin du gsungs so //
T02D2515:321b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par
T02D2515:321b-12: dag pa'i bdag nyid can rnam par snang mdzad do
T02D2515:321b-13: // de'i snying po gang yin pa de la de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2515:321b-14: gang las she na kun du bzang po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste gsungs pa /
T02D2515:321b-15: byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po
T02D2515:321b-16: ni de bzhin nyid dang ye shes kyi bdag nyid
T02D2515:321b-17: can chos kyi sku rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o
T02D2515:321b-18: // de thams cad kyi bdag nyid nyid pas ni
T02D2515:321b-19: sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba nyid
T02D2515:321b-20: // kyis so // rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa
T02D2515:321b-21: ste de'i snying po gang yin pa ni rdo rje
T02D2515:321b-22: // kyis so // snying po'o // ci ltar zhe
T02D2515:321b-23: na rdo rje snying po'i dbang bskur ba nyid bas
T02D2515:321b-24: te me long ye shes kyi bdag nyid can rdo
T02D2515:321b-25: rje'i phyag rgyas mngon par dbang bskur ba ste de
T02D2515:321b-26: ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'i sems can dang thun
T02D2515:321b-28: rin po che ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D2515:321b-29: de gang rnams kyi snying po yin pa zhes pa sngon ma bzhin no //
T02D2515:321b-30: ci'i phyir zhe na rin chen snying pos dbang bskur
T02D2515:321b-31: ba nyid kyis te mnyam pa nyid kyi bdag nyid
T02D2515:321b-32: can rin chen gyi mngon bar dbang bskur ba ste
T02D2515:321b-33: / de ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'i sems can dang thun mong ba nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:321b-34: chos ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rgyal po'o //
T02D2515:321b-35: ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa nyid pas
T02D2515:321b-36: ni gang gi phyir so sor kun du rtog pa'i
T02D2515:321b-37: ye shes ni ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug
T02D2515:321b-38: pa ste de yang sems can thams cad kyi rjes
T02D2515:321b-39: su zhugs pa'o // las ni gdon mi za ba ste /
T02D2515:321b-40: sems can thams cad la kun du gnas so //
T02D2515:321b-41: nag po chen po dang dga' byed dbang phyug gi
T02D2515:321b-42: dkyil 'khor gyi don bstan pa'i phyir de nas bcom
T02D2515:322a-1: bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:322a-2: 'di la mtha' yod pa ma yin no zhes pas mtha' las 'das pa'o //
T02D2515:322a-3: mur thug pa dang mthar phyin pa ni mu med cing mthar phyin pa'o //
T02D2515:322a-4: des gang la mu med cing mthar phyin par rig
T02D2515:322a-5: par bya ba de bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dbyings
T02D2515:322a-6: thams cad du thams cad kyi tshe kun du gnas
T02D2515:322a-7: pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid kyi
T02D2515:322a-8: phyir ro // rim pa'i mthar mtha' las 'das shing
T02D2515:322a-9: mu med la mthar phyin pa'i tshig rnams kyis de
T02D2515:322a-10: bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs gsum gyi rang
T02D2515:322a-12: mu med cing mthar phyin pa'i chos 'dis kyang las kyi rigs shin tu spyad do zhes pa'o //
T02D2515:322a-13: 'di'i rtog pa zhes pa nag po chen po dang dga' byed dbang phyug gi brtag pa'o //
T02D2515:322a-14: yongs su mthar thug pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa ste /
T02D2515:322a-15: de byin gyis brlab pa'i don du'o //
T02D2515:322a-16: chos thams cad ni rigs thams cad kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2515:322a-18: yongs su mthar thug pa ni nag po chen po
T02D2515:322a-19: dang dga' byed dbang phyug gi sprul pa ston par
T02D2515:322a-20: byed pa'o // de kho na tshad mas gnod pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'o //
T02D2515:322a-21: ji ltar 'byung po mtha' med par shes par bya
T02D2515:322a-22: bar rtogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2515:322a-23: pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2515:322a-25: thams cad mkhyen pas gzhal du med pa nyid do //
T02D2515:322a-26: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa dang /
T02D2515:322a-27: gcig pa dang yongs su mthar thug pa nyid kyis
T02D2515:322a-28: dbang phyug dang yon tan byed pa thams cad mu
T02D2515:322a-29: med pa dang gcig pa dang mthar phyin pa de
T02D2515:322a-30: nyid de / yongs su mthar thug pa dang shin
T02D2515:322a-31: tu mthar thug pa dang yongs su zad pa med
T02D2515:322a-32: do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D2515:322a-33: de ni zhes pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa la 'jug pa'i'o //
T02D2515:322a-34: mthar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mthar
T02D2515:322a-35: phyin pa ste yongs su rdzogs pa la gnas pa
T02D2515:322a-37: sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol nas zhes
T02D2515:322a-38: pa sgrib pa ma lus pa yongs su zad pas
T02D2515:322a-39: so // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ces
T02D2515:322a-40: bya ba la sogs pas ming po gsum gyi dkyil
T02D2515:322a-41: 'khor gyi don yongs su bstan pa gsungs pa de
T02D2515:322b-0: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi @322b gsang ba'i chos
T02D2515:322b-1: nyid ni ming po gsum gyi chos rnams so //
T02D2515:322b-2: chos thams cad mi kho na ste ming po'o //
T02D2515:322b-3: de rnams kyi spros pa ni phyag rgya dang dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par rtog pa'o //
T02D2515:322b-4: de'i spros pa med pa ni gnyis su med pa'i
T02D2515:322b-5: ye shes lhag par rtogs pa nyid kyis rnam par
T02D2515:322b-6: rtog pa thams cad bral ba'i phyir ro zhes pa
T02D2515:322b-8: bde ba chen po'i rdo rje ni rnam par snang
T02D2515:322b-9: mdzad chen po ste de kho na don dam pa'i
T02D2515:322b-10: dam tshig ste ming po gsum bskyed pa'i dam tshig
T02D2515:322b-11: rgyur gyur pa de la de skad cas bya'o //
T02D2515:322b-12: rdo rje ni de kho na ming po gsum po
T02D2515:322b-13: de rnams kyi chos nyid ni rdo rje'i chos nyid
T02D2515:322b-14: 'bras bu thams cad kyi thog ma nyid do //
T02D2515:322b-15: mnyam pa nyid du yod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo ste //
T02D2515:322b-16: de la de bzhin du gsungs so //
T02D2515:322b-17: 'dod chags chen po ni snying rje chen po ste /
T02D2515:322b-18: de'i mchog tu grub pa ni mchog nyid do //
T02D2515:322b-19: byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi zhes pa
T02D2515:322b-20: ni byang chub chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sems dpa'
T02D2515:322b-21: rnams kyi'o // bde ba chen po mchog tu grub
T02D2515:322b-22: par 'jug par 'gyur ro ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2515:322b-23: chen po nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:322b-24: de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog
T02D2515:322b-25: tu grub pa 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i bdag
T02D2515:322b-26: nyid can tshangs pas sprul pa'i don du 'jug par
T02D2515:322b-27: 'gyur ro // de yang bdud chen po thams cad
T02D2515:322b-28: rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub pas khro ba
T02D2515:322b-29: rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin dbang phyug chen po
T02D2515:322b-31: de yang 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug ste /
T02D2515:322b-32: bdag po mchog tu grub pas gti mug rnam par
T02D2515:322b-33: dag pa ni rang bzhin khyab 'jug gi phyir 'jug
T02D2515:322b-34: par 'gyur ro // de 'ang rim pa las ma
T02D2515:322b-35: lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams
T02D2515:322b-36: yongs su skyob pa sems can thams cad la phan
T02D2515:322b-37: pa dang bde ba'i mchog shin tu mthar thug pa
T02D2515:322b-38: bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'jug par
T02D2515:322b-39: par 'gyur ro // 'gyur ro // de rgyu ci'i
T02D2515:322b-40: phyir zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas sring
T02D2515:322b-41: mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi don nye bar bstan pa gsungs
T02D2515:322b-43: gi phyir mkhas mchog de lta bu ji srid 'khor
T02D2515:322b-44: ba'i gnas su gnas pa de mi gnas pa'i mya
T02D2515:322b-45: ngan las 'das pas gnas par gyur pa de srid
T02D2515:323a-0: @323a * // sems can gyi don mnyam med de
T02D2515:323a-1: phul du byung ba mya ngan las mi 'da' bar
T02D2515:323a-3: de'i phyir sring mo sprul pa rnams kyis kyang sems
T02D2515:323a-4: can gyi khams yongs su skyob pa la sogs pa
T02D2515:323a-5: byed do // de kho na yongs su gsal bar
T02D2515:323a-6: byed pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2515:323a-7: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:323a-8: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na
T02D2515:323a-9: thabs dang ye shes te de'i byin gyi rlabs des
T02D2515:323a-10: sring mo rnams 'grub ste las rnams thams cad rnam
T02D2515:323a-11: dag pa ni sems can thams cad kyi las yongs
T02D2515:323a-12: su spyod pa'i sgo ba yis srid bdag par 'gyur
T02D2515:323a-13: ro // 'jig rten pa'i sring mo lta bu zhes pa ni ma yin no zhes so //
T02D2515:323a-14: gal te de lta bu dngos las 'dod chags la
T02D2515:323a-15: sogs pa nyid kyis ci ltar sems can 'dul bar
T02D2515:323a-16: 'gyur zhe na chags sogs zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D2515:323a-17: gsungs pa / dul bar byed pa zhes pa 'dul
T02D2515:323a-18: ba ste 'dod chags la sogs pas 'dul ba'i 'jig
T02D2515:323a-19: rten ni gang las kun nas srid par te 'khor
T02D2515:323a-20: bar sdig pa byed par 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
T02D2515:323a-21: de rnams rnam par sbyang ba'i don du srid mo'i gzugs kyis 'dul bar byed do //
T02D2515:323a-22: rang nyid ni bdag kho na ste mkhas mchog ces sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2515:323a-23: de lta mod kyi bud med sprul pas kyang mchog tu 'dug par byed do zhes /
T02D2515:323a-24: ji ltar padma zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:323a-25: ji ltar shin tu dmar pa'i padma tshon gyi nyes pas gos par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:323a-26: de bzhin du 'gro ba la phan pa rnams bud
T02D2515:323a-27: med la sogs pa sprul pas de la phan pa
T02D2515:323a-28: rnams 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa la srid
T02D2515:323a-29: pa'i bag chags kyi skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur
T02D2515:323a-30: ro zhes pa'o // gang gi phyir de lta bu
T02D2515:323a-31: yin pa de'i phyir sring mo sprul par byad do
T02D2515:323a-32: zhes dkyus kyi don nye bar bstan pa 'dod chags
T02D2515:323a-33: chen po zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa tshig
T02D2515:323a-34: bzhi po yang srid mo bzhi po 'di dag gi
T02D2515:323a-35: sgo nas rim pa bzhin sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D2515:323a-36: aom bo dhi tsitta badzra zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D2515:323a-37: ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig
T02D2515:323a-38: nyi shu rtsa lnga po rnams kyi rim pas de
T02D2515:323a-39: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i
T02D2515:323a-40: sems skyed par byed pa dang /
T02D2515:323b-0: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs par byed pa @323b dang //
T02D2515:323b-1: sems can thams cad kyi don dang 'pho ba dang skye ba'i sa dang /
T02D2515:323b-2: gzhon nu rtse ba kun du ston pa dang /
T02D2515:323b-4: bya dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /
T02D2515:323b-5: byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /
T02D2515:323b-6: bdud thams cad btul ba dang /
T02D2515:323b-7: byang chub chen por mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
T02D2515:323b-8: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T02D2515:323b-9: mu stegs thams cad tshar gcod pa dang /
T02D2515:323b-10: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang lha las babs pa dang /
T02D2515:323b-11: 'dus pa chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2515:323b-12: gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba dang /
T02D2515:323b-13: 'dul ba la so sor 'jog pa dang /
T02D2515:323b-14: ngan 'gro thams cad gdon pa dang /
T02D2515:323b-15: mdo sde thams cad kyi mthar thug par gsungs pa dang /
T02D2515:323b-16: rtog pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
T02D2515:323b-17: dngos grub thams cad rab tu stsol ba dang /
T02D2515:323b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D2515:323b-19: dang thugs so sor thob pa rnam par 'byed pa'i
T02D2515:323b-20: sgrub thabs so zhes gsal bar byed do //
T02D2515:323b-21: shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yang
T02D2515:323b-22: 'di rnams kyi nye bar sbyor ba'o zhes rtogs pa'o
T02D2515:323b-23: // las kyi sgrib pa dang ldan pa yang sngags
T02D2515:323b-24: sgrub pa la rang gi phyag rgya sdig pa dral
T02D2515:323b-25: bar byed pa'i sngags dang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o
T02D2515:323b-26: // // sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so //
T02D2515:323b-27: chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang du byas nas bcom
T02D2515:323b-28: ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa
T02D2515:323b-29: / 'khor los sgyur ba chen po bzhi po rnams
T02D2515:323b-30: kyi ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2515:323b-31: aa yig la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyis so
T02D2515:323b-32: / // snying po gnyis pa ni 'dir gtsug tor rgyal po'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2515:323b-33: de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang tha mi dad par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2515:323b-34: gdugs dkar po la sogs pa yang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D2515:323b-35: gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes pa
T02D2515:323b-36: ni de kho na nyid du yang 'di rnams de'i
T02D2515:323b-37: skyed pa po las 'das par khong du chud par
T02D2515:323b-38: bya'o // dgos pa ni de rnams rgyun du sngags
T02D2515:323b-39: pas ji lta ba bzhin mngon par rdzogs par byang
T02D2515:323b-40: chub pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin
T02D2515:323b-41: gshegs pas yongs su bskor te /
T02D2515:324a-1: khang pa brtsegs par byon nas 'di rnams kyi snying
T02D2515:324a-2: po'i don snang bas so so rang rang gi thugs
T02D2515:324a-4: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i
T02D2515:324a-5: bdag nyid can rang gi thugs ka'i rdo rje rnams
T02D2515:324a-7: de nas 'od zer de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i phra rab kyi bdag nyid phyung ste /
T02D2515:324a-8: spro zhing bsdus nas slar yang thugs kar dgug pa
T02D2515:324a-9: la sogs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gyur pa
T02D2515:324a-10: yang phyung ste / phyi rol du ji lta ba
T02D2515:324a-11: rang gi lha'i phyag rgya'i gzugs kyis rang gi gnas
T02D2515:324a-12: rnams su nges par dgod par bya'o //
T02D2515:324a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor ni /
T02D2515:324a-14: chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor te de'i bkod pa
T02D2515:324a-15: ni de ji lta bu bzhin du gsungs pa'i snying
T02D2515:324a-16: po'i don mngon du byed pa las byin gyis brlabs
T02D2515:324a-17: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la de
T02D2515:324a-19: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ste mngon du mdzad nas so //
T02D2515:324a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ni dkyil 'khor te de'i 'byung gnas so /
T02D2515:324a-21: gang gi phyir rdo rje snying po'i spyan sngar gsungs pa'i snying po yin pa'i phyir te /
T02D2515:324a-23: de nyid ni phyin gyis rlob pa'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis su med pa ;
T02D2515:324a-24: chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig pa la sogs pa
T02D2515:324a-25: de lta bu la dmigs pa gang yin pa de
T02D2515:324a-27: de la snyoms par zhugs pa ste mngon sum du mdzad nas so //
T02D2515:324a-28: phyi rol dkyil 'khor zhes pa snying po'i dkyil 'khor la ltos nas so //
T02D2515:324a-29: de'i 'am zhes pa dbang chen gyi phyi'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi khor yug de'i'o //
T02D2515:324a-30: bdud rtsi 'od ces pa dkar po'o //
T02D2515:324a-31: bskor ba zhes pa zlum por bya'o //
T02D2515:324a-32: de ltar gyi sgras bskor bar bya zhes pa gzhan la bsgre bar bya'o //
T02D2515:324a-33: 'khor lo ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor te de
T02D2515:324a-34: 'drab mtshungs pa ste gru bzhi ba nyid la sogs
T02D2515:324a-35: pa'i tshul ni 'khor lo 'ang bar ro //
T02D2515:324a-36: rdo rje'i thig gis yongs su bskor ba ni rdo rje'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D2515:324a-37: de bzhin du 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis zhes pa zlum pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis so //
T02D2515:324a-38: nang gi dkyil 'khor zhes pa bdun par rig par
T02D2515:324b-0: byed de dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor @324b la'o zhes
T02D2515:324b-1: pa'i don no // mnyam zhes pa gru bzhi pa la sogs pas mtshungs pa'o //
T02D2515:324b-2: rdo rje 'khor los rnam par brgyan //
T02D2515:324b-3: zhes pa rdo rje'i thig gis yongs su bskor ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyis spras pa'o //
T02D2515:324b-4: yang na ni 'khor lo 'dra bar zhes pa zlum po'o //
T02D2515:324b-5: rdo rje'i thig gis yongs su bskor ba de bzhin du 'khor lo'i phreng bas yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D2515:324b-6: de ltar 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis pa zlum pa'i dkyil 'khor gnyis so //
T02D2515:324b-7: nang gi dkyil 'khor zhes pa sngar brjod pa'i gru bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:324b-8: de bzhin du snying po'i 'khor lo gnyis pa la
T02D2515:324b-9: chu zhes de ji srid du rdo rje 'khor los
T02D2515:324b-10: rnam par brgyan pa ste snying po'i 'khor los spras
T02D2515:324b-11: pa'o zhes pa ni gzhan no //
T02D2515:324b-12: gru gcig pa zhes pa ni gang 'di'i nang gi
T02D2515:324b-13: dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'dod pa'i dbang chen no
T02D2515:324b-14: // zlum po ni de nas chu'o //
T02D2515:324b-15: de nas kyang gzhan gru gsum gyi rnam pa me'o //
T02D2515:324b-16: de nas ches pha rol du zla ba byed pa dang mtshud [?] pa'i rlung ngo //
T02D2515:324b-17: de nas chos pha rol du yang dkyil 'khor gru gsum gcig pa'o //
T02D2515:324b-18: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed kyis snying po'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D2515:324b-19: de'i tshe tshad kyis gzhan rig par bya'o //
T02D2515:324b-20: padma lo ma brgyad pa la sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D2515:324b-21: de rnams par snang mdzad la sogs pa gzhag par
T02D2515:324b-22: bya'o // dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus nyid du ni
T02D2515:324b-23: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang bdun po rnams
T02D2515:324b-24: bya'o // kyi'o // dam tshig mchog ni sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:324b-25: rim gyi mthar zhes pa shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su g-yas skor gyis so //
T02D2515:324b-26: sems ma rdo rje ma'i mdun du seng ge'i gdan
T02D2515:324b-27: gyi gnas su gang zhig rtsibs brgyad pa dang bcu
T02D2515:324b-28: drug pa cig 'khor los sgyur pa'o //
T02D2515:324b-29: rgyal ba'i gtsug tor la sogs pa me la sogs pa'i phyogs bral rnams su yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D2515:324b-30: sangs rgyas thams cad ni rtag pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2515:324b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyi rim pa'i mthar
T02D2515:324b-32: thug par gtsug tor lnga po rnams so //
T02D2515:324b-33: dkyil 'khor kun du ni rtag pa'i dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D2515:324b-34: rin chen 'byung ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ni ljang gu dang dmar po dang /
T02D2515:325a-0: sngon po'i kha dog can du rim pas @325a * //
T02D2515:325a-2: dang po ni kha dog lnga pa'o //
T02D2515:325a-3: chu la sogs pa ni gser gyi re kh'a gcig pa bri //
T02D2515:325a-4: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni chu'i'o //
T02D2515:325a-5: der ni rnam gzigs la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2515:325a-6: dkyil 'khor kun du ste phyogs bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du'o ;
T02D2515:325a-7: / phyir ni me'i dkyil 'khor du rig par bya'o //
T02D2515:325a-8: 'khor lo'i grva ni legs gnas par //
T02D2515:325a-9: zhes pa ni snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi'o //
T02D2515:325a-10: phyi yi 'khor lo'i grva rnams su //
T02D2515:325a-11: zhes pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi grva rnams su'o //
T02D2515:325a-12: phyi yi dkyil 'khor grva rnams su ;
T02D2515:325a-13: / zhes pa ni de nyid kyi sgo'i grva rnams
T02D2515:325a-14: su mi bskyod pa la sogs pa dang tha dad
T02D2515:325a-15: pa med pa nyid kyi sa la sogs ming ste
T02D2515:325a-16: de kho na nyid kyi rnam par bstan par blta
T02D2515:325a-17: bar bya'o // rnam par snang mdzad dang tha mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir chos kyi dbyings so //
T02D2515:325a-18: sgo skyong ni rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:325a-19: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ru zhes pa ni me lha'i
T02D2515:325a-20: dkyil 'khor la ltos nas gnyis pa ste rlung lha'i
T02D2515:325a-21: dkyil 'khor ro // der shar la sogs pa'i phyogs
T02D2515:325a-22: rnams su rim pas sangs rgyas kyi yum la sogs
T02D2515:325a-24: de nas blo ldan des 'thon nas //
T02D2515:325a-25: zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor lnga pa rnams su khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:325a-26: de nas kyang 'thon nas drug par rang sangs rgyas rnams so //
T02D2515:325a-27: de nas nges par 'thon nas bdun par rgyal ba'i
T02D2515:325a-28: nyan thos rnams dang tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'jig
T02D2515:325a-30: phyi rol gyi zhes pa sgo'i cha la shar la
T02D2515:325a-31: sogs pa'i phyogs su gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes
T02D2515:325a-32: bya ba la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2515:325a-33: de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa zhes bya ba la
T02D2515:325a-34: sogs pa rnams kyi dang po dbang chen gyi dkyil
T02D2515:325a-36: 'gro ba lnga ni khor yug gi nang du'o //
T02D2515:325a-37: rgya mtsho bdun po ni 'og tu bri bar bya'o //
T02D2515:325a-38: rim gyis zhes pa ni lugs ma la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis so //
T02D2515:325a-39: bkod nas ni kun du bzhag nas so //
T02D2515:325a-40: nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyi tshogs zhes pa ni me tog gi rab tu byed pa dang /
T02D2515:325a-41: mar mi la sogs pa thams cad rab tu spyin pas so //
T02D2515:325b-0: @325b mchod pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni nam
T02D2515:325b-1: mkhar gnas pa rnams kyis gcig pa can du byas
T02D2515:325b-2: nas mchod de'o // de nas rgyan mtha' dag la
T02D2515:325b-3: sogs pa rnams kyis rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal
T02D2515:325b-4: 'byor bstan pa gsungs pa nye bar bzhugs te zhes
T02D2515:325b-6: nye bar 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rim pas phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
T02D2515:325b-7: ye shes sems dpa' ji lta ba bzhin mdun du
T02D2515:325b-8: dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas byin gyis brlab
T02D2515:325b-9: pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs so
T02D2515:325b-10: zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas bkug ste dbang bskur nas
T02D2515:325b-11: spro ba dang bsdu ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2515:325b-12: cad kyi phyag rgya chen po de bsgom par bya'o
T02D2515:325b-13: // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par
T02D2515:325b-14: snang mdzad de de dag dang tha mi dang pa
T02D2515:325b-16: de kho na rdo rje sems dpa' ste dbyer mi phyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2515:325b-17: kun du bkang ste zhes pa spros nas dang bsdus nas so //
T02D2515:325b-18: des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu 'bab pas te /
T02D2515:325b-19: yang dag par sdud pa'i rang bzhin gyis rdo rje
T02D2515:325b-20: sems dpa' slar yang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag
T02D2515:325b-21: rgya chen po rang gi lus la mngon par zhugs
T02D2515:325b-22: nas te de bsgoms nas de'i nga rgyal dang ldan
T02D2515:325b-23: pas h'um yig bzhi 'don cing dkyil 'khor du zhugs
T02D2515:325b-24: nas phreng ba phul ba ste lag pa gar bskor
T02D2515:325b-25: bas blangs la h'um yig bzhis de nyid rang gi
T02D2515:325b-26: spyi bor bzhag la g-yas brkyang dang g-yon pa rkang
T02D2515:325b-27: dang mnyam pa dang sa gas phyogs bzhi po rnams

T02D2515:325b-29: // rol pa dang bcas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bya'o //
T02D2515:325b-30: de nas sgo so sor g-yon brkyang gis gnas shing yongs su bskor te /
T02D2515:325b-31: khro bo'i blta pas kun du bltas bas h'um yig
T02D2515:325b-32: bzhi yang dag par bzlas te sgo rnams dbye bar
T02D2515:325b-33: bya'o // slar yang rnam par snang mdzad du gyur nas /
T02D2515:325b-34: ji ltar mngon par 'dus byas pa'i bum pa la
T02D2515:325b-35: aom la sogs pa dang badzra auta kas brgyad lhag
T02D2515:325b-36: pa'i stong rdo rje me tog gi phreng ba nas
T02D2515:325b-37: bzung ste dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rang gi sngags
T02D2515:325b-38: kyang brgyad brgya bzlas par bya ste /

T02D2515:326a-1: pa sgor gnas pa'i bum pa la yang gtso bo'i
T02D2515:326a-2: sngags kyis bzlas nas ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag
T02D2515:326a-3: par bya'o // dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa
T02D2515:326a-4: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis rnam par

T02D2515:326a-8: rang gi snying po a'a: yi ge dang lhan cig
T02D2515:326a-9: tu 'don par shas pa'i nam mkha' thams cad kun

T02D2515:326a-29: lag pa gnyis kha sbyor du byas te ming med

T02D2515:326a-34: phyag rgya 'dis 'bebs pa'i sngags gang yin pa dang rab tu sbyar bar bya'o //

T02D2515:326a-36: pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i mngon par dbang bskur

T02D2515:326a-39: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid rdo rje ste

T02D2515:326b-0: go // @326b rab tu gzhag nas zhes pa ni
T02D2515:326b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdun du na

T02D2515:326b-4: cig tu yang dag par bzlas nas dam tshig gi
T02D2515:326b-5: phyag rgyas slob ma la snying po 'dis dbang bskur
T02D2515:326b-8: badzra karma ai dam che ge mo //
T02D2515:326b-9: aa dhi tishtha sarba ta th'a ga ta a'a ts'a rya sv'a h'a /
T02D2515:326b-10: 'dis lan brgyar spyi bo dang snying ga la sogs
T02D2515:326b-11: par bzhag la rim pas thams cad bzlas par bya'o
T02D2515:326b-12: // yang na ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D2515:326b-13: kyi rdo rje slob dpon ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2515:326b-14: thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon no //
T02D2515:326b-15: de'i go 'phang ni rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2515:326b-16: pa'i mgo bor rdo rje 'chang gi sku gzugs rab
T02D2515:326b-17: tu bzhag nas aom ma h'a su kha zhes pa

T02D2515:326b-39: 'chad par 'gyur ba zhes pa la sogs pas de 'gog par 'gyur te /

T02D2515:326b-43: rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2515:327a-0: gang la spyi bor rdo rje bkod pa sngon du 'gro bas @327a * //
T02D2515:327a-1: chu'i dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'o zhes brjod par bya'o //

T02D2515:327a-3: 'khor gru bzhi pa byas nas zhes bya ba la

T02D2515:327a-5: phyir ro // yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la rang

T02D2515:327a-11: de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2515:327a-12: gsungs pa rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa' ste
T02D2515:327a-13: dbyer mi phyed pa'i ye shas kyi gnas te rgyu'o
T02D2515:327a-14: // ci ltar na rang bzhin gyis dbyer mi phyed
T02D2515:327a-15: pa nyid de rang bzhin rang gi ngo bo gdod
T02D2515:327a-16: ma nas skye ba med pa aa'i yi ge'o //
T02D2515:327a-17: shes rab kyis phung po bshig par byed pas mchog
T02D2515:327a-18: tu phra mo rnams phan tshun rnam par 'dres pa

T02D2515:327a-20: 'di zhes pa mthar gnas par sbyar ro //

T02D2515:327a-40: zhes pa ji srid par ro //

T02D2515:327b-0: 'dod @327b chags kyis 'dod chags rab tu 'joms pa'i don du'o //
T02D2515:327b-1: byams pa mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyis zhes pa ni

T02D2515:327b-3: byams pa'i mtha' mtshungs pa nyid kyis so //

T02D2515:327b-7: bral ba'i rnam pa shes rab kyi rang bzhin snang
T02D2515:327b-8: ba mtshungs pa nyid kyis so //

T02D2515:327b-23: par mnyam pa'o // // rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal

T02D2515:327b-26: par mnyam pa'o // // // sangs rgyas thams cad
T02D2515:327b-27: sangs rgyas su gcig ces pa ni sangs rgyas rnams
T02D2515:327b-28: thams cad 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i stong pa rdul
T02D2515:327b-29: dang bral ba nye bar rtogs pa'i rnam pas sangs
T02D2515:327b-30: rgyas rnams gcig tu mnyam pa nyid do //

T02D2515:327b-32: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa'i don ni
T02D2515:327b-33: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rtogs pa'i don du'o
T02D2515:327b-34: // chos thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten

T02D2515:327b-36: dmigs pa med cing stong pa dbye ba dang bral
T02D2515:327b-37: ba'i rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams te stobs
T02D2515:327b-38: dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams mnyam pa'o
T02D2515:327b-39: // // thams cad du ye shes rjes su rtogs pa ste thob pa'i ched dang /
T02D2515:327b-40: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rtogs pa'i don
T02D2515:327b-41: ni rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das

T02D2515:328a-22: dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi

T02D2515:328a-25: chos thams cad ni 'gog pa med pa'i don ni
T02D2515:328a-26: sems can thams cad kyi don chad pa med pa'i
T02D2515:328a-27: don no // 'di la rnam gnas zhes pa 'dis
T02D2515:328a-28: byin gyis brlabs pa'i sa bon rang gi snying ga'i
T02D2515:328a-29: mtshan ma la gnas nas ji lta ba bzhin du

T02D2515:328b-39: pa'i bden pa ni don dam pa'i rang bzhin gyi
T02D2515:328b-40: sems las byung ba'i rang gi ngo bo nyid du
T02D2515:328b-41: brjod de // sa yig ni de'i sgo'o //
T02D2515:328b-42: de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba ni gang zag la bdag med par rtogs pa'o //
T02D2515:329a-1: kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni chos kyi bdag med pa rtogs pa'o //
T02D2515:329a-2: de nges par ston par byed pa la na yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329a-3: las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par bral ba ni las kyi 'bras bu las 'das pa'o //
T02D2515:329a-4: de gsal bar byed pa la ka yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329a-5: zab mo gting dpag dka' ba nyid de rim pa bzhin phyi rol pa dang /
T02D2515:329a-6: nyan thos la sogs pa rnams nam mkha' lta bu
T02D2515:329a-7: nyid dang nam mkha'i rang bzhin nyid de gsal bar
T02D2515:329a-9: dza'i bshad pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2515:329a-10: chos kyi dbyings kun du mi phyed pa de bzhin nyid do //
T02D2515:329a-11: chos rnams thams cad ni gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'o //
T02D2515:329a-13: yongs su rdzogs pa ni dbye ba byar med pa'i shes rab la 'jug par byed pa'o //
T02D2515:329a-14: de ston par byed pa la dha yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329a-15: zhi gnas ni ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D2515:329a-16: lhag mthong ni shes rab bo //
T02D2515:329a-17: de yongs su rdzogs pa rab tu gsal bar byed pa la sha yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329a-18: nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
T02D2515:329a-19: ba nyid ni gang zag la bdag med pa gsal
T02D2515:329a-20: bar byed pa la kha yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329a-21: 'gyur ba med pa ma skyes pa can mi zad
T02D2515:329a-22: pa'i ye shes chos thams cad yongs su dag pa'i
T02D2515:329a-23: don rab tu gsal bar byed pa la ksha yig
T02D2515:329a-24: sgor 'gyur ro // thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D2515:329a-25: thogs pa med pa ni rnam par rtog pa thams
T02D2515:329a-26: cad dang bral ba ste de ston par byed pa
T02D2515:329a-28: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i
T02D2515:329a-29: don du gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas
T02D2515:329a-30: pa ston par byed pa la tha yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329a-31: mthar phyin pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'gog pa'o
T02D2515:329a-32: zhes pa ji srid du de'i mur thug pa med
T02D2515:329a-33: pa ni chos rnams kyi mu med pa'o //
T02D2515:329a-34: sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pa ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gog pa'o //
T02D2515:329a-35: zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes ni byang chub kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2515:329a-36: da yig ni mthar phyin cing mur thug pa med pa sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sgo'o //
T02D2515:329a-37: dri ma'i rnam pa ni dri ma dang bral ba can ma yin pa ste /
T02D2515:329a-38: de nye bar mi dmigs pa ston par byed pa la dzha yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329b-0: 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs @329b par rab
T02D2515:329b-1: tu ston pa ma lus rnam par 'byed par brjod
T02D2515:329b-2: par bya ba la ka yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329b-3: aam yig ni sems rnam par 'byed pa'i don te
T02D2515:329b-4: 'dul bar bya ba gang yin pa'i zhe sdang dang
T02D2515:329b-5: gti mug dag dang bag la nyal rab tu spangs
T02D2515:329b-6: pa / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni smon
T02D2515:329b-7: pa'i mtshan nyid can rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba
T02D2515:329b-8: pa / nyid kyang / sgrib pa thams cad dang
T02D2515:329b-9: bral ba'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin rab tu gsal
T02D2515:329b-11: ngag gi spros pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag
T02D2515:329b-12: par ston par byed pa la ngag khong du chud
T02D2515:329b-13: pa'i ngag can pa yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329b-14: tsha yig gi bshad pa ni go sla'o //
T02D2515:329b-15: gcig tu 'dus pa ma dmigs pa ni gzhan gyis
T02D2515:329b-16: yongs su brtags pa'i cha shas gzugs la sogs pa
T02D2515:329b-18: gnyis su med pa nyid ni gzung ba dang /
T02D2515:329b-20: de dag gnyis ka ston pa la gha yig sgo'o ;
T02D2515:329b-21: / ca co dang bral ba nyid ni dril bu'i sgra rjes su 'gro ba'o //
T02D2515:329b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' 'dzin pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'dzin pa ste /
T02D2515:329b-23: 'di dag gnyis ka'i khyad par gyi snod la ta yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329b-24: gsang ba'i ye shes ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2515:329b-26: 'tshe ba ni gzhan gyi 'khor la nye bar 'tshe
T02D2515:329b-27: ba ste de dang bral ba rab tu gsal ba
T02D2515:329b-28: dang / nam mkha'i dngos grub so sor thob pa'i don du da yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329b-29: grang ba ni kha ba la sogs pa phra mo ste /
T02D2515:329b-30: de nye bar ma dmigs pa ston par byed pa la ni kha yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329b-31: rab tu 'byams pa ma yin par 'gog pa de
T02D2515:329b-32: rnam par gzhag par byed pa la nye bar zhi
T02D2515:329b-33: bar brjod pa can gyi au yig sgo'o //
T02D2515:329b-34: tshul bzhin du gzhag pa ni de'i ngag can la
T02D2515:329b-35: nges par 'byung ba la sogs par byed pa la
T02D2515:329b-36: sgo'o // ya yig ni de kho na nyid ni
T02D2515:329b-37: de bzhin nyid kyi ngag can te spros pa spangs
T02D2515:329b-38: pa ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral
T02D2515:329b-39: ba ste don de rnam par gzhag pa'i rgyur ta
T02D2515:329b-40: sgo'o // yig sgo'o // aa yig ni ma skyes pa gsal bar byed pa ste /
T02D2515:329b-41: rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa la sgo'o //
T02D2515:330a-0: hr'i yig ni yongs su gzung pa med pa'i ngag can te @330a * //
T02D2515:330a-1: 'thab pa dang rtsod pa spangs pa ston pa la sgo'o //
T02D2515:330a-2: ka sde ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i
T02D2515:330a-3: ngag can te rnam par dag pa mtshan nyid ston
T02D2515:330a-5: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de bzung nas gnas pa gsal bar byed pa tsa ste yang sgo'o //
T02D2515:330a-6: ta sde ni snang ba zhes pa ste rab tu gsal ba ste /
T02D2515:330a-7: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyid 'bar bar byed

T02D2515:330a-14: bya'o // sgo'o // sgo'o // mthar gnas kyi sde
T02D2515:330a-15: pa ni byang chub kyi don dri ma med pa
T02D2515:330a-16: ston par byed pa la ste /
T02D2515:330a-17: dri ma med pa gsal bar byed pa la sgo'o //
T02D2515:330a-18: sa la sogs pa'i sde pa ni mya ngan las
T02D2515:330a-19: 'das pa'i glo bur ba nges par 'dor ba la
T02D2515:330a-20: sogs pa ston pa la sgo'o //
T02D2515:330a-21: aom bam zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis chos
T02D2515:330a-22: kyi yi ge rnams rnam par rig pa'i sgo'o zhes
T02D2515:330a-23: pa la sogs pa de kho na nyid rtogs pa

T02D2515:330a-26: ye shes rnam par dag pa kho na rnam par
T02D2515:330a-27: ste / phye ba'o // chos kyi sku rnam par
T02D2515:330a-28: nges pa ni chos brjod pa thabs rnam par 'byed
T02D2515:330a-29: ste / phye ba'o // pa'o // 'di ni gtso
T02D2515:330a-30: bo'i dkyil 'khor ba dang bcas pa'i thun mong gi
T02D2515:330a-31: cho ga chos ngag gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2515:330a-33: de rnam par nges pa ni ye shes so //
T02D2515:330a-34: sems kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa de dag bstan pa
T02D2515:330a-35: de la rigs thams cad kyi zhes bya ba la
T02D2515:330a-37: rnal 'byor gnas ni dbang po gnyis kyi snyoms par
T02D2515:330a-38: 'jug pa yongs su rdzogs pa nyid kyang sku'i phyag
T02D2515:330a-39: rgya'i sgrub thabs dang thun mong pa yang ngo //
T02D2515:330a-40: sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2515:330a-41: shin tu 'od gsal gyi dkyil 'khor la ni snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2515:330a-42: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis zhes pa ni de la
T02D2515:330a-43: rdo rje sgom par byed pas mi bskyod pa'i rnal
T02D2515:330b-0: de'i rnal 'byor chen @330b po de lta bu kho na rdo rje sgom par byed pa rnams so //
T02D2515:330b-1: bsgom par bya zhes pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rin chen kun mngon du bya'o //
T02D2515:330b-2: yongs su bsgoms nas zhes bya ba ni lhag par mos pa'o //
T02D2515:330b-3: mthong zhes bya ba ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i padma bsgom pa'o //
T02D2515:330b-4: dag pa zhes bya ba ni 'od dpag med do //
T02D2515:330b-5: phyag rgya thams cad ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2515:330b-6: sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba zhes pa ni snying
T02D2515:330b-7: gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i sna tshogs
T02D2515:330b-8: rdo rje la sprul pa sna tshogs pa sems can
T02D2515:330b-9: ma lus pa'i don la lhag par mos pa'o //
T02D2515:330b-10: sna tshogs las byed pa ni don yod pa'i dbang phyug go //
T02D2515:330b-11: rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis zhes pa ni zla ba
T02D2515:330b-12: la gnas pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
T02D2515:330b-13: bsgom pa'o // rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba ni nyi ma la brjod do //
T02D2515:330b-14: nus pa nges par bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:330b-15: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che //
T02D2515:330b-16: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:330b-17: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis zhes bya ba ni snying
T02D2515:330b-18: gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje
T02D2515:330b-19: bsgom mo // de ltar rgyal po la sogs pa
T02D2515:330b-20: rnams kyi yang ji lta ba bzhin du rang bzhin
T02D2515:330b-21: du rang gi snying gar zla ba lag nas pa'i
T02D2515:330b-22: mtshan ma bsgom par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2515:330b-23: 'di dag kun gyi zhes pa ni sku la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i sgrub thabs so //
T02D2515:330b-24: rab sbyor gyis zhes pa dang rang gi sku'i phyag
T02D2515:330b-25: rgya sgrub pa'i don can du byas pa'i rang gi
T02D2515:330b-26: lha'i rnal 'byor ji skad gsungs pa'i gdan la gnas
T02D2515:330b-27: nas yig rtse gcig tu gyur pas bsgrub par bya'o
T02D2515:330b-29: chos kyi yi ge'i tshig gis ni //
T02D2515:330b-30: zhes pa dag gi phyag rgya'i dngos grub ni lce'i
T02D2515:330b-31: rtse mo'i 'dab ma la rdo rje mdzes pa bsgom
T02D2515:330b-32: pa sngon du 'gro ba can gyi snying ga'i zla
T02D2515:330b-33: ba la ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi aom
T02D2515:330b-34: bam la sogs pa'i chos kyi yi ge rnams rnam
T02D2515:330b-35: par bkod la rnam par rig pa'i sgo zhes bya
T02D2515:330b-36: ba la sogs pa'i de kho na nyid bsgom par
T02D2515:330b-38: phyag rgya'i ye shes legs sbyor bas //
T02D2515:330b-39: zhes bya ba ni sems kyi phyag rgya bsgom pa'i
T02D2515:330b-40: don can rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la ji
T02D2515:331a-1: bzhin du rang gi mtshan ma bsgom par bya'o zhes pa 'dis so //
T02D2515:331a-2: 'di rnams kyi zhes pa sku la sogs pa rnams
T02D2515:331a-3: kyi sgrub thabs kyi rab tu sbyor ba bdun po
T02D2515:331a-5: phyag rgya'i 'khor lo khyad par du //
T02D2515:331a-7: sku'i phyag rgya'i tshogs su shes par bya'o //
T02D2515:331a-8: de nyid kyi rab tu sbyor ba bstan pa gsungs pa //
T02D2515:331a-9: yi ge zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:331a-10: de gsung par byed pa sku la sogs pa'i phyag
T02D2515:331a-11: rgya bsgrub par bya ba'i don du rang gi sngags
T02D2515:331a-12: kyi yi ge rnams kyis snying ga la sogs pa
T02D2515:331a-13: rnams su yongs su gang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya byas
T02D2515:331a-14: nas phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub bar bya'o zhes so
T02D2515:331a-15: // las kyi sgrub thabs nye bar bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:331a-16: bsam gtan gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:331a-17: bsam gtan gyis ni sgom par byed pa rnams kyis so //
T02D2515:331a-18: thig le gcig ni yi ge gcig ste dbang chen gyi sa bon no //
T02D2515:331a-19: des gyur ba ste yongs su rdzogs pa 'di'i go 'phang ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:331a-20: de nyid bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:331a-21: sa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:331a-22: sa la rab gnas kyang dkyil 'khor grub bzhi pa la gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:331a-23: go 'phang ni gnas te de la gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:331a-24: dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba ni rang dang
T02D2515:331a-25: lha gnyis sgom par byed pas dbang phyug kyang ni
T02D2515:331a-26: bsgrub par bya'o // dbang chen gyi las ni rgyas pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D2515:331a-27: dang po'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni //
T02D2515:331a-28: zhes pa dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor tshul gyis rang
T02D2515:331a-29: gi sa bon gang yin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i
T02D2515:331a-30: dkyil 'khor ro // dbang po gnyis snyoms par zhugs pa'i yang mtha' mar rab tu brtag ste /
T02D2515:331a-31: 'khor lo lag tu bsam par bya'o //
T02D2515:331a-32: dang po zhes pa ni dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D2515:331a-33: padma dang rin po che la sogs pa yang ji
T02D2515:331a-34: lta ba bzhin sum mdo ris la sogs pa rnams
T02D2515:331a-36: las kyi rnal 'byor gyis zhes pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje rnam par gzhag pas so //
T02D2515:331a-37: las 'di rnams kyang de nyid bsgoms pas ches myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:331b-0: phyag rgya ye shes @331b bstan pa'i ched du nye bar bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:331b-1: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:331b-2: rnam par grol ba ni sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
T02D2515:331b-3: de kho na phyag rgya che zhes ba thams cad
T02D2515:331b-4: du rgyas btab cing bsdus pa rtogs par byed pa
T02D2515:331b-5: ste / de'i rgyas btab pa ni mchan pa'o ;
T02D2515:331b-6: / chos thams cad ni 'phags pa dang so so'i
T02D2515:331b-7: skye bo'i rgyud kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i
T02D2515:331b-8: rang bzhin no // gang gi phyir gnyis dang gnyis
T02D2515:331b-9: su med pa'i gnas skabs ni yongs su dag pa
T02D2515:331b-10: ni rnam par grol ba'i lus so zhes pa ji
T02D2515:331b-11: rang bzhin no // srid pa'o // mtha' dang mtha'
T02D2515:331b-12: med pa ni chad pa dang rtag pa'i rnam par
T02D2515:331b-13: rang bzhin no // srid pa'o // rtog pa'o // mtha' las 'das pa ni mtha' med pa'o //
T02D2515:331b-14: de'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D2515:331b-15: gang la gang gi phyir zhe na dag pa dang
T02D2515:331b-16: ma dag pa'i gnas skabs chad pa dang rtag pa
T02D2515:331b-18: don dam par de dag stong pa'o //
T02D2515:331b-19: zad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba ni phung bo dang nyon mongs pa 'gag pa'o //
T02D2515:331b-20: de'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D2515:331b-21: gang gi phyir na zad pa'i sgo ni skye ba'i gnas skabs so //
T02D2515:331b-22: zad pa'i mtha' ni gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:331b-23: zad pa'i mur thug pa ni mthar thug pa'o //
T02D2515:331b-24: skur ba 'debs pa med pa ni smod pa med pa'o /
T02D2515:331b-25: gang zag dang chos brtags ba tsam nyid kyis sde de'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D2515:331b-26: gang gi phyir mnyam pa nyid kyang rnam par dag
T02D2515:331b-27: pa ni de dag gnyis stong pa nyid kyi rang
T02D2515:331b-28: bzhin no // chos thams cad gang yin pa de
T02D2515:331b-29: don dam pa nyid du nam mkha' bzhin du spyan
T02D2515:331b-30: lnga'i lam las yang ngag par 'das pa'i phyir nam
T02D2515:331b-31: mkha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D2515:331b-32: sems can thams cad nam mkha'i khams nyid kyi phyir
T02D2515:331b-33: zhes pa ni don dam par na sems can thams
T02D2515:331b-34: cad nam mkha'i khams kyi rang bzhin yin pa nyid
T02D2515:331b-35: kyi phyir ro // dbyer mi phyed pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2515:331b-36: gyi chos kyi dbang dbyings su yang dag par 'du
T02D2515:331b-37: ba ni rjes su zhugs pa'o //
T02D2515:331b-38: de la dbyer med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D2515:331b-39: byang chub kyi rang bzhin gyis sems ni byang chub
T02D2515:331b-40: kyi sems te gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so
T02D2515:331b-41: // de'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D2515:332a-0: gang las she na byang chub kyi sems dang tha @332a * //
T02D2515:332a-1: mi dad pa nyid kyi phyir te /

T02D2515:332a-3: su yang chos rnams kyis lhag par kun du 'dres

T02D2515:332a-5: nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes ba ni rdzogs pa'i gnas

T02D2515:335a-23: skyes pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa la sogs pa 'khrungs pa'o //
T02D2515:335a-24: thal mo brtan par bsdams pa ni //
T02D2515:335a-25: zhes pa ni mnyam pa'i thal mo'o //
T02D2515:335a-26: me tog kha 'bus pa'i tshul zhes pa ni me tog kha 'bus pa'i tshul du'o //
T02D2515:335a-28: sor mo thams cad rab tu brkyang ba ni padma'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D2515:335a-30: rdo rje thal mo ni rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyi'o //
T02D2515:335a-31: de'i phyir rdo rje bsdams pa bkrol te /
T02D2515:335a-32: thal mo bkan pa'i sor mo bkug pa'i rtse mo
T02D2515:335a-33: gnyis su med pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
T02D2515:335a-34: rnams kyi'o // khu tshur nang du bya ba ni
T02D2515:335a-35: gtsug tor rnams kyi sde 'di rams dam tshig gi
T02D2515:335a-36: rnams kyi'o // phyag rgya zhi'o // dam tshig ni
T02D2515:335a-37: zhes pa ni so sor re re 'chad par 'gyur
T02D2515:335a-38: pa'i phyag rgya bcings par bya'i gzhan du yang ma
T02D2515:335a-40: lha'i rnal 'byor la rdo rje thal mo dang /
T02D2515:335a-44: de brtan pa na du byed pa sngon du 'gro
T02D2515:335a-45: bas phyag rgya thams cad 'ching bar 'dod pa nyid
T02D2515:335a-46: kyi phyir / kun gyi rtse mor legs par brtag
T02D2515:335a-47: / ces pa ni gung mo khab bzhin du byas
T02D2515:335a-48: nas sdig mdzub rtse mo gnyis rdo rje rnam par
T02D2515:335b-0: kyi phyir / bskum @335b ste ; cad kyi'o //
T02D2515:335b-1: // gzung bar bya'o // pa'o // rdo rje zhes
T02D2515:335b-2: pa sdigs mdzub rdo rje'i rnam pa nyid du'o //
T02D2515:335b-3: khu tshur snying po ni de nyid gtsug tor gyi rnam pa ni steng 'gro yi'o //
T02D2515:335b-4: mchog ni gung mo dang srin la gnang du bcug
T02D2515:335b-5: pa'i gung mo khab bzhin du byas par brjod par
T02D2515:335b-6: bya'o // lcags kyu 'di yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2515:335b-7: zhes pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa nyid do //
T02D2515:335b-8: gung mo rdo rje rin chen rtse //
T02D2515:335b-9: zhes pa ni grang mo rdo rje dang rtse mo dag rin po cher byas pa'o //
T02D2515:335b-10: rtse mo'i rtse mo rnam par 'joms //
T02D2515:335b-11: zhes pa ni sdigs mdzub gnyis rab tu brkyang ba'o //
T02D2515:335b-12: gnas su nges par sbyar zhes pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa nyid rgyal mtshan ltar gzung ba'o //
T02D2515:335b-13: bzhad pa'i gnas su rab tu sbyar //
T02D2515:335b-14: zhes pa ni de nyid do //
T02D2515:335b-15: ral gri lta bur zhes pa ni gung mo gnyis ral gri ltar bskum pa'o //
T02D2515:335b-16: 'khor lo 'dra zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i rnam pa
T02D2515:335b-17: thams cad du 'khyil bar bsdams pa bkrol nas rab
T02D2515:335b-19: kha ru phye ba zhes pa rdo rje bsdams pa nyid do //
T02D2515:335b-20: gar mtshungs zhes pa ni rdo rje bsdams pa gar gyi tshul gyis spyi por gzung ba'o //
T02D2515:335b-21: sna tshogs rdo rje can zhes pa ni rdo rje mda' 'di nyid las kyi rdo rje ma'i'o //
T02D2515:335b-22: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje sems dpa' dang rdo rje rin chen dang /
T02D2515:335b-24: rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya kho nar blta bar bya'o //
T02D2515:335b-25: chos yongs su sdud pa'i sbyor ba zhes pa ni go cha'i tshul gyis so //
T02D2515:335b-26: mche ba rnam par gtsigs zhes pa ni mthe'u chung
T02D2515:335b-27: dang mthe bong che ba zur gnyis su byas pa'o
T02D2515:335b-28: // khu tshur bcings pa khu tshur gyis //
T02D2515:335b-29: zhes pa ni mthe bong nang du bcug ste mthe'u
T02D2515:335b-30: chung dang ming med kyi rtsa ba'i bar du yang
T02D2515:335b-31: dag par sbyar ba sngon du byas nas sdigs mdzub
T02D2515:335b-32: gnyis kyi mdun dag gis mthe bong gi rgyab tu
T02D2515:335b-33: btsir bar bya'o // 'gyed cing sdud par yang dag gnas //
T02D2515:335b-34: zhes pa ni kha spyor gyi thal mo nyid do //
T02D2515:336a-0: padma'i thal mo ni padma kha zlum pa ltar legs par @336a * //
T02D2515:336a-2: steng du yongs brkyang pa zhes pa ni steng du me long lta bur gzung ba'o //
T02D2515:336a-3: rdo rje 'bebs par rnam par brtag / ces pa ni bkrol ba'o //
T02D2515:336a-4: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas dril bu'i mthar thug pa rnams kyi ni phyag rgya'o //
T02D2515:336a-5: kun du bzang po la sogs pa rnams kyi ni nye ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2515:336a-6: rang gis zhes pa ni rang gi lha gang dang
T02D2515:336a-7: gang yin pa de dang de bdag nyid kyis so
T02D2515:336a-8: // rin po che yi rnam pa bcings //
T02D2515:336a-9: zhes pa ni rin po che ltar mthe bong la sdig mdzub kyi rtse mo lto sbyor ba'o //
T02D2515:336a-10: de nyid ces pa ni kha sbyor gyi thal mo'o //
T02D2515:336a-11: rtse mo'i rtse mo bskum zhes pa ni sdigs mdzub
T02D2515:336a-12: rin po che'i rnam par byas pa ni sems la
T02D2515:336a-13: byams pa bsgom bzhin pa byams pa'i'o //
T02D2515:336a-14: rab bcug nas zhes pa ni kha sbyor gyi nang du sdigs mdzub po //
T02D2515:336a-15: ral gri'i rnam par rab tu brtags pa ni ral gri'i tshul 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2515:336a-16: kha sbyor gyi thal mo nyid gar las ral gri'i
T02D2515:336a-17: rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i tshul ni rnam sel
T02D2515:336a-18: gyi'o // gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2515:336a-19: zhes pa ni padma'i khu tshur dag gis gar byas nas kun du sdud pas so //
T02D2515:336a-20: de nyid ces pa ni padma'i phyag rgya autpala ltar brtags pa ni padma sgrol ba yi ste /
T02D2515:336a-21: padma'i rigs rnams kyis sgrol ba gang yin pa'o zhes pa ni don to //
T02D2515:336a-22: padma'i thal mo nyid sdigs mdzub mche ba'i rnam par
T02D2515:336a-23: bskum ste mthe bong nyid kha dang 'dra bar te
T02D2515:336a-25: 'di ni rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2515:336a-26: rin chen ldan zhes pa ni sdigs mdzub dang mthe bong rin po cher byas pa'o //
T02D2515:336a-27: yid bzhin nor bu 'dzin pa'i tshul //
T02D2515:336a-28: zhes pa ni sdigs mdzub dang mthe bong dag gis rin po che 'dzin pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2515:336a-29: sngar gsungs pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya
T02D2515:336a-30: gar sngon du 'gro bas thugs kar gnas pa ni
T02D2515:336a-32: rdo rje chen po legs par brkyang //
T02D2515:336a-33: zhes pa ni lag pa gnyis phye bar byas nas
T02D2515:336a-34: dbus ma gsum po rdo rjer byas pa'i nang du
T02D2515:336a-35: mthe bong dang mthe'u chung bcug nas lcags sgrog sbrel
T02D2515:336a-36: ba lta bu ni blo gros rgya mtsho'i'o //
T02D2515:336a-37: mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar bar bya //
T02D2515:336a-38: zhes pa ni sdigs mdzub khab ltar du byas pa'o //
T02D2515:336a-39: rdo rje snying po rnams kyis zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis so //
T02D2515:336a-40: shakti'i rnam pa ni zhes pa ni sdigs mdzub rtse
T02D2515:336b-0: mo rtsa ba nas rgyas par bya ba ni @336b
T02D2515:336b-1: autpala'i phyag rgya ste 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi'o //
T02D2515:336b-2: snying po'i khu tshur la gung mo gnyis khab lta
T02D2515:336b-3: bu'i steng gi gzhogs su sdigs mdzub gnyis bskyed nas
T02D2515:336b-4: gzung bar byas pa ni mdung ngo //
T02D2515:336b-5: de nyid gzhogs phan tshun du lto sbyar ba ni mdung chen po'o //
T02D2515:336b-6: phyag rgya gnyis po 'di dag gshin rje mthar byed kyi'o //
T02D2515:336b-7: de nyid ces pa ni sdigs mdzub gnyis pa'o //
T02D2515:336b-8: ral gri'i tshul las zhes pa khab bzhin du byas
T02D2515:336b-9: pa la yang dag par sbyar ba ral gri ltar
T02D2515:336b-10: gzung bar bya'o // snying po'i khu tshur la sdigs
T02D2515:336b-11: mdzub gcig yang dag par bskum pa ni nye ba'i
T02D2515:336b-12: gzung bar bya'o // skra can ma'i'o // rdo rje

T02D2515:336b-25: gzung bar bya'o // skra can ma'i'o // rje'i'o //

T02D2515:336b-28: lag gnyis legs par brkyang bar bya //

T02D2515:336b-33: sdigs mdzub kyi tshigs par ma bcag pa'i lto la
T02D2515:336b-34: mthe bong gi lto dag mig gi tshul gyis sbyar

T02D2515:336b-36: pa'i byin pa bkod pa ni bkra shis kyi gdan
T02D2515:336b-37: bar bya'o // no // 'di dag de bzhin gshegs
T02D2515:336b-38: pa rnams las gzhan pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya
T02D2515:336b-39: ste lus kyi sgo nas so //
T02D2515:336b-40: sems kyi sgo nas ni sngon bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02D2515:336b-41: phyag rgya chen po ni de rnams kyi rdo rje skyil krung nyid do //
T02D2515:336b-42: las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba'i byang chub mchog la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:336b-43: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs rnams kyi ni bsgyings
T02D2515:336b-44: bcas gsor gnyis ka'i zhes pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D2515:336b-45: so // sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang lcags
T02D2515:336b-46: kyu la sogs pa bzhi po rnams kyi rdo rje

T02D2515:336b-48: par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

T02D2515:337a-4: bas bcing ngo // las kyi phyag rgya'i rnam pa
T02D2515:337a-5: ni gdan zhes pa rang lha'i gdan ji lta ba
T02D2515:337a-6: bas bcing ngo // la'o // sangs rgyas kun gyi
