T02D2515:337a-8: rgyal gyi lha rnam pas so //
T02D2515:337a-9: bdag ces pa ni rang nyid kyis 'ching bar bya'o //
T02D2515:337a-10: 'ching du gzhug ces pa gzhan rnams kyis so //
T02D2515:337a-11: mthe'u chung mthe bong nges par bcing //
T02D2515:337a-12: zhes pa ni mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan pa can no //
T02D2515:337a-13: 'di nyid lag pa g-yas pa las skyes pa las dbang po'i'o //
T02D2515:337a-14: de nyid ces pa ni sdigs mdzub dang mthe bong dag go //
T02D2515:337a-15: sor mo gnyis ni bsgreng ba zhes pa ni sdigs mdzub dang gung mo gnyis las skyes pa'o //
T02D2515:337a-16: sdigs mdzub dang mthe bong dag gis mchod phyir thogs kyi tshul ni tshangs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2515:337a-17: dbang ldan gyi gsal shing gi phyag rgya nyid ni drag po'i'o //
T02D2515:337a-18: de nyid bar ma gsum pa tti ba'i rnam pa rab tu brkyang ba ni bgrod dka' ma'i'o //
T02D2515:337a-19: sor mo thams cad khar sna'i rnam par dbyangs pa ni tshogs bdag gi'o //
T02D2515:337a-20: dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bya ba'o //
T02D2515:337a-21: yang lag pa gnyis kyis 'od zer rab tu ston par byed pa ni nyi ma'i'o //
T02D2515:337a-22: 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul ni thams cad kyi'o //
T02D2515:337a-23: glu len pa'i tshul gyis khar lag pa g-yo bar bya'o //
T02D2515:337a-24: gdengs ka'i tshul zhes pa mthe bong gnyis phan tshun
T02D2515:337a-25: bcings nas sor mo lhag ma rnams gdengs ka'i tshul
T02D2515:337a-27: gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2515:337a-28: zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyi rdo rje'i gar
T02D2515:337a-29: sngon du 'gro bas ji skad gsungs pa'i phyag rgya
T02D2515:337a-31: de dag kyang dbyangs sna tshogs par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2515:337a-32: las kyi sbyor ba 'bad pa yi //
T02D2515:337a-33: zhes bya ba ni bya ba'i las la 'bad pa rnams kyi'o ;
T02D2515:337a-34: / de kho na nyid kyi lam la so sor
T02D2515:337a-35: 'dres pa'i sa dor yang phyag rgya 'grub ba po
T02D2515:337a-37: phyag rgya dor nas zhes pa la sogs pa ste da la 'di ni rim pa ste /
T02D2515:337a-38: ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi lha rdzogs pa'i
T02D2515:337a-39: rim pas de'i gzugs kyi bdag nyid du blta ste
T02D2515:337b-0: / dza: h'um bam ho: zhes 'don @337b cing byon
T02D2515:337b-1: pa kho na nang du bkug nas sangs rgyas thams
T02D2515:337b-2: cad mchod pa dang sgo rnams gnas ji lta ba
T02D2515:337b-3: / bzhin du'o // snying gar 'bar ba dang bcas
T02D2515:337b-4: pa'i chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa de la gnas
T02D2515:337b-5: pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i nyi ma'i
T02D2515:337b-6: 'od zer gyi thig le dang bcas pa'i ka la
T02D2515:337b-7: sogs pa de'i steng du 'od zer chen po 'bar
T02D2515:337b-8: ba 'khrugs pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa de'i dbus
T02D2515:337b-9: kyi rtse mor dbyangs aom bskyed do //
T02D2515:337b-10: rnam par rtog med ces bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2515:337b-11: ni nang du a'a: 'am sgra bsgoms nas mig kyang
T02D2515:337b-13: sna'i rtse mor yang de bzhin du h'um yig go //
T02D2515:337b-14: de nas ji skad gsungs pa'i dbyangs aa rang gi
T02D2515:337b-15: sngags kyi yi ge rang 'bar ba'i nang du kun
T02D2515:337b-16: du 'bar ba dbang po thams cad kyis rtogs par
T02D2515:337b-17: bya ba ma yin pa sna tshogs rnam par sbyong
T02D2515:337b-18: ba byon nas rab tu zhugs te nang dang nang

T02D2515:337b-29: rnams gsum po de kho na nyid du stong pa

T02D2515:337b-40: no // pa'o // sgom par byed pa dngos po

T02D2515:337b-42: rnal 'byor ro // par gzhag go // rang bzhin
T02D2515:337b-43: no // pa'o // po med pa'o // de ni

T02D2515:338a-4: ngag dang lus kyi phyag rgya'i tshul du rnam par

T02D2515:338a-6: tshun nyid du mthong ba ma yin pa de srid
T02D2515:338a-7: du lha dang gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi
T02D2515:338a-8: rgyu nyid kyis rnam par gnas so //

T02D2515:338a-18: las bzhengs nas dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2515:338a-19: gyi don du rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i
T02D2515:338a-21: 'dis kyang 'di dag bstan nas te rnam par snang
T02D2515:338a-22: mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzlas
T02D2515:338a-23: pas tshogs yongs su rdzogs pas dga' ldan gyi sar
T02D2515:338a-24: yongs su gnas pa la sogs pa'i rim pas ji
T02D2515:338a-25: srid aom ya th'a sarba t'a ga sta th'a ham
T02D2515:338a-26: zhes pas rang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
T02D2515:338a-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D2515:338a-29: dbang chen la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nye bar ston
T02D2515:338a-30: par byed do // sangs rgyas thams cad ces bya
T02D2515:338a-31: ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so
T02D2515:338a-32: par byed do // // de dag so so re
T02D2515:338a-33: re'i gzhogs su 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa
T02D2515:338a-35: phyi'i gnas su zhes pa ni sangs rgyas la ltos nas phyi rol gyi cha rnams su'o //
T02D2515:338a-36: sangs rgyas sras po zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:338a-37: gzhan du ni dkyil 'khor gyi gleng gzhi'i rjes su
T02D2515:338a-38: 'brangs nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams
T02D2515:338a-39: kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis gnyis kyi gzhogs dag
T02D2515:338a-40: tu gnyis gnyis kyis yongs su bskor bar rnam par
T02D2515:338a-41: gzhag go // da nas 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa rnams re re'o //
T02D2515:338a-42: snam bu byas nas zur du bdug pa la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D2515:338b-0: sgo'i cha rnams @338b su gzugs la sogs pa rnams
T02D2515:338b-1: dang sgo rnams su sgo ba dang nang gi zur
T02D2515:338b-2: rnams su sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams so zhes
T02D2515:338b-3: so // rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams su rjod par
T02D2515:338b-4: byed pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D2515:338b-5: pa'i kha dog can gyi re kh'a'o //
T02D2515:338b-6: rdul tshon yang sngags pas yid kyis rab tu brtag par byas te rab tu dgye'o //
T02D2515:338b-7: bsdu pa'i mthar thug par rdzogs par byas nas las kyi dngos grub kyi don du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2515:338b-8: chu lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi don du lha rnams brjod
T02D2515:338b-9: par byas pa nyid kyis cho ga de dang de
T02D2515:338b-11: rdo rje snying po la sogs pa rnams las phyi
T02D2515:338b-12: rol gyi snam bu la khro bo dgod par bya'o
T02D2515:338b-13: // rlung lha la ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs
T02D2515:338b-14: rnams su rim pas khro bo la sogs pa rnams
T02D2515:338b-15: so zhes pa ni khyad par ro //
T02D2515:338b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2515:338b-17: pa rnams kyis bzlas pa'i cho ga ston par byed
T02D2515:338b-18: do // mchod pa byas nas zhes pa ni bsdu
T02D2515:338b-19: ba dang dbang bskur pa'i mthar thug pa rdzogs nas
T02D2515:338b-20: do // / sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams kyis yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D2515:338b-21: kun zhes pa ni cho ga sum cu rtsa gsum mo //
T02D2515:338b-22: sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po ni rang gi
T02D2515:338b-23: lha'i gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du rang gi sngags
T02D2515:338b-24: kyi yi ge rnams kyis yang dag par ldan te
T02D2515:338b-27: mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyi dam tshig go //
T02D2515:338b-28: de'i phyir sgra la sogs pa'i bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2515:338b-29: yi ge'i phreng bar rnam par gnas pa ci zhe na /
T02D2515:338b-30: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus zhes bya ba gsungs pa /
T02D2515:338b-31: dung gi sgra ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang de'i rigs la'o //
T02D2515:338b-32: dril bu'i sgra ni 'jig rten dbang phyug dang de'i rigs la'o //
T02D2515:338b-33: rdo rje h'um mdzad dang de'i rigs la sprin te
T02D2515:338b-34: sprin gyi h'um yig tsa ta tsa ta'i sgra sgrogs
T02D2515:338b-35: pa'o // nam mkha'i snying po dang de'i rigs rnams la rnga bo che'i sgra'o ;
T02D2515:338b-36: / pi wang la sogs pa'i sgra ni thams cad kyi spyi bo'o //
T02D2515:338b-37: rang gi snying ga'i mtshan mar rang gi sngags kyi
T02D2515:338b-38: yi ge bltas la rang gi de kho na nyid
T02D2515:338b-39: la lhag par mos nas lag gnyis yang dag par
T02D2515:338b-40: sbyor bas sgra'i bzlas par bya'o //
T02D2515:339a-0: de nas lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams kyis dgug pa la @339a * //
T02D2515:339a-2: rang gi tshul zhes pa ni yid bde ba'i tshul lo //
T02D2515:339a-3: de'i zhes pa ni rang gi lha de'i'o //
T02D2515:339a-4: yang dag sbyar bya zhes pa ni kun nas mi phyed pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:339a-5: phyag rgya sngags ni legs par sbyar //
T02D2515:339a-6: zhes pa ni rang gi phyag rgya dang /
T02D2515:339a-7: sngags rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2515:339a-8: gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor pa lag par rang gi mtshan ma dang /
T02D2515:339a-9: snying gar zla ba la son pa'i rang gi mtshan
T02D2515:339a-10: ma'i phyag rgya byas nas de'i 'od zer rnams kyis
T02D2515:339a-11: kun du 'od gsal ba gang yin pa kun nas
T02D2515:339a-12: kyang ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas byung ba'i
T02D2515:339a-13: 'od zer rnams kyis khyab pa gang yin pa'i bzlas
T02D2515:339a-14: par bya'o // slar yang brtan par byin gyis brlab pa dang /
T02D2515:339a-17: mchod pa rnams rdzogs te rang gi gzugs la spro
T02D2515:339a-18: ba dang bsdu ba byas nas snying ga la sogs
T02D2515:339a-19: par ji srid du bzlas pa'i sgra yang mngon par
T02D2515:339a-20: mi 'jug pa ni rnal 'byor gyi bzlas par rnam
T02D2515:339a-21: par brjod do // de nas snying gar zla ba'i
T02D2515:339a-22: dkyil 'khor gang ba la rang gi sngags kyi yi
T02D2515:339a-23: ge'i phreng ba ma chad pa mu tig gi phreng
T02D2515:339a-24: ba ltar dkar ba glog dang mtshungs par gsal ba'i
T02D2515:339a-25: 'od zer rnams kyis rang gi lus kun nas gsal
T02D2515:339a-26: bar byed par bsgoms nas sngags kyi yi ge'i bzlas
T02D2515:339a-27: pa mngon par rdzogs par bya'o //
T02D2515:339a-28: ji lta ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bdag nyid chen por ston par byed do //
T02D2515:339a-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rnam par snang
T02D2515:339a-30: mdzad la sogs pa dang de'i rang bzhin nyid kyi
T02D2515:339a-31: rigs rnams kyang de bzhin nyid du brjod par bya'o
T02D2515:339a-32: // de rnams kyi bstod pa rin po che ni ;
T02D2515:339a-33: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po che'o //
T02D2515:339a-34: mi g-yo zhes pa 'dis chos kyi sku nges par bstan no //
T02D2515:339a-35: mnyam pa nyid kho na de bzhin nyid do //
T02D2515:339a-36: de kho na snying po'i chos te /
T02D2515:339a-37: gang rnams kyis mnyam par yod pa de mnyam nyid snying po'i chos can te /
T02D2515:339a-38: 'dis kyang langs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D2515:339a-39: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad //
T02D2515:339a-40: ces pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sprul pa'i sku'i sgo nas /
T02D2515:339a-41: gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D2515:339a-42: gsum pa de rnams kyang mnyam pa med par sdug bsngal sel ba ste /
T02D2515:339b-0: lta ba dang lta ba ma yin pa sdug bsngal sel @339b par byed pa'o //
T02D2515:339b-1: mtha' yas ni mtha' med pa gang yin pa'o //
T02D2515:339b-2: kun nas dam pa'i yon tan 'jig rten dang 'jig
T02D2515:339b-3: rten las 'das pa thams cad dang dngos grub sbyin
T02D2515:339b-4: pa'i tshul gang yin pa de rnams la de bzhin
T02D2515:339b-5: du gsungs te / de yi nyam thag sdug bsngal sel //
T02D2515:339b-6: yon tan dngos grub sbyin pas kyang //
T02D2515:339b-7: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can zhes gsungs //
T02D2515:339b-9: gal te yang thugs rje'i bdag nyid can yin pa
T02D2515:339b-10: de'i phyir de rnams kyang shin tu zhen par 'gyur
T02D2515:339b-12: dri med ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:339b-13: dri med ni sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2515:339b-14: mi g-yo ni gzhan mu stegs can gyis rab tu g-yo bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2515:339b-15: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir /
T02D2515:339b-16: mnyam med dam pa'i chos kyi mchog yin la //
T02D2515:339b-17: de 'di rnams la yod pa de rnams ni mnyam
T02D2515:339b-18: med dam pa'i chos mchog can te gang gsungs pa
T02D2515:339b-20: de sgrub par byed pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:339b-21: nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:339b-22: gang gi phyir nam mkha' ste /
T02D2515:339b-23: nam mkha' la tshad kyi mthar thug pa med pas
T02D2515:339b-24: dpes bskrun du yod pa ma yin no ste gang
T02D2515:339b-25: gi phyir 'di la ma yin no zhes pa ngo
T02D2515:339b-26: bo'o // dpes bskrun du med pa cis she na /
T02D2515:339b-27: yon tan cha zhes pa la sogs pa ste chung du dang /
T02D2515:339b-29: chen po'i tshad kyis dbye ba yang yon tan la yod pa ma yin no //
T02D2515:339b-30: ci rnams kyi zhe na rtag tu zhes bya ba
T02D2515:339b-31: la sogs pa gsungs pa rtag tu sems can gyi
T02D2515:339b-32: khams rnams la ; dngos grub mchog rnams stsol bar
T02D2515:339b-33: byed pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams la'o zhes drug pa'i
T02D2515:339b-35: 'di dag nyid gang las shes pa gsungs pa rtag tu zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:339b-36: gang gi phyir de rnams kyi thugs rje'i shugs las byung ba nyid kyi phyir //
T02D2515:339b-37: rtag tu dri ma med pa ste nyon mongs pa med pa'o//
T02D2515:339b-38: smon lam grub pa ni rab tu mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D2515:339b-39: 'gags pa med pa'i chos nyid ni kun nas khyab par rtag tu gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:339b-40: rnam par snang bar byed do ni 'bar bar byed do //
T02D2515:339b-41: thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas rnams so //
T02D2515:340a-1: she na 'gag par yang mi 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:340a-2: gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir /
T02D2515:340a-3: thugs rje chen po 'gags pa'i chos can du mi 'gyur te de'i phyir /
T02D2515:340a-4: de yang 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid do //
T02D2515:340a-5: ci dang ci zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2515:340a-6: tshad med tshad dang bral ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:340a-7: tshad med ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
T02D2515:340a-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang tshad dang bral
T02D2515:340a-9: ba rnams la'o // shin tu rdzogs pa ni 'bras bu mthar thug pa'o //
T02D2515:340a-10: bde bar gshegs pa'i go 'phang ni yongs su mya
T02D2515:340a-11: ngan las 'das pa'i go 'phang rnams su yang brnyes
T02D2515:340a-12: gyur kyang ste mthong bar gyur kyang ngo //
T02D2515:340a-13: de'i phyir yang ae ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid do //
T02D2515:340a-14: dam tshig gsum ni sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D2515:340a-15: de'i rgyur mchog gi dngos grub stsol te rab tu
T02D2515:340a-16: stsol bar gyur cig / mchog sbyin pa ni dngos
T02D2515:340a-18: mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes
T02D2515:340a-19: pa ste mchog sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na gtso
T02D2515:340a-20: bor gyur pa'o // ma lus pa ni lhag ma med pa'o //
T02D2515:340a-21: dus gsum mkhyen pa po ni dus gsum pa can no //
T02D2515:340a-22: sgrib pa med pa ni sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'o //
T02D2515:340a-23: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D2515:340a-24: bstod pa'i bdag nyid chen po ston par byed do
T02D2515:340a-25: // rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin
T02D2515:340a-26: gshegs pa lnga'i bzlas pa rnams dang po'i rnal 'byor
T02D2515:340a-27: gyi rim pas lha'i rnal 'byor bsdus nas da ni
T02D2515:340a-28: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2515:340a-29: pa rigs bzhi po de rnams kyi lha'i bzlas pa
T02D2515:340a-30: rnams kyi nges pa bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:340a-31: ji ltar bshad pa'i cho gas zhes bya ba ni
T02D2515:340a-32: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba sngon ma can gyis
T02D2515:340a-33: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang dag par gzung
T02D2515:340a-34: ba ni bslab pa'i gnas te rang gi nus pa
T02D2515:340a-35: nyid kyis bzung nas cho ga sngon ma can gyis
T02D2515:340a-36: ji ltar gsungs pa'i sngags rnams kyis sdig pa bshags
T02D2515:340a-38: dngos grub kyi gegs nye bar 'joms pa nyid kyi
T02D2515:340a-39: gtso bor bshags pa la sogs pa rnams kyis sngags
T02D2515:340a-40: nges par bstan gyi gsol ba 'debs pa la sogs
T02D2515:340b-0: sa bcu dbang phyug ces pa ni zla ba'i @340b
T02D2515:340b-1: kha dog can zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D2515:340b-2: yang dag par spel bar bya ste /
T02D2515:340b-3: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
T02D2515:340b-4: de nas ji ltar gsungs pa'i seng ge'i gdan gyi
T02D2515:340b-5: steng du bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du bsam
T02D2515:340b-6: par bya'o ; / aom budho& ham zhes pas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2515:340b-7: sa bcu'i dbang phyug de'i seng ge'i gdan de bzhin du rigs pa ma yin no //
T02D2515:340b-8: de'i phyir aom sva bh'a pa shuddho zhes pa la
T02D2515:340b-9: sogs pa rnams kyis snang ba med par byas te
T02D2515:340b-10: / snying gar zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje blta'o //
T02D2515:340b-11: de las bskyed pa'i rang gi mtshan mar kun du blta'o //
T02D2515:340b-12: aom dharma dh'a tu sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes pa ni de nga rgyal byas nas /
T02D2515:340b-13: de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje dbyings nang du chud par bya'o //
T02D2515:340b-15: zhes pa ni bsgoms nas ye shes kyi sku'i bdag nyid kyi phyir /
T02D2515:340b-16: chos kyi skur aom pra bha sva ro& ham zhes pas byin gyis brlab po /
T02D2515:340b-17: chos kyi dbyings rgya chen por spros nas zhes pa ni ji ltar rang gi mtshan ma spros nas /
T02D2515:340b-18: sems can gyi don mngon par rdzogs nas rang la nye bar bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2515:340b-19: de ltar ye shes sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs pa
T02D2515:340b-20: byang chub pa mngon du byas nas budho& ham zhes
T02D2515:340b-21: nga rgyal ba skyed par bya'o //
T02D2515:340b-22: de nas ma h'a sa ma ya satv'a ham zhes
T02D2515:340b-23: bya ba'i nga rgyal byas nas rang gi dam tshig
T02D2515:340b-25: sa ma yo ham zhes 'don pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:340b-26: sa ma ya satva a'a dhi tish'a mam zhes snying ga dang /
T02D2515:340b-29: spyi bor bzhag la yang rang gi snying gar rang
T02D2515:340b-30: gi sngags dang lhan cig tu de nyid gdon no
T02D2515:340b-31: // phyag rgya chan po bcings nas ye shes sems dpa' mdun du bzhag nas blta bar bya'o //
T02D2515:340b-32: de bskul nas de nyid dza: h'um bam ho: zhes
T02D2515:340b-33: 'don cing rang gi lus la rab tu bsgoms nas
T02D2515:340b-34: ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dkyil 'khor mngon
T02D2515:340b-36: sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes der bdag nyid
T02D2515:340b-37: bsgoms nas bstan pa'i rdo rje'i lta bas yang dag
T02D2515:340b-38: par ji lta ba bzhin du rang byin gyis rlob
T02D2515:340b-39: pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas snying gar byin gyis rlob
T02D2515:340b-40: pa yang byas nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dza:
T02D2515:341a-1: dang sngar gyi rang gi sngags kyis spyi bo dang
T02D2515:341a-2: mgrin pa la sogs pa rnams su bdag la byin
T02D2515:341a-3: gyis brlab pa'i ched dang tshul ji lta ba snying
T02D2515:341a-4: po dang nye ba'i snying po la sogs pa rnams
T02D2515:341a-5: su yang ngo // legs so zhes pa'i sbyor bas
T02D2515:341a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nang du bcug ste
T02D2515:341a-7: de dang de'i yi ges brtan pa can du byas
T02D2515:341a-8: te mngon par dbang bskur nas ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2515:341a-9: du chos dang las kyi phyag rgya bcings pa sngon
T02D2515:341a-10: ma can du byas pa'i ting nge 'dzin mchod pa
T02D2515:341a-13: spyan drang gsang ba'i mchod pa'i mthar thug pa mngon par rdzogs par bya ste ;
T02D2515:341a-14: ji ltar byas pa nyid la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'dzin pa la sogs pa can no //
T02D2515:341a-15: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham aom sva bh'a ba shuddhahaham
T02D2515:341a-16: aom sarbba sa mo nya ham zhes rdo rje'i bdag
T02D2515:341a-17: nyid can dang rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang /
T02D2515:341a-18: bdag med par mnyam pa nyid kyis thams cad mnyam
T02D2515:341a-19: par rnam par bsams nas 'gro ba ma lus pa'i
T02D2515:341a-20: nye bar 'tsho ba yang rnam par bsams nas bdag
T02D2515:341a-21: nyid sems nye bar 'phel ba'i bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2515:341a-22: dus ji lta ba bzhin du zhes pa ni skabs ji lta bar ro //
T02D2515:341a-23: thun mtshams bzhi'am gsum dag la brtsam par bya ste
T02D2515:341a-24: yi ge'i rjes su son pa'i yid kyi zhes pa
T02D2515:341a-25: ni snying ga'i mtshan ma'i yi ge la sems gnas
T02D2515:341a-26: par gyur pa'o // dman pa'i dngos grub kyi dbang
T02D2515:341a-27: du byas nas nyi ma re re re zhes bya
T02D2515:341a-28: ba la sogs pa gsungs pa sgrub pa'i dus su
T02D2515:341a-29: thams cad thun mong du rdo rje'i gdan no //
T02D2515:341a-30: gzhan gyi tshe sangs rgyas rnams kho na'o //
T02D2515:341a-31: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur gsal ba zhes pa ni rang gi lha'i byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D2515:341a-32: dngos grub 'bring po'i dbang du byas te gsungs pa bya ba bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:341a-33: sgrub pa chen po zhes pa ni mchog sgrub pa'o //
T02D2515:341a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'bum bya'o //
T02D2515:341a-35: de ma 'byor pa la ji ltar 'byor ba'i tshad kyis dri'i mchod rten rnams so //
T02D2515:341a-36: bzlas pa yang gnyis ka la stong phrag go //
T02D2515:341a-37: bye ba bdun gyi nang ma yin pa ste steng du ni ma yin par rig par bya'o //
T02D2515:341a-38: sgrub pa gnyis pa yang rdzas sngon ma can gyi dper brjod pa nyid do //
T02D2515:341b-0: de la yang legs par bya ba'i dbye @341b bas dngos grub gsum du reg par bya'o //
T02D2515:341b-1: ci ste 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas ri bo lhung
T02D2515:341b-2: ba la sogs pa can gyi las byed par grub

T02D2515:341b-6: thams cad kyi gzugs su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2515:341b-7: sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:341b-8: sgrub pa po thams cad kyi nan tan du bya'o zhes pa'i bar du gsungs so //
T02D2515:341b-9: gi wam la sogs pa'i grub pa ni 'chad par

T02D2515:341b-15: de dang de lta bu'i re kh'a rnams kyis bcad
T02D2515:341b-16: pas re'u mig bzhi bcu zhed gyur 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:341b-17: phreng zung zhes pa ni phreng gnyis la aa yig la sogs pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D2515:341b-18: phreng gnyis pa'i mtha' ma'i re'u mig la rim pas

T02D2515:341b-20: par bya'o // phreng gsum pa'i thog ma'i re'u mig

T02D2515:341b-23: phreng gsum pa'i thog ma'i re'u mig drug pa nas brtsams nas ya ra la wa'o //

T02D2515:341b-25: stod pa'i re'u mig la ksha yig ste thams cad
T02D2515:341b-26: kyi mthar rdo rje rtse lnga pa bri bar bya'o

T02D2515:341b-41: dbang bskur bar byad pa ni thig le la sogs

T02D2515:342a-0: su 'gyur ba'o // ya ra la wa @342a * //

T02D2515:342a-3: ka la sogs pa'i sde pa lnga po ni mnyam pa'o //

T02D2515:342a-9: sangs rgyas kyi don ni ma yig go //
T02D2515:342a-10: mya ngan las 'das pa'i don ni ma yig go //

T02D2515:342a-12: ka la sogs pa rnams dang gcig tu bsdus par

T02D2515:342a-14: gzhan zhes pa ni thig le rnams so //
T02D2515:342a-15: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag nyid can nyid kyi

T02D2515:342a-22: par byas nas thams cad du 'gro ba la sogs

T02D2515:342a-27: de'i gzugs kyis yongs su gyur pa de bstan pa
T02D2515:342a-28: shin tu ring po nas dang pha rol tu phyin
T02D2515:342a-29: par brjod par bya'o dro ba ni tsheg drag go

T02D2515:342a-33: gnyis pa'i smra ba po ni wa yig go //
T02D2515:342a-34: bzhi ba'i dbyangs ni pa'i ste des mnan pa'o //

T02D2515:342a-36: rgyu dang bral bar gsal bar byed pa ni ha yig go //
T02D2515:342a-37: drug pa'i dbyangs ni au yig go //
T02D2515:342a-38: des tha dad ma yin pa ni 'dres pa'o //
T02D2515:342a-39: steng du yang thig le dang bcas pa ni bzhi pa'o //
T02D2515:342a-40: chos rnams thams cad mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid du
T02D2515:342a-41: gsal bar byed pa ni kham yig ste lnga pa'o
T02D2515:342a-42: // 'di ni bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen po'o //

T02D2515:342b-0: @342b byang chub ni rdo rje sems pa'o //

T02D2515:342b-2: mi'i sa bon ni ra yig go //
T02D2515:342b-3: spyod pa yi ni steng du gnas //
T02D2515:342b-5: spyod pa yang rjes su nga rol 'dir blta bar bya ste /

T02D2515:342b-8: / chos rnams kun gyi rgyu med pa nyid gsal bar byed pa ni ha yig go //
T02D2515:342b-9: me'i sa bon ni ra yig go //
T02D2515:342b-10: bzhi pa'i dbyangs ni yi yig go //

T02D2515:342b-12: de nyid ces pa ha yig go //
T02D2515:342b-13: drug pa'i dbyangs kyis zhes pa au yig gis so //

T02D2515:342b-16: sde pa lnga pa'i mtha' can ma yig go //
T02D2515:342b-17: sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu gnas pa ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D2515:342b-18: brgyad pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan ni ae yig gi don to //
T02D2515:342b-19: de nyid ces pa ni ma yig go //
T02D2515:342b-20: thig le dang bcas pa ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi'o //
T02D2515:342b-21: lnga pa'i dbyangs ni au yig go //
T02D2515:342b-22: des yang dag par ldan pa ni 'jam dpal gyi'o //
T02D2515:342b-23: de nyid ni mi yig ste spyod pa rjes su son pa ni rnams sel gyi'o //
T02D2515:342b-24: sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni ba yig go //
T02D2515:342b-25: yi ge gsum ni gshin rje mthar byed kyi sngags so //
T02D2515:342b-26: de bstan pa'i phyir thog mar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa //

T02D2515:342b-28: sku sgum du ni rnam par bsgom ni h'um yig go //

T02D2515:342b-30: sde pa tha ma'i gsum pa sa yig go //
T02D2515:342b-31: sde pa dang po'i gsum pa ga yig go //

T02D2515:342b-33: sgyu dang bral ba nyid du gsal bar byed pa ni ta yig go //
T02D2515:342b-34: dbyangs lnga pa ni au yig go //
T02D2515:342b-35: rang gi rjes su nga ro bcas par shes par bya'o //
T02D2515:342b-36: des yang dag par sbyar ba ni rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi'o //
T02D2515:342b-37: sde pa bzhi pa'i dang po ni ta yig go //
T02D2515:342b-38: me'i rab tu gsal bar byas pa ni ra yig rjes su son par ro //
T02D2515:342b-39: bzhi pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan pa ni ai yig gi don to //

T02D2515:342b-41: bzhi pa'i gnyis pa ni tha yig go //
T02D2515:342b-42: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma'i'o //
T02D2515:343a-2: sgra ni rjes su sna ldan no //
T02D2515:343a-3: gnyis pa'i yi ge gsum pa ni dza yig go //
T02D2515:343a-4: bzhi pa'i dbyangs ni pa'i yig go //
T02D2515:343a-5: 'di 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /

T02D2515:343a-9: dgu pa'i dbyangs ni ao yig go //
T02D2515:343a-10: dbyangs chen ni la yig go //

T02D2515:343a-12: aom yig dang bcas pa yang rang gi sngags su blta bar bya'o //

T02D2515:343a-14: sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu gnas /

T02D2515:343a-17: gnas pa'i dbyangs ni aa yig go //

T02D2515:343a-22: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
T02D2515:343a-23: pa rnams dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa

T02D2515:343a-25: po rnams kyis rdo rje ye shes zhes bya ba

T02D2515:343a-28: rang gi sa bon gnas pa ni ya yig gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:343a-29: de nyid ces pa ni ham yig go //
T02D2515:343a-30: rnam par snang mdzad mthun gnas las byung zhes pa
T02D2515:343a-31: ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mthun pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2515:343a-32: la gnas pa'o // rgyu ni ha yig go //

T02D2515:343a-34: thig le sgra dang bcas pa ra la gnas pas 'grub par byed do //
T02D2515:343a-35: rlung gi dkyil 'khor du de'i sa bon gnas pas phye mar byed do //
T02D2515:343a-36: rdo rje gnas pa'am 'khor lo dbus su gnas pas rengs pa la sogs pa bya'o ;
T02D2515:343a-37: / dbang du byed ces pa ni 'grub par byed pa'o //
T02D2515:343a-38: snying gar zhes pa ni sgrub par byed pa'i snying ga la'o //
T02D2515:343a-39: thob nas zhes pa ni spros nas so //
T02D2515:343a-40: bdag nyid bsgoms nas zhes pa /
T02D2515:343a-41: rtog pa'i gzugs su gnas byas nas //
T02D2515:343b-0: rlung gis sa bon tshon zhes pa ni @343b la yig gis bskor ba'o //
T02D2515:343b-1: spyod pa'i steng du 'bar byas pa //
T02D2515:343b-2: zhes pa ni ya yig gi mthar a'a yig go //
T02D2515:343b-3: rlung la gnas pa me la gnas //
T02D2515:343b-4: zhes pa ni rlung la gnas pa dang me la gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:343b-5: sde tshan dang po'i dang por gnas pa ni ka yig go //
T02D2515:343b-6: sa yig gi steng du gnas pas ksha yig tu 'gyur ro//
T02D2515:343b-7: sde tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ma yig go //
T02D2515:343b-8: dbyangs drug pa au yig go //
T02D2515:343b-9: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su son pa'i ra yig la gnas pas 'bar bar byed do //
T02D2515:343b-10: phyag rgya'i bdag nyid thams cad ces pa ni rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor ji lta ba bzhin pas /
T02D2515:343b-11: mi yi mdun du gnas nas ni //
T02D2515:343b-12: zhes pa me'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:343b-13: rgyu byed pa mtshungs pa ni h'um yig go //
T02D2515:343b-14: ngag gi 'khor lo bsgrub pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor ni gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:343b-15: chu'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas de la gnas pa'i ji ltar gsungs pa'i padma'o //
T02D2515:343b-16: de la bdag nyid 'jam dpal lhag par g-yo ba'i
T02D2515:343b-17: 'od zer chen por bsgoms nas rang gi snying gar
T02D2515:343b-18: zla ba la padma de'i yang steng du dung brtag
T02D2515:343b-19: par bya'o // de nas rdo rje'i rtse bsgom pa

T02D2515:343b-23: de ltar byas pa ni sngon du rnyed par ro //
T02D2515:343b-24: padmas mtshan pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor sngon por bris nas
T02D2515:343b-25: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas
T02D2515:343b-26: de la skyil krung gis nye bar 'dug ste /

T02D2515:343b-29: te sku la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams rang gi

T02D2515:343b-31: rang gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor la //
T02D2515:343b-32: zhes pa ni rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2515:343b-33: 'khor la padma'i ge sar nyid thig le ste de
T02D2515:343b-34: rnams las wa yig gi phreng ba'o //
T02D2515:343b-35: mgrin par bsdus nas dbyangs nyid du 'gyur ro //

T02D2515:343b-37: de nas rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi lce'i yi ge
T02D2515:343b-38: 'bar ba rnams kyis thams cad du gsal bar byas

T02D2515:343b-40: nam mkha' kun nas gang bar bzlas par bya ste
T02D2515:343b-41: dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ji srid par ro //
T02D2515:344a-0: yang na de kho na bzhin chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i @344a * //
T02D2515:344a-1: rnal 'byor can gyi lce rdo rje'i rang bzhin can
T02D2515:344a-2: du bsams nas rang gi snying gar zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2515:344a-4: de'i sde pa rnams kyang aa yig la sogs pa'i
T02D2515:344a-5: mthar thug pa nyi ma'i 'od zer dang mtshungs pa
T02D2515:344a-6: dang ka yig la sogs pa'o //

T02D2515:344a-18: bar song bar lhag par mos pa'i rim pa las

T02D2515:344a-26: mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid do
T02D2515:344a-27: // yi ge zhes pa ni aa yig go //
T02D2515:344a-28: de nyid ces pa'ang de kho na'o //
T02D2515:344a-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa

T02D2515:344a-31: / sngags kyi mdzod sgrub thabs kyi le'u gsal bar byed do //
T02D2515:344a-32: de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i sgrub thabs bstan pa /
T02D2515:344a-33: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:344a-34: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad du mthun par bsgrubs nas de'i gzugs so //
T02D2515:344a-35: de ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rgyan dang bcas pa
T02D2515:344a-36: dar la'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang rin po
T02D2515:344a-38: ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa de bzhin du 'di
T02D2515:344a-39: 'ang sangs rgyas de'i gzugs 'chang ba'i phyag gi zhes
T02D2515:344a-40: gsungs so // rig pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs zhes khyad par gzhan bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:344a-41: 'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D2515:344b-0: zhes pa 'bar ba'i phreng ba rab tu gsal @344b
T02D2515:344b-1: bar 'chad ba 'chad par 'gyur ba'i 'bar ba dang

T02D2515:344b-7: myur 'gro rin po che gzhan rnams kyang ngo //

T02D2515:347b-18: bstan pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la
T02D2515:347b-20: sngags kyi sbyor ba zhes pa ni gsang sngags kyi don sgom par byed pas so //
T02D2515:347b-21: thams cad bsgom par sbyor ba yis //
T02D2515:347b-22: zhes pa lha dang bcas pa'i rang gi gzugs mngon du byed pa yis so //
T02D2515:347b-23: phyag rgya kun gyis zhes pa ni sku la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rnams kyis so //
T02D2515:347b-24: thams cad du zhes pa rnam pa thams cad kyis so //
T02D2515:347b-25: mtshungs byas nas zhes pa ni gdod nas ma skyes
T02D2515:347b-26: pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi bdag dang rang
T02D2515:347b-27: gi lha tha mi dad par byas nas so //
T02D2515:347b-28: rjes su rnal 'byor gyis zhes pa ni lha nang du bcug nas de'i nga rgyal gyis so //
T02D2515:347b-29: me'i yongs su bskor ba zhes pa ni me la dbang chen du de zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:347b-30: sa'i snying po'i sgrub thabs bstan pa dbang po chen dang zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:347b-31: rdo rje yi ni dbus na gnas //
T02D2515:347b-32: zhes pa dbang chen dang rdo rje de la padma gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:347b-33: rdo rje'i phyag rgya snying gar gnas //
T02D2515:347b-34: zhes pa ni thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i phyag rgya de'o //
T02D2515:348a-0: blo gros mi zad pa'i sgrub thabs nye bar bstan pa'i phyir mi zad ces pa la @348a * //
T02D2515:348a-1: sogs pa gsungs pa 'dis 'di dag ston par byed do //
T02D2515:348a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa ni zad pa med pa ni
T02D2515:348a-3: dbyer med pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin 'dis bcom
T02D2515:348a-4: ldan 'das so // me'i dkyil 'khor ni me lha'i
T02D2515:348a-5: dkyil 'khor de la zla ba la gnas par bsam
T02D2515:348a-6: ldan 'das so // par bya'o ; / nam mkha'
T02D2515:348a-7: mdzod kyi sgrub thabs bstan pa thams cad gtong ba
T02D2515:348a-8: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:348a-9: me long lta bur byang chub sems //
T02D2515:348a-10: zhes pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:348a-11: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bdag ces pa ni lha dang dbyer mi phyed pa'i nga rgyal can no //
T02D2515:348a-12: nam mkha' la rin chen 'byung gnas zhes pa stong
T02D2515:348a-13: pa nyid bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas rin po
T02D2515:348a-14: che'i mtshan ma rmad du byung ba'o //
T02D2515:348a-15: lag na rin chen gyi sgrub thabs nye bar bstan
T02D2515:348a-16: pa rin chen dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D2515:348a-17: gsungs pa / rin chen dkyil 'khor las byung zhes
T02D2515:348a-18: pa rin po che'i 'od zer 'bar ba las rdzogs
T02D2515:348a-19: gsungs pa / pa / rin po che'i gzi brjid
T02D2515:348a-20: kyi mchog rin po che'i 'od gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2515:348a-21: gsungs pa / pa / ro // rdo rje'i rnal
T02D2515:348a-22: 'byor gyis zhes pa rang lha dang dbyer mi phyed
T02D2515:348a-23: pa'i rab tu sbyor bas so //
T02D2515:348a-24: dbang chen me las yang dag 'byung //
T02D2515:348a-25: zhes pa dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i me'i dkyil 'khor la rnam par gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:348a-26: blo gros rgya mtsho'i sgrub thabs nye bar bstan pa chos dbyings zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:348a-27: chos dbyings mnyam pa zhes pa don dam pa gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D2515:348a-28: bdud rtsi'i chu yis yongs bkang ba //
T02D2515:348a-29: zhes pa ni kun rdzob tu bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gyi mtsho'o //
T02D2515:348a-30: der padma gcig rnam par gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:348a-31: chu lha'i lus zhes pa ni chu lha'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:348a-32: rtse mo brgya pa byung zhes pa ni rtse mo brgya dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2515:348a-33: rdo rje snying po'i sgrub thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2515:348a-34: dbang chen dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D2515:348a-35: gsungs pa gang gang la sogs par sbron gtug cing
T02D2515:348a-36: mtho ba zhes pa ni sprin bzhin du mtho ba'o
T02D2515:348a-37: // snying gar rdo rje zhes pa ni snying gar zla ba la rdo rje dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2515:348a-38: dgug ces pa la sogs pas gnyis su med pa nyid du bstan to zhes pa'o //
T02D2515:348a-39: rdo rje nga zhes pa ste rdo rje snying po nga'o //
T02D2515:348b-0: bdag @348b gi rnal 'byor gyis zhes pa ni de dang gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so //
T02D2515:348b-1: rdo rje nyid gyur zhes pa ni rdo rje snying po'o //
T02D2515:348b-2: rtse mo drug ces pa ni gnyis kar du rtse mo gsum pa can no //
T02D2515:348b-3: rin chen 'byung gnas kyi sgrub thabs bstan pa dbang chen lha zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:348b-4: gnas zhes pa ni padma'i gnas la nor bu dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la'o //
T02D2515:348b-5: mkha' 'dra'i rnam pa zhes pa ni bee d'urya'i rnam par ro //
T02D2515:348b-6: snying gar gnas zhes pa ni snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:348b-7: rin chen rnal 'byor gyis zhes pa ni rin chen
T02D2515:348b-8: 'byung gnas dang gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis
T02D2515:348b-9: so // thams cad rnal 'byor gyis zhes pa ni
T02D2515:348b-10: rin po che thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa'i sbyor
T02D2515:348b-11: so // bas so // rdo rje snying po rgyan
T02D2515:348b-12: du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub thabs
T02D2515:348b-14: khro bo dang gzugs thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang
T02D2515:348b-15: dkyil 'khor nye bar bstan pa de nas bcom ldan
T02D2515:348b-16: 'das zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa me lha'i
T02D2515:348b-17: dbus nas dbus su zhes pa ni rlung gi dkyil
T02D2515:348b-18: 'khor gyi dbus su me lha khro bo thams cad
T02D2515:348b-19: ces pa g-yas brkyang dang g-yon brkyang gis kun nas
T02D2515:348b-20: gnas pa mdung dang dbyug pa la sogs pas rab
T02D2515:348b-21: tu 'joms par byed pa'i rang bzhin can no //
T02D2515:348b-22: gang 'di'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje h'um mdzad la
T02D2515:348b-23: sogs pa rnams nye bar dgod pa yi ge gcig
T02D2515:348b-24: ces pa la sogs pa gsungs pa h'um yi ges
T02D2515:348b-25: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad dgod de de'i
T02D2515:348b-26: gzugs ni 'chad par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir 'dir
T02D2515:348b-27: ma bstan to // de nyid ces pa ni yi ge gcig pa'o //
T02D2515:348b-28: dbyangs bdun pa ni ae yig ste des rnam par rgyal ba ni he ru ka'i sngags so //
T02D2515:348b-29: dpal he ru ka kho na rdo rje chen po dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2515:348b-31: zhes pa ni zad pa'i dus can gyi thal ba'i mdog go //
T02D2515:348b-32: sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin zhes pa ni 'od zer sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:348b-33: me 'bar gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni de
T02D2515:348b-34: nyid rab tu gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba yang
T02D2515:349a-2: char sprin dang ni 'dra ba'i 'od ni sku la'o //
T02D2515:349a-3: de nyid la ba spu'i khung bu so so rnams
T02D2515:349a-4: su dmar po 'bar ba 'khyil zhing brel bas kun
T02D2515:349a-5: nas 'bar ba'i rdo rje dang thod pa'i cod pan
T02D2515:349a-6: can rgod mkha'i me bzhin rnam par 'jigs par byed
T02D2515:349a-7: pa'o // rang 'bar snang bar gar mdzad pas //
T02D2515:349a-8: zhes pa ni rab tu 'bar ba'i lta bas rnam par skyod par byed pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:349a-9: cig car gyur pas zhes pa ni gar gyis mnyes par byas pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:349a-10: de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te //
T02D2515:349a-11: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'o //
T02D2515:349a-12: phyag drug rnams kyis ni g-yas pa dang g-yas min rnams mdung dang dbyug pa dang /
T02D2515:349a-13: thod pa dang rdo rje dang dgra sta dang h'um
T02D2515:349a-14: mdzad kyi sor mo'i mtshan ma rnams su shes par
T02D2515:349a-15: bya'o // snying po dang nye ba'i snying po dang rtsa ba'i sngags rnams rim pas /
T02D2515:349a-16: aom a'a: h'um zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:349a-17: thugs rje'i khro bo blo ldan ni sangs rgyas de
T02D2515:349a-18: rnams kyi ngang tshul gzhan don gyi mtshan nyid nye
T02D2515:349a-20: ji srid du khro bo'i gzegs ma ni autpala sngon po'i kha dog go //
T02D2515:349a-21: dmar po 'bar bcas ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:349a-22: sangs rgyas kyi cod pan can /
T02D2515:349a-23: rdo rje dang dbyug pa la sogs pa'i mtshan ma can no //
T02D2515:349a-24: de'i khro gnyer bsnyer ba ni smin ma dmar po gnyis bsnyer ba'o //
T02D2515:349a-25: skad cig skad cig la 'byin par byed pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2515:349a-26: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa dbye bar byar med pa'i sems dpa'o //
T02D2515:349a-27: chu'i gnas su me la rnam par gnas pa'i g-yas
T02D2515:349a-28: pa dang g-yas min ngag gis padma dang rdo rje
T02D2515:349a-29: dang h'um mdzad kyi sor mo'i mtshan ma can gyi
T02D2515:349a-31: thams cad slong ba zhes pa'i slong ba'i dngos grub po //
T02D2515:349a-32: kun sbyor bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis //
T02D2515:349a-33: zhes pa ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang gcig pa
T02D2515:349a-34: can du bsgoms pas rlung gi gnas su me'i dkyil
T02D2515:349a-35: 'khor gyi dbus su son pa'i g-yas pa dang g-yas
T02D2515:349a-36: min dag gis ral gri dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'i
T02D2515:349b-0: rdo rje snying po rgyan du khro ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'byed @349b pa'o ;
T02D2515:349b-1: / gzungs ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs de nas bcom
T02D2515:349b-2: ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa
T02D2515:349b-3: gzungs ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po zhes pa ni rnam
T02D2515:349b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2515:349b-6: nye bar bstan pa de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes
T02D2515:349b-7: bya ba la sogs pa rdo rje nyid rin po
T02D2515:349b-8: che ste de rnams kyi 'dab ma'i phyi rnams su
T02D2515:349b-9: brgyan pa'o // sna tshogs las 'dra 'bar rnams la //
T02D2515:349b-10: zhes pa 'dab ma kha dog sna tshogs pa rnams su shes rab 'od kyis so //
T02D2515:349b-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ni sgrub
T02D2515:349b-12: par byed pa'i thabs nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi
T02D2515:349b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rnams te aom bo
T02D2515:349b-14: dhi tsitta badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig
T02D2515:349b-15: rnams so // phyogs cha'i dbye ba ni yi ge
T02D2515:349b-16: de dang de rnams ser po la sogs pa'i kha
T02D2515:349b-17: rnams so // dog rnams su'o // shes rab 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis //
T02D2515:349b-18: zhes pa ni ral gri'i 'od zer gyi 'khor lo rnams kyis so //
T02D2515:349b-19: de dag kun zhes pa ni gang 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa de la bya'o //
T02D2515:349b-20: lha'i gzugs dang yang dag mtshungs //
T02D2515:349b-21: zhes pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2515:349b-22: pa'i gzugs nyid kyis yongs su gyur pa nyid do
T02D2515:349b-23: // sngags kyi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni aom bo dhi tsitta badzra zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:349b-24: kun du zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis 'di'i khyab pa nyid ston par byed do //
T02D2515:349b-25: grol ba de srid du sgrib pa med pa'i sems can rnams la de rnam par gnas so //
T02D2515:349b-26: gang gi phyir sgrib pa dang bcas pa rnams la
T02D2515:349b-27: ji ltar zhe na gsungs pa kun rdzob dang zhes
T02D2515:349b-28: bya ba la sogs pa ste rab tu brtags zhes
T02D2515:349b-29: pa ni rnam par gzhag pa'o //
T02D2515:349b-30: de 'chad par 'gyur ba dag pa'i rtag tu sems can rang bzhin med pa'am /
T02D2515:349b-31: zag pa med pa la sogs pa'i yon dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2515:349b-32: sgrib pa dang bcas pa'i rgyud rnams kyi dbang po
T02D2515:349b-33: dang gshin rje la sogs pas bcings pa nyid kyi
T02D2515:349b-34: phyir rig byar rnam par gzhag go zhes pa'o //
T02D2515:349b-35: de nyid kyi nus pa gsungs pa //
T02D2515:349b-36: ji ltar bung shing zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:349b-37: thams cad du sems can rnams thams cad la zhes
T02D2515:349b-38: pa la sogs pa rnams kyi dkyus ma'i don nye
T02D2515:350a-2: / kun mkhyen ye shes kyis zhes bya ba zhes gsungs pa'o //
T02D2515:350a-3: de'i dpe rnams kyis yang dag pa'i don gang yin
T02D2515:350a-4: pa gsungs pa rnal 'byor ye shes zhes bya ba
T02D2515:350a-6: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms te
T02D2515:350a-7: zhes pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
T02D2515:350a-8: pa nyid do // bsam bya zhes pa ni mngon du phyogs par bya'o //
T02D2515:350a-9: 'di'i yi ge de kho na nyid ces pa ni gsungs pa'i don nye bar sdud par byed pa'o //
T02D2515:350a-10: de kho na ye ge bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:350a-11: bzhi pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'di ni snying po'o //
T02D2515:350a-12: sngags kyi sgras snying po dang nye ba'i snying po la yang blta bar bya'o //
T02D2515:350a-13: sangs rgyas sprin gyi sgrub thabs nye bar bstan pa'i
T02D2515:350a-14: phyir gnyis pa zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa
T02D2515:350a-15: rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi zhes pa ni gzungs ma
T02D2515:350a-16: rnams kyi'o // dbang chen yi ge'i mthar thug pa //
T02D2515:350a-17: zhes pa ni rang gi sngags kyi yi ge ser
T02D2515:350a-18: po dang ldan pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar
T02D2515:350a-19: thug pa'o // spyan gyi phyag rgya ni mi gsungs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2515:350a-20: gos dkar mo'i sgrub thabs bstan pa chu'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:350a-21: sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba che //
T02D2515:350a-22: zhes pa ni rang gi sngags kyi yi ges brgyan
T02D2515:350a-23: zhing 'od gsal bar rab tu 'byung zhing thim pas
T02D2515:350a-25: de la sgrub pa'i thabs ni zla ba la sogs pa rnams kyis so //
T02D2515:350a-26: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs nges par bstan pa sngo bsangs zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa //
T02D2515:350a-27: sngo bsangs dkar mo zhes pa spri yang ku'i kha dog go //
T02D2515:350a-28: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
T02D2515:350a-29: zhes pa padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:350a-30: rol pa yi ste sngags kyi yi ge de kho na mchod bzhin pa de rnams kyis so //
T02D2515:350a-31: chos kyi phyag rgya zhes pa sngags so //
T02D2515:350a-32: mtha' yas mchog ces pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa'o //
T02D2515:350a-33: khro gnyer can gyi sgrub thabs nye bar bstan pa
T02D2515:350a-34: dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D2515:350a-35: gsungs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus zhes pa ni
T02D2515:350a-36: padma la gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D2515:350b-0: so // phyag bzhi zhes @350b pa ni bgrang phreng
T02D2515:350b-1: dang chu skyes dang mchog sbyin dang spyi blugs 'dzin
T02D2515:350b-2: so // pa'o // sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D2515:350b-3: zhes pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du rang gi sngags kyi phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
T02D2515:350b-4: m'a ma k'i'i sgrub thabs bstan pa nyi ma'i dkyil
T02D2515:350b-5: 'khor dbus zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa rdo
T02D2515:350b-6: rjer bcas zhes pa ni dbus su gnas pa'i rdo
T02D2515:350b-7: rje'o // rdo rje'i phreng bas kun du bskor //
T02D2515:350b-8: zhes pa rdo rje'i phreng ba bcings pa'o //
T02D2515:350b-10: zhes pa ni 'od zer dang bcas bzhin pa'o //
T02D2515:350b-11: phyag bzhi zhes pa ni g-yon pa dag gis rdo rje dang spyi blugs 'dzin pa /
T02D2515:350b-12: g-yas pa dag gis mchog sbyin dang bgrang phreng 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2515:350b-13: sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba zhes pa rang gi
T02D2515:350b-14: sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng bas brgyan pa'i sngags kyi
T02D2515:350b-15: dkyil 'khor ro // rdo rje'i dbus su rab zhugs zhes pa rdo rje la gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:350b-16: rdo rje me yi phreng ba che //
T02D2515:350b-17: zhes pa la sogs pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni gzhan ston par byed do //
T02D2515:350b-18: rdo rje me ni rdo rje 'bar ba ste kho
T02D2515:350b-19: na phreng ba chen po gang yin pa de rdo
T02D2515:350b-21: rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D2515:350b-22: zhes pa ni 'od zer gyis bskor ba'o //
T02D2515:350b-23: sngags gnyis la rim pas ting nge 'dzin gnyis kyi tshad du'o //
T02D2515:350b-24: rdo rje lcags sgrog gi sgrub thabs nye bar bstan
T02D2515:350b-25: pa'i phyir rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes pa la sogs
T02D2515:350b-26: pa gsungs pa / des na spros pa las sku zhes pa ni dbus su rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:350b-27: phyag bzhi zhes pa ni g-yon pa bsnyems pas rdo
T02D2515:350b-28: rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa g-yas pas 'bar ba dang
T02D2515:350b-29: bcas pas rdo rje gsor ba gnyis dag gis kyang
T02D2515:350b-30: h'um mdzad kyi sor mo dang mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D2515:350b-31: rdo rje brgyan zhes pa ni rdo rjes mtshan pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D2515:350b-32: rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrug ces pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D2515:350b-33: de yi thugs kar rdo rje tshe //
T02D2515:350b-34: zhes pa'i thugs kar zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pas brgyan pa'o //
T02D2515:350b-35: 'phags ma skul byed ma'i sgrub thabs bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2515:350b-36: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa //
T02D2515:350b-37: zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:350b-38: padma dmar por rab tu gnas //
T02D2515:350b-39: zhes pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du padma de la gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:351a-0: padma dang bgrang phreng gi srad bu dang lhung bzed dang mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rnams kyis @351a * //
T02D2515:351a-2: mang po'i gzugs zhes pa ni dpa' ba'i dbye bas mtha' med pa du ma'i gzugs so //
T02D2515:351a-3: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du rdo rje dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2515:351a-4: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun gyi rang bzhin yin
T02D2515:351a-5: pa nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid
T02D2515:351a-6: skyes so // der bdag ces pa ni sangs rgyas
T02D2515:351a-7: bye ba phrag bdun gyi rang bzhin yang dag par
T02D2515:351a-8: sgom par byed pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2515:351a-9: sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng bar ldan //
T02D2515:351a-10: zhes pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du rang gi sngags kyi yi ge dang ldan pa can no //
T02D2515:351a-11: yongs gang ba zhes pa spros nas so //
T02D2515:351a-12: de'i zhes pa nam mkha'i khams su'o //
T02D2515:351a-13: 'od zer zhes pa ni 'od zer ro //
T02D2515:351a-14: rnal 'byor ye shes ni sgom par byed pa'i rang bzhin de dang des nges par sprul pa'o //
T02D2515:351a-15: rdo rje snying po'i rgyan du gzungs ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'byed pa'o //
T02D2515:351a-16: da ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
T02D2515:351a-17: yon tan thams cad kyi bdag nyid can nye bar
T02D2515:351a-18: bstan pa sngags kyi de nyid nges par bstan pa
T02D2515:351a-19: gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa
T02D2515:351a-20: / me long la sogs pa'i ye shes bzhi po'i bdag nyid can nyid kyi phyir /
T02D2515:351a-21: gsang ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin byang chub kyi
T02D2515:351a-22: sems la rtag tu gnas zhes pa mi gnas pa'i
T02D2515:351a-23: mya ngan las 'das pas kun gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:351a-24: sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyu can nyid kyi phyir sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2515:351a-25: dbye ba byar med pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D2515:351a-26: rang nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i phyir rang 'byung ngo //
T02D2515:351a-27: don dam pa gcig po nyid kyis lhag pa'i lha'o //
T02D2515:351a-28: gdul bya sna tshogs pa nyid kyi lha gzhan sna
T02D2515:351a-29: tshogs pa'i mthar thug pa sprul pa sangs rgyas kun
T02D2515:351a-30: gyis te lha rnams thams cad kyis mnyam par sbyor
T02D2515:351a-31: ba ste gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D2515:351a-32: mkha' 'gro ma ni mkha' spyod grub pa thams cad do //
T02D2515:351a-33: de dang de rnams kyi dra ba ni tshogs so //
T02D2515:351a-35: bde ba mchog tu bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2515:351a-36: zhes pas sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par sbyor ba mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba sdom mo //
T02D2515:351a-37: sems can gyi don gyi dbang nyid kyi phyir dang /
T02D2515:351a-38: don dam par ni 'dod chags la sogs pa med pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2515:351a-39: bud med kun ni lha thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin kho na'o //
T02D2515:351a-40: sgyu ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgyu
T02D2515:351b-0: ma'i @351b rang bzhin don dam par med pa can
T02D2515:351b-1: no // gal te de ltar na don dam par
T02D2515:351b-2: chen po ni gang phyag rgya ni ci brtag par
T02D2515:351b-4: thams cad mtshungs pa nyid ces pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D2515:351b-5: ci'i phyir khyad par du 'phags she na gsungs pa
T02D2515:351b-6: ci'i phyir rang bzhin gyi ni rang bzhin gyis ma
T02D2515:351b-7: byas pa'o ; / gang gis na nus pa yis ni'o //
T02D2515:351b-8: rang bzhin nyid kyis te rang bzhin kho nas de 'grub bo zhes spel lo //
T02D2515:351b-9: de'i phyir yang 'dis bud med de lha rnams bkur bar bya ba yin no //
T02D2515:351b-10: sdug bsngal gyis spyod par byed pa de mgu bar byed de zhes pas ngan spyod do //
T02D2515:351b-11: thams cad bud med sgyu mas 'grub ste lha'i phyag rgya'i gzugs kyis yongs su gyur pa'o //
T02D2515:351b-12: rang gi ngo bo yongs su bsgyur ba ni bdag
T02D2515:351b-13: med pa'i ngo bo khyad par du dam bcas pa
T02D2515:351b-14: rnams kyis so // sna tshogs zhes pa ni rang bzhin du ma rnams kyi'o //
T02D2515:351b-15: de bzhin thams cad du sna tshogs phyag rgya ste rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D2515:351b-16: kun la sna tshogs ston pa yis ni rang bzhin du ma bde ba'i mchog gis so //
T02D2515:351b-17: sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor chen po'i bdag nyid
T02D2515:351b-18: can gyi don dang rjes su mthun pa de srid
T02D2515:351b-19: du bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya la sogs pa'i gzugs
T02D2515:351b-20: nyid kun du bstan te 'jig rten las 'das pa
T02D2515:351b-21: dang 'jig rten pa thams cad kyi nang dang phyi
T02D2515:351b-22: rol gyi dngos po'i rang bzhin nyid du bstan pa'i
T02D2515:351b-23: kun la zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa kun
T02D2515:351b-25: kun nas ni rang rang gi lha'o //
T02D2515:351b-27: kun gyi rnam pa ni thams cad kyi rnam pas so //
T02D2515:351b-28: kun tshe ni dus thams cad kyi che'o //
T02D2515:351b-29: rang nyid ni bdag nyid te lha thams cad do //
T02D2515:351b-30: brtan pa ni ri la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:351b-31: g-yo ba ni mi la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:351b-32: thams cad dngos po ma lus pa'o //
T02D2515:351b-33: mdor bstan pa 'di kho na'i rgyas par bshad pa
T02D2515:351b-34: gsungs pa sems dang zhes pa la sogs pa nas
T02D2515:351b-35: / kun du de bzhin mtha' yas mchog / chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa //
T02D2515:351b-36: zhes pa ji srid par ro //
T02D2515:351b-37: rdo rje snying po'i rgyan du sngags kyi de nyid rnam par 'byed pa'o //
T02D2515:351b-38: da ni shes rab kyi sgo rtsa ba'i rgyud nye
T02D2515:351b-39: bar bsdu ba de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya
T02D2515:351b-40: ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:352a-0: bcom ldan 'das zhes pa rnam par @352a * //
T02D2515:352a-1: snang mdzad la gsol ba btab pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2515:352a-2: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'phags pa
T02D2515:352a-3: 'jam dpal la theg pa chen po mngon pa rtogs
T02D2515:352a-4: pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor yod pa nyid gsal
T02D2515:352a-5: bar bya ba'i phyir cang mi gsung ba ni ji
T02D2515:352a-6: ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas rnam snang ting nge 'dzin
T02D2515:352a-7: mngon du mdzad nas lha'i gnas su gdan bskyed de
T02D2515:352a-8: srung ba byas nas bdag la don 'di dag la
T02D2515:352a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab
T02D2515:352a-10: cing ji srid du 'jam dpal gyis gsol ba btab
T02D2515:352a-11: par dgongs nas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2515:352a-12: cad rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug nyid du
T02D2515:352a-13: byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2515:352a-14: cad bsdu ba'i don du 'jam dpal la bka' stsal
T02D2515:352a-15: to // de bsdus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2515:352a-16: cad kyi lhan cig tu yang dag par mchod de
T02D2515:352a-17: to // / de dag rdzogs pa'i rdo rje blo'i
T02D2515:352a-18: ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi
T02D2515:352a-19: bdag nyid du byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir /
T02D2515:352a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lhan cig pa'i
T02D2515:352a-21: 'khor los sgyur ba'i thugs kar byin gyis brlabs te
T02D2515:352a-22: thugs ka'i dpal be'u sngags kyis bskor ba rnams la
T02D2515:352a-23: sgo bzhi po slar yang shin tu dga' ba rnam
T02D2515:352a-24: par dag pa'i gnas zhes pa la sogs pa shes
T02D2515:352a-25: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas rnams kyis
T02D2515:352a-26: rang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa khong du
T02D2515:352a-27: chud par byas nas slar yang rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2515:352a-28: chen po'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas sdud pa la sogs
T02D2515:352a-29: pa sngon ma can gyi lha rnams rang gi las
T02D2515:352a-30: la legs par sbyar bar bya'o zhes pa ni sngon
T02D2515:352a-32: de bzhin du gzhan du yang rnal 'byor ji lta
T02D2515:352a-33: ba bzhin du bshad pa'i rim pa rnam par rtogs
T02D2515:352a-34: par bya'o // rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
T02D2515:352a-35: ni rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D2515:352a-36: thams cad kyi kun du mnyam pa nyid de la
T02D2515:352a-37: ting nge 'dzin gang gis dmigs par bya ba de
T02D2515:352a-38: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid
T02D2515:352a-39: par bya'o // la dmigs pa'o // de nyid dbyer
T02D2515:352a-40: mi phyed pa nyid kyis rdo rje ste de la
T02D2515:352a-42: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs zhes pa
T02D2515:352b-0: rnam par snang mdzad dbyer med pa'i @352b thugs la'o
T02D2515:352b-1: // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi theg
T02D2515:352b-2: pa chen po ni chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag
T02D2515:352b-3: // pa'o // rtogs par bya'o zhes byas nas gang
T02D2515:352b-4: gi phyir de yang dag par rtogs shing khong du
T02D2515:352b-5: chud pa gang yin pa de la de bzhin du
T02D2515:352b-7: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin
T02D2515:352b-8: tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas zhes bya
T02D2515:352b-9: ba la sogs pa'i gnas rnams so //
T02D2515:352b-11: gang gi dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni lus so //
T02D2515:352b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D2515:352b-13: de byin gyis rlob par byed pa gang yin pa'i
T02D2515:352b-14: ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin du brjod par bya'o
T02D2515:352b-16: ces pa ni phyi rol gyi ra ba la 'od zer 'bar ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2515:352b-17: rdo rje snying pos yongs su bskor //
T02D2515:352b-18: zhes pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D2515:352b-19: rin chen yang yin la rdo rje yang yin bas na rdo rje rin chen te /
T02D2515:352b-21: sna tshogs rtse mo ni ba dan bkra ba de rnams so //
T02D2515:352b-22: dril bcas ni bdag nyid bcings pa gang yin pa de la de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2515:352b-23: rlung gis bskyod pa'i mtshan ma yin pa nyid kyis rgyal mtshan nyid rlung gis bskyod pa'o //
T02D2515:352b-24: de rnams gyen du bsgreng ba gang yin pa de la rgyal mtshan gyen bsgreng rlung bskyod pa'o //
T02D2515:352b-25: de la yang ni chu'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D2515:352b-26: de'i zhes bya ba ni gru bzhi pa de'i'o //
T02D2515:352b-27: 'khor lo chen po zhes pa ni dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa'o //
T02D2515:352b-28: cha brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba ni dbus ma'i
T02D2515:352b-29: cha la bskor ba gang yin pa de cha brgyad
T02D2515:352b-30: rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D2515:352b-31: rdo rje'i thig gis yongs su bskor //
T02D2515:352b-32: zhes pa ni rdo rje phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D2515:352b-33: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni byang chub kyi
T02D2515:352b-34: gdan gru bzhi pa la seng ge'i gdan la'o zhes
T02D2515:352b-36: rdo rje chen po rtse mo lnga pa'o //
T02D2515:352b-37: rdo rje padma ni dbyer mi phyed pa'i padma ste /
T02D2515:352b-38: de la rab tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa la rdo rje che zhes bde bzhin du brjod do //
T02D2515:352b-39: gsang ba chen po zhes pa ni sde tshan dang po'i gnyis pa thig le dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2515:353a-0: zla bas brgyan zhes pa ni steng du @353a * //
T02D2515:353a-1: gnas pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:353a-2: de dag thams cad du yang dung la sogs pa dkar po'o //
T02D2515:353a-3: rdo rje phreng bas rnam par spras //
T02D2515:353a-4: zhes pa ni sna tshogs pa 'bar ba'i 'od kyi
T02D2515:353a-5: dkyil 'khor du rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan
T02D2515:353a-6: pa'o // dpral ba'i steng dang mgrin par yang rin po che chen po'i phreng bas spras pa'o //
T02D2515:353a-7: sems ma rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams ngos bzhi po rnams su dgod par bya'o //
T02D2515:353a-8: sde pa gsal byed ni ha ste rgyu zhes pas rgyu'i don brjod par byed do //
T02D2515:353a-9: drug pa'i dbyangs kyis zhes pa au yig gis so //
T02D2515:353a-10: thig le n'a da rnam par brgyan ni rjes su sna ldan dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2515:353a-12: zhes pa ni 'dir rten cing 'brel par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T02D2515:353a-13: ye shes 'od zer zhes pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D2515:353a-14: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi rgyal po ni 'od dpag med do //
T02D2515:353a-15: rdo rje rnam par gnon pa ni don yod grub pa'o //
T02D2515:353a-16: sh'akya thub pa zhes pa rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2515:353a-17: phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas zhes
T02D2515:353a-18: pa phyogs rnams kyi skabs ma yin pa med pa
T02D2515:353a-19: nyid du bsgom pa mngon du byas nas 'khod do
T02D2515:353a-21: thugs ka'i rdo rje las nges par byung nas zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D2515:353a-22: de rnams kyang sngon po dang ser po dang ljang
T02D2515:353a-23: gu rnams te gser dang chu skyes dmar po dang
T02D2515:353a-24: / shel dang margad kyi 'od can du chu skyes
T02D2515:353a-25: dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par rig par
T02D2515:353a-26: / bya'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2515:353a-27: kun du bzang po byang chub chen po'i sems dpa'
T02D2515:353a-29: de nyid ni 'god par bya ba ma yin pa nyid kyi dam tshig ste de'i 'byung ba'o //
T02D2515:353a-30: gang du na sems dpa' zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D2515:353a-31: de byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D2515:353a-33: de ni sems dpar byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje'o //
T02D2515:353a-34: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2515:353a-35: de skad ces bya ba la snyoms par zhugs nas te mngon du mdzad nas so //
T02D2515:353a-36: dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid can byang chub kyi sems so //
T02D2515:353a-37: ye shes rnam dag pa zhes pa ni rdo rje'i
T02D2515:353a-38: bdag nyid can gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so
T02D2515:353a-39: // rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du gyur//
T02D2515:353b-0: @353b zhes pa ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis yongs su gyur pa'o //
T02D2515:353b-1: byang chub sems zhes pa stong pa nyid so sor
T02D2515:353b-2: rtog pa la sogs pa rnams su zla ba'i dkyil
T02D2515:353b-3: 'khor nyid do // rten bskyed nas ni yongs su rdzogs pa nyid do //
T02D2515:353b-4: sangs rgyas ye shes ni de la rdo rje sgom par byed pa'o //
T02D2515:353b-5: brten pa nyid ni de'i nga rgyal byed pa'o //
T02D2515:353b-6: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes las nges par skyes pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas sku'o //
T02D2515:353b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs ka'o //
T02D2515:353b-8: rig pa'i mchog ces pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D2515:353b-9: rnam par snang mdzad ces pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D2515:353b-10: kyis ji srid du dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis
T02D2515:353b-11: brlab par bya ba'am gang der byin gyis rlob par
T02D2515:353b-12: rab tu bstan pa'i sngags can no //
T02D2515:353b-13: yang byin gyis brlab pa'i don du 'di dag thams cad mngon du bya'o //
T02D2515:353b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka zhes
T02D2515:353b-15: pa ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mthun pa'i thugs
T02D2515:353b-16: ka la'o // dkyil 'khor rnams thams cad du zhes
T02D2515:353b-17: pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2515:353b-18: gyi gzugs kyis te bdun pa ni gsum pa'i don
T02D2515:353b-20: rdo rje rnams kyi ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2515:353b-21: cad rnams kyis mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de
T02D2515:353b-22: rab tu spro ba ste rab tu gsal bar bya'o
T02D2515:353b-23: // gang gis ni snying po ste de de bzhin du brjod do //
T02D2515:353b-24: mtshams rnams thams cad du zhes pa ni sgo'i mtshams rnams su'o //
T02D2515:353b-26: bdug pa dang lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams rim
T02D2515:353b-27: pas rdo rje sems dpa' dang rgyal po la sogs
T02D2515:353b-29: gzugs la sogs pa rnams mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i kha dog go //
T02D2515:353b-30: rdo rje dri la sogs pa rnams //
T02D2515:353b-31: zhes pa dgos pa rgyas par bshad pa'o //
T02D2515:353b-32: rdo rje bdug pa dang me tog dang mar me
T02D2515:353b-33: dang dri'o zhes pa ji srid par aom badzra gandhe
T02D2515:353b-34: h'um aom badzra shi shee ree ho ho: zhes pa'i
T02D2515:353b-35: sngags dag legs par bzlog ste blta bar bya'o //
T02D2515:353b-36: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang bdug pa la sogs
T02D2515:353b-37: pa'i rnal 'byor gyis rjod par byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D2515:353b-38: // lha'i phyag rgyas mngon par rgyas gdab par bya
T02D2515:353b-39: ba ni shin tu dga' ba'i rdo rje snying po
T02D2515:354a-2: dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhes pa ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su'o //
T02D2515:354a-3: sgo'i phrin las zhes pa ni bsdu ba dang bstod
T02D2515:354a-4: par byas nas shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams su
T02D2515:354a-5: gnas nas dgug pa la sogs pa'i las 'di rnams
T02D2515:354a-6: bya'o // byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams gzhag
T02D2515:354a-7: par bya'o zhes pa ni snam bu la shar la
T02D2515:354a-8: sogs pa'i phyogs nas brtsams te byams pa dang kun
T02D2515:354a-14: 'khor lo la sogs pa ji ltar gsungs pa de
T02D2515:354a-15: la sogs pa rnams kyis de dag rab tu dbye
T02D2515:354a-16: bas so // rdo rje snying po'i rgyan du rnam
T02D2515:354a-17: par snang mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par
T02D2515:354a-18: bas so // 'byed pa'o // rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2515:354a-19: dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor nges par bstan pa de
T02D2515:354a-20: nas rnam par snang mdzad zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D2515:354a-21: bas so // 'byed pa'o // gsungs pa / sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog tu 'bar //
T02D2515:354a-22: zhes pa ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'chang ba'o //
T02D2515:354a-23: gnyis pa'o zhes pa ni ae yig go //
T02D2515:354a-24: 'khor lo can zhes pa ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba'o //
T02D2515:354a-25: 'khor lo zhes pa ni grub bzhi pa'i nang du
T02D2515:354a-26: chud pa'i re'u mig brgyad pa can 'bar ba dang
T02D2515:354a-27: bcas pa'o // padma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas ni sangs rgyas zhas pa lhag ma'o //
T02D2515:354a-28: dang po'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:354a-29: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor nye bar bstan
T02D2515:354a-30: pa de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2515:354a-31: pa / 'khor lo zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin no //
T02D2515:354a-32: sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas brgyan //
T02D2515:354a-33: zhes pa sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan no //
T02D2515:354a-34: dbyug pa dang ni zhags par brjod //
T02D2515:354a-35: ces pa ni de nyid do //
T02D2515:354a-36: khro bo'i khu tshur nyid kyi lag pa gnyis mthe
T02D2515:354a-37: chung gnyis kyis phan tshun lcags sgrog tu mdud pa'o
T02D2515:354a-38: // sdigs par mdzad ces pa bsdigs par gyis brtag pa sna tshogs par dgongs pa'o zhes so //
T02D2515:354a-39: rdo rje h'um mdzad ces pa 'dir 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba gang yin pa de'o //
T02D2515:354a-40: de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par
T02D2515:354b-0: bkod nas zhes @354b pa 'dis he ru ka la
T02D2515:354b-1: sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su gtso bo'i phyag rgya
T02D2515:354b-2: chen po'i dbus su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2515:354b-3: de kho na'i phyag rgya rnams gzhogs thams cad du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2515:354b-4: mchod pa dang sgo ba yang ngo //
T02D2515:354b-5: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor nges pa'o //
T02D2515:354b-6: bstan pa de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:354b-7: dkyil 'khor chen po chu'i dkyil 'khor zhes pa ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:354b-8: phyag bzhi zhes pa ni gnyis dag gis bgrang phreng
T02D2515:354b-9: dang bcas pa'i mchog sbyin dang spyi blugs lag tu'o
T02D2515:354b-10: // g-yon pas bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i padma'i sdong
T02D2515:354b-11: bo dkur 'dzin pa g-yas pas de'i 'dab ma kha
T02D2515:354b-12: // 'byed pa'o // sha sha'i sde pa'i mtha' zhes pa ni ha yig go //
T02D2515:354b-13: dbyangs kyi bzhi pa ai yig ste des spyi bo mnan pa'o //
T02D2515:354b-14: me'i sa bon ra yig go //
T02D2515:354b-15: thig le ni mchog tu zhes pa rjes su sna ldan dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2515:354b-20: de rnams thams cad kyang zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:354b-21: mchod pa dang sgo ba ni thams cad du sngar bzhin no //
T02D2515:354b-22: nam mkha' mdzod dang rin chen 'byung gnas dang 'jig
T02D2515:354b-23: rten dbang phyug dang 'jam dpal dang ngan song kun
T02D2515:354b-24: 'dren dang blo gros mi zad pa dang /
T02D2515:354b-25: sa'i snying po dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel
T02D2515:354b-26: dang dra ba can gyi 'od ces pa'i rim pas
T02D2515:354b-27: dgod par bya'o // sngar gsungs dkyil 'khor zhes pa chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:354b-28: de'i tshogs zhes pa ni rang gi gtso bo'i rnal
T02D2515:354b-29: 'byor gyis sgo phye nas bsdu ba la sogs pa
T02D2515:354b-30: sngon ma can gyi phyag rgya bzhi'i rgyas btab ste
T02D2515:354b-31: dbang bskur zhing mchod pa'i mthar thug pa rdzogs nas
T02D2515:354b-32: zhugs te rang dbang bskur ba la sogs pa can
T02D2515:354b-33: rdzogs nas slob ma bcug ste 'jug pa la sogs
T02D2515:354b-34: pa rdzogs pa 'dis nye bar spyod pa thams cad
T02D2515:354b-35: kyis mchod par bya zhes pa ni nye bar bsdu
T02D2515:354b-36: ba'i dus su'o // de la dang po nyid du
T02D2515:354b-37: zhes pa la sogs pa 'jug pa la sogs pa
T02D2515:354b-38: 'dus byas pa'i dus kho nar ro //
T02D2515:354b-39: des zhes pa ni slob dpon gyis so //
T02D2515:354b-40: skyil krung zhes pa ni rdo rje skyil krung ngo //
T02D2515:355a-1: bas zhes pa ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis badzra
T02D2515:355a-2: satva su sam gra ham zhes pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2515:355a-3: glus rdo rje'i gar sngon ma can gyis so //
T02D2515:355a-4: rab bkod phyag rgya thams cad du //
T02D2515:355a-5: zhes pa ni gang gi lha gang yin pa'i nyams
T02D2515:355a-6: de dang der gnas pas 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya
T02D2515:355a-8: bdag nyid rdo rje gar byas zhes pa 'dis phyogs gzhan ston par bya'o //
T02D2515:355a-9: ji skad du gsungs pa'i nyams kun du gnas pa
T02D2515:355a-10: sna tshogs pa'i rdo rje'i gar sngon ma can rang
T02D2515:355a-11: gi lha'i nga rgyal gyis so //
T02D2515:355a-12: phyag rgya bcings pa la'ang mchog gi dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes pa ji srid par ro //
T02D2515:355a-13: skyil krung rdo rje'i skyil krung ngo //
T02D2515:355a-14: de'i phyed kyis zhes pa ni rdo rje skyil krung gi phyed sems dpa'i skyil krung ngo //
T02D2515:355a-15: sdig pa'i rgyu can zhes pa ni sdig pa zhi ba'o //
T02D2515:355a-16: chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes pa
T02D2515:355a-17: ni de dang de'i dngos po rnams thams cad la
T02D2515:355a-18: rjes su zhugs nas chos rnams la 'jug pa'i ngang
T02D2515:355a-19: tshul lo// rab tu 'jug pa rnams kyi dga' ba
T02D2515:355a-20: med pa yang de rnams kyi mdangs dang bral ba
T02D2515:355a-21: ni zhes pa ni sgrib pa thams cad rab tu
T02D2515:355a-22: bcom pa rnams kyi dbang po zhi bar blta bar
T02D2515:355a-23: tshul lo// bya'o // rdo rje rin chen gyi dkyil
T02D2515:355a-24: 'khor bstan pa de nas zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D2515:355a-25: tshul lo// bya'o // pa gsungs pa / rin chen snying po'i zhes pa ni nam mkha'i snying po'i'o //
T02D2515:355a-26: rin chen padma'i zhes pa ni 'dab ma sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D2515:355a-27: rin chen phreng bas rnam par mdzes //
T02D2515:355a-28: zhes te dbang bskur kun gyi mchog ces pa ni cha brgyad kyi rin po che'o //
T02D2515:355a-29: yid bzhin nor bu dang shel la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:355a-30: dkyil 'khor kun gyi grva rnams kyi //
T02D2515:355a-31: gnas rnams su ni gzhag par bya //
T02D2515:355a-32: zhes pa ni mchod pa dang sgo ba rnams so //
T02D2515:355a-33: sde pa bzhi pa'i dang po ni te yig go //
T02D2515:355a-34: ma'i sa bon ni ra yig go //
T02D2515:355a-35: dbyangs kyi gnyis pa yis zhes pa ni a'a yig gis so //
T02D2515:355a-36: dbang bsgyur ba ni zhes pa rjes su nga ro'o //
T02D2515:355a-37: rgyab bskum ste zhes pa ni mnyam pa'i thal mor
T02D2515:355a-38: byas nas sor mo thams cad kyi rgyab bskum par
T02D2515:355a-39: bya'o // rin chen rnam pa legs 'byung ba //
T02D2515:355a-40: zhes pa ni rin po che'i rnam pas yongs su gyur pa'o //
T02D2515:355a-41: rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:355a-42: rdo rje phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D2515:355b-0: zhes pa ni phyi rol du sna tshogs @355b rdo rje'i phreng bas nye bar brgyan pa'o //
T02D2515:355b-1: zhal bzhi pa yi rdo rje che //
T02D2515:355b-2: zhes pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D2515:355b-3: 'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor //
T02D2515:355b-4: zhes pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02D2515:355b-5: de'i dbus su zhes pa ni zhal bzhi pa'i rdo rje chen po'i'o //
T02D2515:355b-6: kha dog sna tshogs mchog tu 'bar //
T02D2515:355b-7: zhes pa ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchog go //
T02D2515:355b-8: rdo rje sna tshogs zhes pa ni rdo rje khu tshur ro //
T02D2515:355b-9: sna tshogs kha dog ces pa ni zhal la dkar po'o //
T02D2515:355b-14: gzi brjid che zhes pa ni 'bar ba'i phreng ba'o //
T02D2515:355b-15: sangs rgyas phreng bas rnam bar mdzes //
T02D2515:355b-16: zhes pa ni rdo rje sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can no //
T02D2515:355b-17: mya ngan 'das don rab gsal byed //
T02D2515:355b-20: sgeg sogs rig ma thams cad kyis //
T02D2515:355b-21: zhes pa ni mchod pa rnams thams cad kyis so //
T02D2515:355b-22: de bzhin zhes pa ni rin po che'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2515:355b-23: ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba la sogs
T02D2515:355b-25: sna tshogs mchog tu rnam par bkra //
T02D2515:355b-26: zhes pa dang yang dag par sbrel lo //
T02D2515:355b-27: rdo rje'i thig les yongs su bskor //
T02D2515:355b-28: zhes pa ni sna tshogs thig le'i phreng bas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D2515:355b-29: sgeg sogs rig ma thams cad kyis //
T02D2515:355b-30: phyag rgya thams cad kyis zhes pa 'di kho na'i rim pas nye bar bstan pa /
T02D2515:355b-31: de la dbang bskur phyag rgya yis //
T02D2515:355b-32: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
T02D2515:355b-33: 'jam dpal gyi dkyil 'khor nye bar ston pa de nas zhes gsungs pa /
T02D2515:355b-34: shes rab ye shes 'khor lo che //
T02D2515:355b-35: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bla na med
T02D2515:355b-36: pa'i shes rab ye shes kyi rang bzhin rtsibs brgyad
T02D2515:355b-37: pa'i 'khor lo'o // sngags kyi yi ges rnam par brgyan //
T02D2515:355b-38: zhes pa ni mu khyud la aa ra pa tsa
T02D2515:355b-39: na zhes pa'i yi ge rnams kyis rnam par mdzes
T02D2515:355b-40: pa'o // ral grir bcas zhes pa ni phyag bzhi po rnams su'o //
T02D2515:355b-41: ral gri'i phreng bas rnam par mdzes //
T02D2515:355b-42: zhes pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du'o //
T02D2515:355b-43: yi ge lnga yi gsang sngags che ni ji skad du gsungs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:355b-44: de'i gzhogs su gnas zhes pa ni 'od kor la yang dag par bzhugs pa'o //
T02D2515:355b-45: rol zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i phyi rol lo //
T02D2515:356a-0: shes rab kyi pha rol tu @356a * //
T02D2515:356a-1: phyin pa ni stong pa nyid chos thams cad rang
T02D2515:356a-2: bzhin med pa'i rnal 'byor gyis so zhes bya ba
T02D2515:356a-4: de padma'i 'dab ma rnams su bri bar bya'o //
T02D2515:356a-5: sngon du bshad pa'i cho ga yis //
T02D2515:356a-6: zhes pa ni khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i cho gas so //
T02D2515:356a-7: mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par zhes pa ni sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dgod pa'o //
T02D2515:356a-8: ngos bzhi po rnams su ral gri'i phyag rgya bri'o //
T02D2515:356a-9: 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa de kho na bzhin
T02D2515:356a-10: du zhes pa ni chos kyi dkyil 'khor ji lta
T02D2515:356a-11: ba bzhin du'o // sems bskyed ma thag tu chos
T02D2515:356a-12: kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor ston
T02D2515:356a-13: pa de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2515:356a-14: pa chos kyi 'khor lo ni rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'o
T02D2515:356a-15: ba bzhin du'o // // rten cing 'brel 'byung phreng
T02D2515:356a-16: ba zhes pa ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du
T02D2515:356a-17: byed de zhes pa aa yig ste de mu khyud

T02D2515:356a-20: gnyis dag gis ral gri dang zhags pa 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2515:356a-21: rang gi yi ge'i phreng ba rnams kyis ni h'um yig gi phreng ba'o //
T02D2515:356a-22: de yang g-yas pa dang g-yas min gyi gzhogs su
T02D2515:356a-23: 'khor lo gnyis kyis 'od zer dang ldan zhing rnam
T02D2515:356a-24: par mdzes pa'i 'od kyis bskor bar blta bar bya'o

T02D2515:356a-26: 'khor lo bzhin du rab tu gnas //
T02D2515:356a-27: zhes pa ni 'khor lo'i rnam par yongs su gyur pa'o //
T02D2515:356a-28: mchod pa zhes pa ni sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:356a-29: 'khor lo bskor bar bya la sogs //

T02D2515:356a-33: par bya'o // nam mkha' mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor nye
T02D2515:356a-34: bar ston pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa

T02D2515:356a-39: mkha' bzhin shin tu 'od gsal ba //
T02D2515:356a-40: zhes pa ni bee d'urya'i kha dog go //
T02D2515:356a-41: zla ba'i kha dog gzi brjid che //
T02D2515:356a-42: zhes pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dkar po'o //

T02D2515:356b-4: dbyangs kyi dgu pa zhes pa ni aom yig ste

T02D2515:356b-7: zhes pa ni rjes su sna ldan dang bcas pa'o //

T02D2515:356b-9: rjes su sna ldan dang bcas pa bstan to //

T02D2515:356b-23: khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyis bskor ba ni gang du

T02D2515:356b-28: rnam pa zhes pa ni zur gsum gyi rnam pa'o

T02D2515:356b-34: chen po gang yin pa de bzhin du brjod do

T02D2515:356b-37: sngags kyi yi ge legs par sbyar //
T02D2515:356b-38: zhes pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor du sngags kyi yi ge dgod pa'o //

T02D2515:357a-4: sngar bzhin las khyad par ni zhags pa lcags kyu
T02D2515:357a-5: 'dzin zhes pa la sogs pa ste phyag gnyis kyis

T02D2515:357a-14: rdo rje chags pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang phyag bzhin
