T02D2515:357a-28: thig le gnyis ni tsheg drag go //
T02D2515:357a-29: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par spyod //
T02D2515:357a-30: ces pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad bsngags par bya'o //
T02D2515:357a-31: rdo rje gzi brjid kyi dkyil 'khor du yang /
T02D2515:357a-32: kun na sangs rgyas nyid mtshungs pa //
T02D2515:357a-33: zhes pa ni thams cad du sangs rgyas nyid sbyin pa'o //
T02D2515:357a-34: dbyangs kyi bcu gcig pa ni aa yig go //
T02D2515:357a-35: sngags kyi phreng bas yongs su bskor //
T02D2515:357a-36: zhes pa ni 'od kor la rang gi sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng bas bskor ba'o //
T02D2515:357a-37: phyag rgya'i mtshan ma zhes pa ni phyag gnyis kyis
T02D2515:357a-38: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang rin po che'i dkyil 'khor
T02D2515:357a-39: 'dzin pa'o // ngos bzhi po rnams su yang de kho nas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D2515:357a-40: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod nas zhes pa ni bsdu
T02D2515:357a-41: ba la sogs pa sngon ma can ni lhag ma'o
T02D2515:357a-42: // rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dkyil 'khor la yang
T02D2515:357a-43: rin chen tog gi dkyil 'khor ni rin po che'i
T02D2515:357b-0: // dkyil 'khor ro// @357b phyag bzhi zhes pa ni gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan 'chang ba'o //
T02D2515:357b-1: g-yon pas bsnyems pa dang bcas pa g-yas kyis mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D2515:357b-2: sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la //
T02D2515:357b-3: me yi gsal ba can ni tra yig go //
T02D2515:357b-4: de yang tsheg drag dang bcas par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2515:357b-5: rdo rje bzhad pa'i dkyil 'khor la yang gnyis kyis
T02D2515:357b-6: so'i phreng ba 'dzin pa g-yon gyis bsnyems pa dang
T02D2515:357b-7: bcas pa g-yas kyis mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D2515:357b-8: rgyu don rab tu sgrub byed pa //
T02D2515:357b-9: zhes pa ni ha yig go //
T02D2515:357b-10: de yang tsheg drag dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2515:357b-11: rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang dngos grub
T02D2515:357b-12: rab tu ster ba po nyid kyi phyir dngos grub
T02D2515:357b-14: rdo rje'i thig gis yongs su bskor ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D2515:357b-15: me la yang dag 'byung zhes pa ni me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D2515:357b-16: de nyid gsal bar gru gsum zhes bya ba la
T02D2515:357b-17: sogs pa gsungs pa chos kyi dbyings kyi yi ge
T02D2515:357b-19: de'i sngags nyid kyi phyir chos dbyings yi ge ste bcom ldan 'das kyang ngo //
T02D2515:357b-20: thams cad gzi brjid rang bzhin zhes pa ni 'od zer sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba'o //
T02D2515:357b-21: phyag bzhi zhes pa ni gnyis kyis kyang bsnyems pa dang bcas pa dang mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02D2515:357b-22: gnyis pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin gzhan ston par byed do //
T02D2515:357b-23: brjod bya'i dbye ba zhes pa ni don 'byed par mngon par dgongs so zhes pa ji srid pa'o //
T02D2515:357b-24: rdo rje srung ba'i dkyil 'khor la yang go cha zhes pa ni go cha'o //
T02D2515:357b-25: phyag bzhi zhes pa ni gnyis kyis go cha 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2515:357b-26: g-yon pas me tog dmar po 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2515:357b-28: sna tshogs kha dog sna tshogs te sngar brjod pa'i rdo rje khu tshur bzhin no //
T02D2515:357b-29: gzi brjid che zhes pa ni 'od zer 'bar ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2515:357b-30: phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan //
T02D2515:357b-31: zhes pa phyag dang ngos bzhi po rnams su'o //
T02D2515:357b-32: sngags dang yang dag par ldan pa ni 'od kyi dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D2515:357b-33: sha sha'i sde mtha' can zhes pa ni ha yig go //
T02D2515:357b-34: n'a da yis ni steng du brgyan //
T02D2515:357b-35: zhes pa ni rjes su sna ldan dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2515:357b-36: sna tshogs kha dog gis bsgoms pas //
T02D2515:357b-37: zhes pa ni 'od zer sna tshogs kyis so //
T02D2515:357b-38: sngags kyi phreng bas yongs su bskor //
T02D2515:357b-40: glog gi phreng bas rnam par brgyan ni de dang de kho na'o //
T02D2515:357b-41: rdo rje khu tshur gyis dkyil 'khor la yang rdo
T02D2515:357b-42: rje padma zhes pa ni sna tshogs rdo rje la
T02D2515:358a-2: phyag bzhi zhes pa ni gnyis kyis khu tshur gyi phyag rgya 'ching ba'o //
T02D2515:358a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kun gyi khu tshur zhes
T02D2515:358a-5: pa de dag kho na'i sgrub par byed pa sku
T02D2515:358a-6: dang gsung dang thugs zhes pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:358a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung
T02D2515:358a-8: dang thugs gcig pa can du byed do zhes pa'i
T02D2515:358a-9: don no // rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa ni dbye bar byar med pa'i sems so //
T02D2515:358a-10: mnyam nyid mchog ces pa kho na bstan pa gsungs
T02D2515:358a-11: pa gnyis nyid med ces pa ste mchog ni sems
T02D2515:358a-12: dpa'i mchog nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2515:358a-13: gsang ba ni sngags kyi sems dpa' rnams kyis bsrung bar bya ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2515:358a-14: sdud pa zhes pa ni gcig pa can du byed pa'o //
T02D2515:358a-15: sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni pa yig go //
T02D2515:358a-16: de yang rjes su nga ro dang bcas par blta bar bya'o //
T02D2515:358a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' dang rin chen dang chos dang
T02D2515:358a-18: las rnams rim pas rnam par snang mdzad chen po
T02D2515:358a-19: dang nam mkha'i snying po dang 'gro ba 'dul ba
T02D2515:358a-20: dang rdo rje khu tshur gyi rang bzhin yin pa
T02D2515:358a-21: nyid kyi phyir dkyil 'khor gsungs so zhes pas 'dir
T02D2515:358a-23: 'dir phyag rgya dgod pa nye bar ma bkod pa
T02D2515:358a-24: gang yin pa de rnams kyang ngos bzhi po rnams
T02D2515:358a-25: su rang gi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya nyid gzhag par
T02D2515:358a-26: bya'o // sngar gsungs pa'i rdo rje la sogs pa
T02D2515:358a-27: rnams kyis kyang de rnams kyi phyag dang kha dog
T02D2515:358a-28: dang ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i dbye bas khyad
T02D2515:358a-29: par yod par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2515:358a-30: da ni 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor nye bar bstan
T02D2515:358a-31: pa de nas zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa
T02D2515:358a-32: / de la dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor la /
T02D2515:358a-33: sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spang //
T02D2515:358a-34: zhes pa'i sogs kyi sgras rta babs la sogs pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2515:358a-35: sgo gcig par re kh'a dkar po'i dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D2515:358a-36: phyag bzhi zhes pa ni gnyis kyis mdud rtse gsum pa dang pattis 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2515:358a-37: gnyis kyis dung dang padma 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2515:358a-38: chu'i dkyil 'khor dbus su zhes pa ni gru bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor la chu'o //
T02D2515:358a-39: de las khyu mchog go / de la zhon pa'o //
T02D2515:358a-40: mdud rtse gsum pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya rang gi ngos rnams su dgod par bya'o //
T02D2515:358a-41: 'di nyid la zhes pa dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil
T02D2515:358a-42: 'khor du dga' byed dbang phyug kyang gar byed pa
T02D2515:358a-43: gzhag par bya'o // phyag bzhi zhes pa yang de kho na dang sbrel lo //
T02D2515:358a-44: lag pa stong gis zhes pa ni nag po chen po nyid kyi'o//
T02D2515:358b-0: @358b rtse gsum gyi phyag rgya ngos rnams su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D2515:358b-1: 'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis //
T02D2515:358b-2: zhes pa ni sgo khyud la sogs pa rnam par spangs pa'i rigs pas so //
T02D2515:358b-3: sbrang rtsir byed pa la sogs pa'i ming po gsum zhes pa sbrang rtsir byed pa dang /
T02D2515:358b-4: rgyal bar byed pa dang grub par byed pa rnams
T02D2515:358b-5: te de rnams rim pas 'dod chags dang zhe sdang
T02D2515:358b-6: dang gti mug gi bdag nyid can tshangs pa dang
T02D2515:358b-7: drag po dang khyab 'jug rnams ji srid par ro
T02D2515:358b-9: zhes pa ni lag pa g-yon pa na gzhu'o //
T02D2515:358b-10: me tog mda' ni yongs su 'phen //
T02D2515:358b-11: zhes pa g-yas pas mda' 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2515:358b-12: ngos bzhi po rnams su rang gi mda'i phyag rgyas yongs su bskor ba'o //
T02D2515:358b-13: 'dod chags sbrang rtsir byed par gsungs //
T02D2515:358b-14: zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par dran //
T02D2515:358b-15: gti mug grub byed rab tu brjod //
T02D2515:358b-16: kun du gsang ba'i ming rnams so //
T02D2515:358b-17: zhes pas 'di rnams kyi ming rnams kyi mtshan ma
T02D2515:358b-18: de dag 'dod chags la sogs pa rnams su bsgos
T02D2515:358b-20: de ltar zhes pa ni rdo rje sbrang rtsi la
T02D2515:358b-21: sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'dab ma bzhi pa
T02D2515:358b-22: zhes pa ni padma 'dab ma bzhi pa la'o //
T02D2515:358b-23: rgyal ma dmar po gzhu dang mda' dang ldan pa'o //
T02D2515:358b-24: rnam rgyal nag po phub dang ral gri 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2515:358b-25: mi pham ser mo gter gyi lag pa'o //
T02D2515:358b-26: gzhan gyis mi thub ma dkar mo thod pa dang bcas pa'i gri rings 'dzin pa'o //
T02D2515:358b-27: gzhogs su rang gi mtshan ma de rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D2515:358b-28: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sngags rnams gzhag
T02D2515:358b-29: par bya'o zhes pa ni rang gi sngags 'di dag
T02D2515:358b-31: 'jig rten pa la yang lag pa g-yon pa'i khu
T02D2515:358b-32: tshur 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya ste de kho na
T02D2515:358b-33: bzhin du lag pa'i rgyab ces pa aom gyi yi
T02D2515:358b-35: rdo rje phreng ba zhes 'bar ba'i mthar thug par rdo rje rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'o //
T02D2515:358b-36: yang dag sbyor las zhes pa dbang du byed pa
T02D2515:358b-37: la aom yig dmar po bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel
T02D2515:358b-38: ba bri'o // de la bsgrub bya nang du bsgoms
T02D2515:358b-39: nas 'od zer dmar bo'i phreng ba can gyi sor
T02D2515:358b-41: rnam par dbye ba yang zhes pa dgug pa las
T02D2515:358b-42: te de kho na bzhin du bsams nas bsgrub bya
T02D2515:358b-43: dgug pa'i tshul gyis de la mngon du phyogs pa'i
T02D2515:358b-44: sor mo'i lcags kyu rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
T02D2515:358b-45: phyag rgya zhes pa rmongs pa las te nag por bsams nas phyag rgya bya'o //
T02D2515:359a-0: kun spyod ces pa nag po @359a * //
T02D2515:359a-1: nyid bsams nas bsgrub bya de yi ge nyid kyi
T02D2515:359a-2: nang du bcug nas sor mo'i mdzub mo las gzhan
T02D2515:359a-4: bsdus pa zhes pa de bcing pa las te de
T02D2515:359a-5: bzhin kho na bsams nas bsgrub bya nang du bcug
T02D2515:359a-6: ste sor mo'i rtse mos btsir bar bya'o //
T02D2515:359a-7: de'i steng du lha'am lha mo blta'o //
T02D2515:359a-8: de rnams thams cad dang de thams cad de'o //
T02D2515:359a-9: rmongs pa la sogs zhes pa sogs kyi sgras bsgrad pa'o //
T02D2515:359a-10: rengs pa sogs kyis 'di las gzhan pa'i las kyang 'di'i nang du'o //
T02D2515:359a-11: go rims bzhin zhes pa ji ltar rjes su mthun par ro //
T02D2515:359a-12: rdo rje snying po'i rgyan du rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par 'byed pa'o //
T02D2515:359a-13: rgyud phyi ma nye bar mchog tu 'phags ba de
T02D2515:359a-14: nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs
T02D2515:359a-15: pa byang chub sems zhes pa nas brtsams nas /
T02D2515:359a-16: rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog / ces pa
T02D2515:359a-17: ji srid rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgo nas so
T02D2515:359a-18: // mi bskyod pa dang zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D2515:359a-19: nas thams cad de bzhin gshegs zhes pa srid par
T02D2515:359a-20: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D2515:359a-22: 'khor los sgyur ba gtsug tor gyi sgo nas so //
T02D2515:359a-23: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes pa nas brtsams nas /
T02D2515:359a-24: rdo rje mtshams sbyor legs par bsgrub //
T02D2515:359a-25: ces pa ji srid par rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa sems dpa'i sgo nas so //
T02D2515:359a-26: phyag 'tshal khyod ces pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams
T02D2515:359a-27: cad la phyag byas pa'i sgo nas 'di la bstod
T02D2515:359a-29: da ni de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la
T02D2515:359a-30: sogs pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs
T02D2515:359a-31: pa nas dpe byad kyi mthar thug pa'i sgrub thabs
T02D2515:359a-32: nye bar bsdu ba gsungs pa /
T02D2515:359a-33: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:359a-34: de rnams kyi 'jug pa ni gang du shes pa ste //
T02D2515:359a-35: de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa'i ye shes so //
T02D2515:359a-36: de lha dang dbyer med pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje'o //
T02D2515:359a-37: de la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2515:359a-38: de nyid kyang gang gi ming yin pa de la
T02D2515:359a-39: snyoms par zhugs pa zhes pa mngon du mdzad pa
T02D2515:359a-40: dang ldan pa'o // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
T02D2515:359a-41: zhes pa ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid
T02D2515:359a-42: kyis yongs su gyur par sngar byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D2515:359a-43: dang ldan pa'o // las so // de bzhin gshegs
T02D2515:359a-44: pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes zhes pa
T02D2515:359a-45: ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs so //
T02D2515:359b-0: zhugs par @359b gyur to zhes bya ba ni nang
T02D2515:359b-1: du thim pa ste mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i
T02D2515:359b-2: thugs legs par byung nas zhes pa lhag ma'o //
T02D2515:359b-3: shes rab dang ye shes rnam par sbyangs te zhes
T02D2515:359b-4: pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rdzogs par
T02D2515:359b-5: bya ste'o // byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas zhes
T02D2515:359b-6: pa la sogs pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs
T02D2515:359b-7: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug gi ting nge
T02D2515:359b-8: 'dzin yang bskyed nas zhes pa bstan pa'o //
T02D2515:359b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye
T02D2515:359b-10: shes ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi shes rab ye
T02D2515:359b-11: shes kyis so // yongs su bskor ba zhes pa ni yongs su bskor bar bskyed nas so //
T02D2515:359b-12: rnam par cis sha na gsungs pa /
T02D2515:359b-13: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi zhes pa
T02D2515:359b-14: la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2515:359b-15: ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:359b-16: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang 'di rnams kho na'o //
T02D2515:359b-17: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan
T02D2515:359b-18: pa chos kyi tshig ces pa ni dran pa nye
T02D2515:359b-19: bar gzhag pa la sogs pa'i tshig go //
T02D2515:359b-20: 'jig rten du yang nye bar len pa med do zhes pa ni nye bar thob pa med pa'o //
T02D2515:359b-21: lus la sogs pa'i chos mnyam pa can ni stong pa nyid do //
T02D2515:359b-22: gang de kho na gnas te gzhi'i rang bzhin yin pa de yang nye bar thob pa med do //
T02D2515:359b-23: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor sngon du byas
T02D2515:359b-24: nas zhes pa ni de'i snying po rang gi snying
T02D2515:359b-25: ga'i rdo rje la bkod nas dran pa nye bar
T02D2515:359b-26: gzhag pa rnams kun rdzob dang don dam pa ji
T02D2515:359b-27: lta ba bzhin du sgom par byed pa'i sku'o //
T02D2515:359b-28: de bzhin du dpe byad rnams kyi mthar thug par ji srid par ro //
T02D2515:359b-29: mi spong ba'i ched du ni don dam par chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2515:359b-30: mi spong ba ma yin pa'i ched du ste ma
T02D2515:359b-31: byung ba yongs su brtags pa rig bzhin pa nyid
T02D2515:359b-32: kyi phyir don dam par gnyis su med pa'o //
T02D2515:359b-33: don dam pa'i sgo nas dngos po mthar thug pa
T02D2515:359b-34: med pa'i phyir dang kun rdzob kyi sgo nas ji
T02D2515:359b-35: ltar snang ba theg pa las so sor 'jug pa'o
T02D2515:359b-36: // spros pa med pa ni don dam par gnyis su med pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2515:359b-37: chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad nyid do //
T02D2515:359b-38: stobs thams cad ces pa ni stobs byed pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2515:359b-39: cis na gdod ma nas spros pa med pa'o //
T02D2515:359b-40: ci ru gzhan nye bar lhag pa'i spros pa med par 'gyur zhen gsungs pa /
T02D2515:359b-41: gdod ma nas dag pa zhes so //
T02D2515:359b-42: ngag so sor yang dag par rig pa zhes pa
T02D2515:359b-43: ni nges pa'i tshig so sor yang dag par rig
T02D2515:360a-1: chos thams cad gcig tu rjes su dran zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2515:360a-2: chos thams cad don dam par stong pa nyid ces pa'o //
T02D2515:360a-3: mtshan nyid ni rang bzhin med pa'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D2515:360a-4: mtshan nyid med pa ni de las bzlog pa'o //
T02D2515:360a-5: de rnams rnam par 'byed pa ni snang ba med par byed pa'o //
T02D2515:360a-6: nges mnyam pa nyid de khong du chud pa'o //
T02D2515:360a-7: sgo ni thabs te de nyid gang gi ming yin pa de la de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2515:360a-8: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun po rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid ni stong pa nyid do //
T02D2515:360a-9: skye ba med pa nyid kyang mtshon par bya ba ni mngon du bya'o //
T02D2515:360a-10: bdag gis sam zhes bya ba de la de bzhin du gsungs so //
T02D2515:360a-11: lam zad mi shes pa ni gang du na byang chub kyi sems la ste de'i 'jug pa'o //
T02D2515:360a-12: legs par so sor rig pa zhes pa ni rnam pa thams cad yongs su shes pa'o //
T02D2515:360a-13: de'i rang bzhin ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su rig par 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:360a-14: mtshan nyid gcig pa zhes pa ni gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin las so //
T02D2515:360a-15: chos thams cad ces pa dang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bo las so //
T02D2515:360a-16: de nyid kyis zhes pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba'i sngags kyis so //
T02D2515:360a-17: legs par so sor rtog pa'i phyir //
T02D2515:360a-18: zhes pa ni legs par so sor byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2515:360a-19: chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni don dam pa'o //
T02D2515:360a-20: de'i phyir yang kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing
T02D2515:360a-21: rnam par byang ba med la bsam gtan med cing
T02D2515:360a-22: bsam gtan ma yin pa'ang med la snyoms par 'jug
T02D2515:360a-23: pa med cing snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin pa'ang
T02D2515:360a-24: med pa'o // mi 'jigs pa rnams kyis ni mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D2515:360a-25: gang las gang zhig na chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2515:360a-26: de ltar na yang ci'i phyir zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2515:360a-27: nga'i rnam pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste ngar 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2515:360a-28: nga yi bar 'dzin pa ni bdag dang bdag gi
T02D2515:360a-29: bar mngon par zhen ba dag dang bral ba nyid
T02D2515:360a-30: kyi phyir ro // rnam par thar pa brgyad mnyam
T02D2515:360a-31: pa nyid ces pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad
T02D2515:360a-33: rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces pa ni
T02D2515:360a-34: snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang gnyis su med pa
T02D2515:360a-35: nyid do // thams cad ces pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa thabs kyi mthar thug pa'o //
T02D2515:360a-36: mi mnyam pa la sogs pa'i mthar phyin pa nyid ni rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:360a-37: ji ltar na brtan par rjes su rtogs pa'i sbyor bas bsgom pa phyi rol gyis so //
T02D2515:360b-0: ye shes kyi don to zhes pa ni ye shes @360b kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2515:360b-1: ci'ang med pa zhes pa ni dmigs pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2515:360b-2: nyon mongs med pa zhes pa ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'o //
T02D2515:360b-3: yi ge med pa zhes pa ni sgra dang ldan pa ma yin pa'o //
T02D2515:360b-4: de'i phyir don yod pa ste spyod pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2515:360b-5: gdod nas dag pa ni glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2515:360b-6: dri ma dang bral ba dang 'od gsal ba gnyis
T02D2515:360b-7: su med pa dang rnam par rtog pa med pa'i
T02D2515:360b-8: phyir ro // de'i phyir yang mngon par brjod bya ma yin pa ste /
T02D2515:360b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gang 'di la rnam par gnas pa de rnam par bzhag pa'o //
T02D2515:360b-10: gang las gang gi phyir na /
T02D2515:360b-11: don dam par na gnas pa dang bral ba de
T02D2515:360b-12: yang ci ltar rnam bar med pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D2515:360b-13: stong pa nyid gcig tu rnam par gnas pas rnam
T02D2515:360b-15: dbang thams cad ba yang don dam par rang bzhin rnam par dben pa'o //
T02D2515:360b-16: kun rdzob tu dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa'o //
T02D2515:360b-17: gang las na chos thams cad legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D2515:360b-18: thams cad du zhes bya ba ni yul du'o //
T02D2515:360b-19: thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis bya ba ni chos thams cad mtshungs pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2515:360b-20: stong pa nyid las yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir te /
T02D2515:360b-21: de'i phyir yang shes rab yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D2515:360b-22: ci'i phyir mtshan mngon par 'grub par blta bar bya ba ma yin zhe na gsungs pa /
T02D2515:360b-23: byang chub ni mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D2515:360b-24: zhes pa gang las byang chub la mtshon par bya
T02D2515:360b-25: ba med pa'o // gang zhig chos thams cad mtshan
T02D2515:360b-26: nyid med par 'gyur zhen gsungs pa 'di lta ste
T02D2515:360b-27: ba med pa'o // / stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D2515:360b-29: stong pa nyid du mnyam pa zhes pa ni de'i rang bzhin no //
T02D2515:360b-30: gang gis na de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
T02D2515:360b-31: byang chub dang chos thams cad kyang mtshan nyid gcig pa ste /
T02D2515:360b-33: nam mkha'i mtshan nyid can zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can no zhes pa'o //
T02D2515:360b-34: tshad med pa'i dpe byad mnyam pa nyid la legs
T02D2515:360b-35: par rab tu gnas pa ni don dam par dpe
T02D2515:360b-36: byad rnams kyi dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2515:360b-37: kun rdzob dang don dam par gsal byed ma yin
T02D2515:360b-38: pa mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas
T02D2515:360b-39: pa ni mngon par zhen pa med pa'o //
T02D2515:360b-40: mtshan dang dpe byad rnams sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan
T02D2515:360b-41: pa la legs par rab tu gnas pa dus gsum
T02D2515:361a-0: gyi dpe byad ces pa ni 'das pa la @361a
T02D2515:361a-2: de'i mnyam pa nyid kho na rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid do //
T02D2515:361a-3: de thob pa ni stong pa nyid chos kyi dbyings
T02D2515:361a-4: thams cad dang dpe byad mnyam pa nyid rjes su
T02D2515:361a-5: thob pa'o // de'i phyir yang gnyis su med pa
T02D2515:361a-6: ni don la yang dag par zhugs pa gnyis su
T02D2515:361a-7: med pa'i rang bzhin du skyes pa'o //
T02D2515:361a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:361a-9: de la sems dpa' chen po'i don nye bar ston
T02D2515:361a-10: pa'i phyir yongs su tshim par rgyun du legs so
T02D2515:361a-11: zhes pa 'chad par 'gyur ba bzhis rigs can bzhi
T02D2515:361a-12: po rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo nas so ;
T02D2515:361a-13: / phyag bya ba bzhi po rnams ni de bzhin
T02D2515:361a-14: gshegs pa bzhi'i dbye bas khong du chud par bya'o
T02D2515:361a-15: // ae ma ho zhes pa ni yang dag par rjod par byed pa la ya mtshan pa'o //
T02D2515:361a-16: rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D2515:361a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:361a-18: aa ha'i rnam pa la sogs pa bzhi po rnams
T02D2515:361a-19: kyang mi bskyod pa la sogs pa bzhi po de
T02D2515:361a-21: 'di nyid ni phyag bya ba yang dag par bsdus te bstan no //
T02D2515:361a-22: rigs thams cad kyi 'khor lo zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs so//
T02D2515:361a-23: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nye bar bstan pa gsungs pa /
T02D2515:361a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D2515:361a-25: kun du sna tshogs bya ba rnams //
T02D2515:361a-26: zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i bya
T02D2515:361a-27: ba'am sku de ni rnam par dben pa'i sa las
T02D2515:361a-28: bsgrub par bya'o // dngos grub mchog ces ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i dngos grub bo //
T02D2515:361a-29: ri'i rtse mo rnams su'am dur khrod la sogs pa
T02D2515:361a-30: rnams su rdo rje 'dzin pa dang rdo rje h'um
T02D2515:361a-31: mdzad dang de'i bya ba rnams so //
T02D2515:361a-32: padma'i skyed mos tshal la sogs pa rnams su phyag
T02D2515:361a-33: na padmo ste 'jig rten dbang phyug dang de'i bya
T02D2515:361a-34: ba rnams so // rgyal po'i pho brang la sogs
T02D2515:361a-35: pa rnams su lag na rin chen zhes pa nam
T02D2515:361a-36: mkha'i snying po'i bya ba de'o //
T02D2515:361a-37: rdo rje sna tshogs kyi bya ba de ni rtags gcig la sogs pa rnams su'o //
T02D2515:361a-38: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' ni lha'i mchog nyid ji skad du gsungs pa rnams su'o //
T02D2515:361b-0: 'di rnams kyi thun mong go gnas @361b bstan pa'i
T02D2515:361b-1: phyir nam mkha' zhes pa la sogs pa gsungs pa
T02D2515:361b-2: phyogs kun mnyam nyid gnas zhes pa ni phyogs rnams
T02D2515:361b-3: skabs yin pa dang skabs ma yin pa'i rnam rtog
T02D2515:361b-4: yid la mi bya bar ro //
T02D2515:361b-5: shar te shar gyi phyogs so //
T02D2515:361b-7: bzhi po rnams su dkyil 'khor gyi thig brgyad po'i
T02D2515:361b-8: phyi ru ni phyi'i thig bzhi la kun nas gru
T02D2515:361b-9: bzhi pa'i byed kyi dkyil 'khor brgyad do //
T02D2515:361b-10: kha dog lnga zhes pa ni /
T02D2515:361b-15: dkar po'i bdag nyid can no //
T02D2515:361b-16: rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dgod
T02D2515:361b-17: pa bstan ba dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus zhes pa
T02D2515:361b-18: la sogs pa gsungs pa sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan zhes
T02D2515:361b-19: pa ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o //
T02D2515:361b-20: sgeg pa zhes pa ni rdo rje rgyal po la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:361b-21: rin chen 'bar sogs pa yang dag ldan //
T02D2515:361b-22: zhes pa ni rdo rje rin chen rjes su son ba'o //
T02D2515:361b-23: sna tshogs rdo rje sogs rnams kyis ni rdo rje la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:361b-24: rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug gi zhes pa ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po yi'o //
T02D2515:361b-25: gal te yang kun du bzang po la sogs pa
T02D2515:361b-26: rnams zhes gsungs pa ni de bzhin du yang byams
T02D2515:361b-27: pa la sogs pa rnams khong du chud par bya'o
T02D2515:361b-28: // de bzhin zhes pa ni ji ltar chos kyi
T02D2515:361b-29: dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du ji lta ba bzhin no
T02D2515:361b-30: // // gtso bo gzhan gyi sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid 'dir bstan pa /
T02D2515:361b-31: sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya //
T02D2515:361b-33: kun du sna tshogs skal bzangs la //
T02D2515:361b-34: zhes pa ni gru bzhi pa'o //
T02D2515:361b-35: kun du sna tshogs 'khor lo can ni rnam par snang mdzad chen po'o //
T02D2515:361b-36: rin chen bdun po nyid mchod pa chen po ste
T02D2515:361b-37: 'khor los sgyur ba gang gis yin pa de bzhin
T02D2515:361b-39: de'i yongs su rdzogs pa ni zla ba bzhin no //
T02D2515:361b-40: de nyid kyang sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa rnams so //
T02D2515:361b-41: rin chen gyi zhes pa nam mkha'i snyid po'i'o //
T02D2515:361b-42: sna tshogs zhes pa rdo rje sna tshogs kyi'o //
T02D2515:361b-43: yan lag kun zhes pa ni spyi bo la sogs pa'i gnas brgyad du'o //
T02D2515:361b-44: phyag rgya zhes pa ni rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D2515:361b-45: rin po che'i padma 'dab ma brgyad pa la rab
T02D2515:361b-46: tu bzhag nas rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i mthar
T02D2515:362a-1: yang du mngon bar dbang bskur te thams cad rgyal srid du 'gyur ro //
T02D2515:362a-2: lag ldan la sogs pa rnams su rab tu bzhag nas /
T02D2515:362a-3: dpal gyi sngags 'don pa 'di dag gis kyang dbang bskur bas 'dir yang de bzhin no //
T02D2515:362a-4: mtshon cha la sogs pa la rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D2515:362a-5: rgyu nyid kyi phyir rnam par rgyal ba ste aa
T02D2515:362a-6: ba r'a dzi ta dkar po dang /
T02D2515:362a-7: gi ri karni ka gang yang rung ba 'dis dbang
T02D2515:362a-8: bskur ba ni rgyal bar gyur pa zhes gzhan gyis
T02D2515:362a-10: de nyid du grags pa gang yin pa de la de bzhin du brjod par bya'o //
T02D2515:362a-11: de zhes pa ni 'khor lo dang bcas pa'i gtso bo'i phyag rgya de zhes pa'o //
T02D2515:362a-12: de rnams la zhes pa bum pa la'o //
T02D2515:362a-13: 'dis de dag bstan pa rang gi lha'i 'khor lo
T02D2515:362a-14: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la'ang ji lta ba
T02D2515:362a-15: bzhin du bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
T02D2515:362a-16: mchog gyur pa zhes pa ni gi ri karni ka'o //
T02D2515:362a-17: lhag gnas kun gyi sbyor ba yi //
T02D2515:362a-18: zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa'i mchod pa'i sngags kyis so //
T02D2515:362a-19: rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba ni rnam par snang mdzad
T02D2515:362a-20: chen po'i rnal 'byor pa la ste sngar bzhin du
T02D2515:362a-21: bshad par bya'o // ci'i don du rin po che
T02D2515:362a-22: la sogs pa rtog bar byed ce na gsungs pa
T02D2515:362a-23: bshad par bya'o // / sangs rgyas byin rlabs sbyor ba yi //
T02D2515:362a-25: de dag rtog par byed pa la sangs rgyas kyis
T02D2515:362a-26: byin gyis rlob par byed par 'gyur ro zhes mngon
T02D2515:362a-27: par dgongs so // rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi
T02D2515:362a-28: rgyud chen por ji ltar rnyed pa'i rgyud phyi ma'i
T02D2515:362a-30: rgyud kyi rgyal po snying po'i don gyi phung po rgyas pa mi mngon zhing //
T02D2515:362a-31: shin tu mi rigs blo gros yon tan rgya mtsho'i spyod yul du gyur pa //
T02D2515:362a-32: bdag gis 'dir ni rnam par 'grel phye bzung zhing thob pa sngags las byung //
T02D2515:362a-33: skye ba med pa rgyud ma ches sngon gyur pa kho na tshad ma yin //
T02D2515:362a-35: 'dir ni dge ba nyer bsags des //
T02D2515:362a-37: rab zhi'i bshes gnyen ldan gyur cig / rdo rje
T02D2515:362a-38: snying po rgyan gyi rgyud kyi dka' 'grel slob dpon
T02D2515:362a-39: rab tu zhi ba'i bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs
T02D2515:362a-41: / bod kyi lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong rin
